ESP.ORIGINAL: Hologram Fade Out
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息影像渐隐

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is to make Holograms flicker out of view - it uses Set Actor Alpha in its associated script.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会让全息人淡出 - 它在相关脚本中使用了阿尔法演员集。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hologram Flickering
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息影像闪烁中

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is to make Holograms flicker in/out of view - it uses Set Actor Alpha in its associated script.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会让全息人若隐若现 - 它在相关脚本中使用了演员阿尔法的设定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hologram Warning
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息影像警告

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is to make Holograms stop, move in the direction of the Player, and then resume a travel-on-spot package on the effect's end block.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会让全息影像停下来，并且面朝玩家，效果中止后再返回巡逻模式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hologram Image
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息影像

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is to make NPCs appear with Hologram Effect Shaders- In this case, we handle the regular base effect (Neutral).
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会让NPC和全息阴影效果一起出现——这种情况下，我们只作为常规基础效果处理（中立）。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hologram Image 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息影像2

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is to make NPCs appear with Hologram Effect Shaders- In this case, we handle the regular base effect (Neutral). However, this version is meant to be used with Holograms tied to the type 2 codebox.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会让NPC和全息阴影效果一起出现——这种情况下，我们只作为常规基础效果处理（中立）。不管怎样，此版本需要与2号代码盒有关的全息系统一起使用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hologram Fade In
ESP.TRADUIT: 全息影像渐显

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is to make Holograms flicker into view - it uses Set Actor Alpha in its associated script.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会让全息人淡入 - 它在相关脚本中使用了阿尔法演员集。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Entry - Day 4 - Addendum
ESP.TRADUIT: 日记 - 第4天 - 补记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
While setting up the radios to monitor Dome and robots, thought I saw glint (scope?) from the building on other side of compound.
Should check it out, make sure I'm not being watched... might be that Courier?
Still, he would have come straight up rather than hiding. Instinct says it's someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在设立无线电监视穹顶和机器人的时候，我好像看到营地另一边的建筑里有道闪光（瞄准镜？）。
应该去查一下，确认我没有被监视着…是那个邮差吗？
不过，他应该会直接过来，而不会这样偷偷摸摸。直觉告诉我这是另一个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Entry - Day 4
ESP.TRADUIT: 日记 - 第4天

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Day 4, still continuing research... found way to deactivate collar after some failures, just a few headless ghouls. It's been hard to go fishing in the camp without one of them trying to run the gate and their heads exploding. Damn collars, twitchy.
...need to ration the Mentats, giving me migraines.
ESP.TRADUIT:
第四天，研究仍在继续…在几次失败之后找到了关闭项圈的方法，代价不过是几只无头尸鬼。在营地里根本没法静下心来研究，那些尸鬼一有机会就想往门外跑，然后把自己的头炸掉。该死的项圈，真他妈烦。
…曼他特得少吃点了，弄得我偏头痛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Entry - Day 3
ESP.TRADUIT: 日记 - 第3天

ESP.ORIGINAL: No sign of that Courier from before. He stays out of my way, I'll stay out of his. Been thinking about that "Sierra Madre" he mentioned... if he's right, I'd just need to find the casino radio frequency to track it down. Wouldn't need his help. If the working holograms and toxic gas are preserved there, might be easier to study them there with no robots to interfere. And those dispensers... might have use for those as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前从未听说过那个邮差。他不碍我的事，我也不会去管他。我一直在想他提到的那个“马德雷赌场”…如果他是对的，我只需要找到赌场的电台广播频率，然后顺藤摸瓜就行。不需要他的帮助。如果正常运转的全息影像和毒气仍被保存在那里，在那里研究它们可能更轻松，毕竟不用担心被机器人打扰。还有那些自动售货机…应该也能派上用场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Entry - Day 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 日记 - 第2天

ESP.ORIGINAL: 2nd day at Pre-War concentration camp. Kept China citizens here before war. Radiation turned them, had to keep them in camp with collars (explains why some of these "slave collars" exist, always wondered, some were clearly Pre-War tech). Researching the collar frequencies, touchy - circuit architecture is messy, de-constructing them taking time. Must be careful, can't be spotted by local robots, or insane brains from the Dome will try to haul me back there, then... research me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在战前集中营的第二天。在战前，一些中国公民被关在这里。辐射使他们变成尸鬼，不得不用项圈让他们待在营地内（这解释了“奴隶项圈”是怎么来的，我以前总想知道，显然使用了一些战前技术）。正在研究项圈的频率，很棘手，电路结构简直一团糟，拆解它们很费时。必须得小心，不能被周围的机器人发现，否则穹顶那些疯狂的大脑肯定会把我抓回去，然后…拿我做研究。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y-17 Trauma Harness Action Items
ESP.TRADUIT: Y-17防创束身服行为报告

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some issues still remain to be ironed out before the Y-17 Trauma Harness is ready for general production: calibrating the proper amount of injury to trigger the suit remains problematic. Still, the Little Yangtze subjects could hardly protest once inside the harness. If a home base is not designated, the suit enters an unpredictable wander state. And, as we discovered while calibrating injury levels, the suit's sensors are unable to recognize when the wearer is dead - luckily, autonomous corpse retrieval is nearly as useful as autonomous casualty recovery!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在Y-17防创束身服正式投入生产前，一些问题尚待解决：受伤到何种程度开始激活服装的功能才是恰当的呢？而且，长江集中营的受试者在束身服功能被激活后，便几乎失去了自主行动能力。如果不指定基地位置，束身服还会进入无法预知的游荡状态。此外，在校准功能激活的受伤阈值时，我们还发现，束身服的传感器无法识别穿戴者的死活。当然幸运的是，在战场上自动送回尸体和自动送回伤员类似，都能派上用场！

ESP.ORIGINAL: VR Simulation Note
ESP.TRADUIT: VR模拟测试笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL: With my dying breath, I write that I hate the VR Simulation so much! It has killed us. Now, I will kill it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 濒死之际，我要写下对VR模拟设施的憎恨！它杀了我们这么多人。现在，和我一起下地狱吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sink Project: Central Intelligence Unit
ESP.TRADUIT: “汇聚节点”计划：中央智能单元

ESP.ORIGINAL: This holotape contains the functionality profile for the Sink robotic assistant: "Central Intelligence Unit."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这盘全息磁带记录着汇聚节点机械助手"中央智能单元"的功能文件

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little Yangtze Log #03
ESP.TRADUIT: 长江集中营日志＃03

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another escape attempt last night. We rounded them all up and processed the escapees, but these little bastards are determined. We've got triple shifts on the camp around the clock, and the extra hours are eating up morale. Commandant says he's put in a requisition to use the camp as a field test for the new "total pacification collars" the scientists have been working on. Maybe then I can get some goddamn sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 昨晚又一次试图逃跑。我们包围了他们并处理了逃犯。但这些小混蛋依然如故。我们在营地实行三班轮换制，24小时不停地监视他们。如此的加班加点正在消磨士气。长官说，他正在申请让科学家在集中营里试验新的“完全安抚项圈”。也许到那时，我就可以他妈的好好睡一觉了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little Yangtze Log #02
ESP.TRADUIT: 长江集中营日志＃02

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the prisoners who speaks a little English - I guess he's become the unofficial spokesman - came to the commandant's office today screaming about hungry ghosts snatching his people up in the night. The commandant told him to give up the ignorant superstitions of a bygone era and had him thrown in the cooler for three weeks. Me, I've seen some of the new robots they're developing here, and I gotta wonder where they get the brains from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 囚犯中有个会讲一点英语的人，我想是他们的代表吧。他今天来到长官的办公室，惊魂未定地说夜里有饿鬼把他们的人抓走了。长官告诉他，不要再相信那些无知的迷信东西，然后把他扔进冷冻库关了三个星期。至于我，我看见过最近在这研发的新式机器人，你说它们的大脑是从哪来的呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little Yangtze Log #01
ESP.TRADUIT: 长江集中营日志＃01

ESP.ORIGINAL: The government shipped in the first batch of dissidents today. Three whole trainloads of Communist infiltrators. Half of them don't even speak English, so we had to show them where to go with our nightsticks. They got the point eventually. The docs are already talking about "research subjects." Guess that'll help advance the war effort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 政府今天运来了第一批异见分子。整整三火车的共产党间谍。他们中一半人甚至不会说英语，所以我们不得不用夜光棒指示他们该去哪里。他们最终理解了我们的意思。那些博士们已经在谈论“实验体”了。我猜这对战争会很有帮助的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y-17 Trauma Harness Testing Results
ESP.TRADUIT: Y-17防创束身服试验结果

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The Y-17 Trauma Harness has succeeded beyond our wildest expectations! The test harnesses were able to take over the motor functions of an injured subject and "walk" them back to home base.
We'll have to see what develops once it's recorded enough neuro-auto-muscular movements to display a wider range of behaviors... to think, if they could be programmed to replicate a wearer's shooting or fighting reflexes, we'd have something truly amazing for the war effort!
ESP.TRADUIT:
Y-17防创束身服的成功远超我们的预期！测试的束身服能够接管负伤受试者的运动机能，并且让他们“走”回基地。
在它记录了足够多的自动化神经-肌肉移动数据，能够执行更多的动作以后，我们打算再看看它会发展成什么样。试想，假如它们经过编程后，可以复制穿戴者的射击或战斗反应动作，我们就能为战争做出惊人的贡献！

ESP.ORIGINAL: K9000 Cyberdog Gun Sealed in X-12
ESP.TRADUIT: K9000赛博犬机枪被锁在了X-12

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We've had another unfortunate occurrence. While attempting to destroy Mr. Harris's Trauma Harness, the disaster control team member carrying the gun slipped and fell, dropping the weapon. Unarmed, the team had to flee and seal off the lab. Unfortunately, your K9000 Cyberdog Gun Prototype was sealed inside X-12.
-Barb
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们又遇到了一件不幸的事情。在试图破坏哈里斯先生的防创束身服时，灾难控制小组不小心滑倒，武器掉在了地上。由于他们手无寸铁，所以不得不逃离并封锁了实验室。非常不幸，你们的K9000赛博犬机枪也被锁在了X-12实验室里。
——巴尔布

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assistance Granted
ESP.TRADUIT: 已给予援助

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'm sending over the K9000 Cyberdog Gun. It should do the trick. Let me know if you have any operational questions.
-Adam
ESP.TRADUIT:
我正在把K9000赛博犬机枪送过去。这东西应该能帮到你们。如果在操作上有什么疑问，请和我说。
——亚当

ESP.ORIGINAL: Requisition Order: Holograms
ESP.TRADUIT: 请购单：全息影像

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it wasn't for Sinclair's request, this hologram project would've been canned long ago. In addition to the dispenser tech he wants for the Sierra Madre, he spoke to the Big MT execs about using the holograms for defense (?), that's something N.E. would have to sign off on; I can't even imagine the cost to turn the holograms into something beyond walking cameras and greeters. And why would you? It's only been a little while, and I already hate spending my time with these ghosts walking around the plant. Rather see the research money spent on actually improving the field of view sensors or adding upgrades to the emitters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不是辛克莱的要求，这个全息影像项目早就被砍掉了。除了想要在马德雷使用自动售货技术，他还与大山脉的负责人交洽，希望能将全息影像用于安保（？）。这玩意连国家电力公司都要签字批准，我简直无法想象要投入多少资源，才能将全息影像用于移动摄像头和咨客以外的东西。而且有什么必要呢？只是来这一小段时间，我就已经厌恶把时间花在这些工厂里走来走去的幽灵上了。还不如将研究经费投入到更实际的项目上，像改进视觉传感器的视野，又或是给发射器升级。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vera Keyes: Hologram Progress Report
ESP.TRADUIT: 维拉·凯斯：全息影像工作进展报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Spending a lot of hours getting the Vera Keyes hologram looking right. I'm a physicist, not a sculptor - iterating on her facial features and her dress to match Sinclair's expectations... it's about enough to make me file a complaint. I don't get the sense Sinclair's doing this out of love or well, lust.
Somewhere along the line, he became cold about the whole matter, as if crafting the hologram "just right" was something he hated.
ESP.TRADUIT:
为了将薇拉·凯丝的全息影像打造得“恰到好处”，我已经花了大量时间。我是个物理学家，不是雕塑家。为了满足辛克莱的期望，我已经无数次修正了她的面部特征和服装…我都想提交书面申诉了。我不明白辛克莱这样做是出于爱欲还是…色欲。
不知从什么时候开始，他对整件事开始变得冷漠，就像将这个全息影像打造得“恰到好处”是件他憎恶的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Requisition Order: Dispensers
ESP.TRADUIT: 请购单：自动贩卖机

ESP.ORIGINAL: We finished up the design for the dispensers for the Sierra Madre villa as requested. That big-wig Sinclair went to the Big MT execs; he wanted emergency dispensers for his sheltered Villa in case war broke out and they needed to care for the survivors there. He's done everything he can to isolate the community and tighten security, now he just needs to guarantee a food supply and be able to ration out resources in the event of nuclear holocaust. I hear he even narrowed the streets so cars couldn't come inside town, let alone come up to the Villa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经如约完成了马德雷别墅区需要的自动贩卖机设计。那个大人物辛克莱找到大山脉的负责人，说他想要为他的避难所别墅区添置应急用的自动贩卖机，以备战争爆发时能照顾那里的幸存者。他已经做了能做的一切，将这个社区与世隔离，并加强安保。现在他只需要保障食物供应，在核战末日到来时能够配给资源。我听说他甚至缩窄了街道，让车辆无法进入镇内，就更不用说别墅区了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dispenser Funding Update
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动贩卖机资金更新

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got the funding from Sinclair. Near as I can tell, he's willing to not only bankrupt himself for these devices, he's struck a deal with the Big MT executives, letting the Villa become a lab for the supposedly-harmless prototype tech here. I've seen the Big MT execs do this with other isolated towns (Hopeville Meteorological research up north), and the whole process, it's not what I signed up for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经从辛克莱那里获得了赞助资金。据我所知，他不仅愿意为这些设备倾尽所有，而且还和大山脉的负责人达成了协议，让别墅区成为一个实验室，用来试验这里所谓无害的原型技术。这样的事我已经见过几次了，大山脉的负责人也对其它与世隔绝的城镇做过（比如在北边的黎明镇进行气象研究），后来的整个实验过程…我当初签字来这里不是为了干这些事的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sierra Madre: Test Case?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷赌场：一个试验案例？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard one of the execs mention that whether Sinclair knew it or not, the Sierra Madre would be a "test case" for the Auto-Doc and the Innovative Toxins research. Maybe they were joking, but even that kind of a joke sends a chill down my spine... if I got poisoned by one of those toxins, no way would I crawl inside one of the Y-17 Auto-Docs here if my life depended on it. The medical tech for those trauma suits alone makes me wish they'd erase their research - the suits do more thinking than the people inside them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到一位负责人提到说，不管辛克莱是否知情，马德雷赌场都会成为自动医生和新型毒素研究的“试验案例”。也许他们是在开玩笑，但即使这样的笑话也让我脊背发凉…就算我中了其中某一种毒素，我也绝不会爬进任何这里的任何一台Y-17自动医生，死也不会。单单那些防创服用到的医疗技术，就足以让我祈祷他们能停止研究了——服装甚至比穿着它的人更能自主思考。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Requisition Order: Chemical Suits
ESP.TRADUIT: 请购单：生化防护服

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got word today there was a chemical leak at the Sierra Madre, Sinclair was on the phone to ask for more help from the Think Tank Execs, so they're sending him the prototype chemical suits to protect the Villa workers. Looks like they're following up an experiment with another experiment? The whole process creeps me out, and the way they're monitoring the Sierra Madre Villa and examining the "results" - I don't think Sinclair even knows what he's really paid for. To be guineas like the Little Yangtze Chinese... maybe it'd be merciful if war did break out, put an end to this chain of horrors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天得到消息说，马德雷发生了化学品泄漏事故，辛克莱打电话给智库负责人寻求更多帮助。于是原型防化服被发送了过去，用来保护别墅区的工人。看上去他们好像正在一个实验之上做另一个实验？整个过程，他们监视马德雷和测试“结果”的方法，都让我毛骨悚然。我认为辛克莱甚至不知道他花钱买到的是什么。他们成了像长江集中营的中国人那样的试验品…这样说来也许战争真的爆发都是一种仁慈，可以为这一连串的恐怖画上句号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Main Computer Upgrade: K9000 Mod "Mentat Chow"
ESP.TRADUIT: 中央智能单元升级：K9000 配件“曼他特狗粮”

ESP.ORIGINAL: This holotape contains an upgrade file for the Sink robotic assistant: "Central Intelligence Unit."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这盘全息磁带记录着汇聚节点机械助手“中央智能单元”的升级文件

ESP.ORIGINAL: Main Computer Upgrade: LAER Mod "Prismatic Lens"
ESP.TRADUIT: 中央智能单元升级：激光脉冲步枪 配件“棱形透镜”

ESP.ORIGINAL: This holotape contains an upgrade file for the Sink robotic assistant: "Central Intelligence Unit."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这盘全息磁带记录着汇聚节点机械助手“中央智能单元”的升级文件

ESP.ORIGINAL: Main Computer Upgrade: LAER Mod "Auxiliary Recharger Chip"
ESP.TRADUIT: 中央智能单元升级：激光脉冲步枪 配件“辅助充电弹夹”

ESP.ORIGINAL: This holotape contains an upgrade file for the Sink robotic assistant: "Central Intelligence Unit."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这盘全息磁带记录着汇聚节点机械助手“中央智能单元”的升级文件

ESP.ORIGINAL: Main Computer Upgrade: K9000 Mod "Resla Roil"
ESP.TRADUIT: 中央智能单元升级：K9000 配件“特斯拉线圈”

ESP.ORIGINAL: This holotape contains an upgrade file for the Sink robotic assistant: "Central Intelligence Unit."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这盘全息磁带记录着汇聚节点机械助手“中央智能单元”的升级文件

ESP.ORIGINAL: Torn Journal Page
ESP.TRADUIT: 被撕下的日记页

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set up camp here after Yangtze attack. Too exposed here. Transmitter's vulnerable, hacked it, set up remote link so can access it any time. Need to find spot closer to north train tunnel with clear broadcast LOS to here. Canyons are too dangerous, can't go back to Yangtze - there is that weather station NW that drew that Courier here, but going there sounds like trouble. For now, going to scout the Waste Disposal site, then around the perimeter of that Securitron Plant, see if I can find a more defensible position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在长江集中营被袭后，我在这里建立营地。这里太暴露了。发射机很容易破解，我把它黑了，之后建立了远程连接，这样就可以随时访问它。要找到距离北部火车隧道更近的地方，在这里洛杉矶方向的广播信号还不够清晰。峡谷太危险，不能回长江集中营，那里西北边有个气象站，会吸引那个邮差过去，但是去那里听上去很麻烦。现在，准备去侦查废弃物处理平台，然后是电子保安工厂的四周，看看我能不能找到一个更易守难攻的位置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elijah's Watch Journal
ESP.TRADUIT: 以利亚观察点日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This camp's better than the one I set up on top of Signal Hills roof, clear broadcast line to its radio tower and good vantage point on North Tunnel. Set up a turret perimeter and transmitter, should be able to control the trains via remote to escape before any robots come. The broken Securitrons make a good defense line, apparently brains in center Dome can't control them like they do the others.
No sign of Courier - or that woman. Turns out I was right at the Yangtze Camp, I was being watched there, probably Brotherhood assassin out to "sentence" me. She got hers, though. After the robot attack, saw her get hauled away to the SE by medical robots... probably joined the Lobotomite ranks here, don't have to worry about her anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这里比我在信号山屋顶建立的营地要好，能收到清晰的电台信号，距离北部隧道的位置也很有利。在周边布置了炮塔和信号发射机。应该能赶在机器人到来前，远程操控火车逃离。那些损坏的电子保安形成了一条很好的防线，显然中央穹顶的大脑们无法像控制其它东西一样控制它们。
没见到邮差，也没见到那个女人。事实证明，看来我在长江集中营时的判断是正确的。我那时确实被监视了，也许是来“审判”我的兄弟会刺客。不过，她也得到了她的“审判”。机器人袭击后，看到她被医疗机器人拖往东南边…也许现在已经是无脑人的一员了。不必再管她了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: FW: RE: VR Test
ESP.TRADUIT: 转发：回复：VR测试

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The VR Sim is corrupted?! Dammit! Sounds like there's a bug in the software somewhere. I hope to God it doesn't screw with the suit's systems. I just got the firmware updated for Mori over the weekend. For now, let's just tell Calis we're having "power issues" and focus on the REPCONN tests until we get the suit ready for real-world tests.
-Kael p.s. Delete this message ASAP. I don't want Calis harassing me over this.
ESP.TRADUIT:
VR模拟设备坏掉了？！该死！听起来是软件的某个地方出了bug。祈祷上帝，这bug不会搞坏潜行服的系统，周末我才刚给莫里做了服装固件升级。我们还是告诉卡利斯这只是“电力问题”吧。现在要先专注于REPCONN测试，直到我们为在真实世界的服装测试做好准备。
——凯尔 附：尽快删除此信息。我不想卡利斯因为这事骚扰我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: VR Test Kudos
ESP.TRADUIT: VR测试太赞了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Kudos for the bean pod addition for the VR Sim. I like the Jack and the Beanstalk reference, buddy! I hope Calis doesn't throw a fit. Watch your back with that guy. He's always been more than a bit wound up about simple stuff. I had to move my Battle Brew setup over to X-12's storage room after he threw a prohibitionist fit about it to the Leads.
-Mori
ESP.TRADUIT:
给VR模拟设备加进去的豆荚真是太赞了。伙计，我喜欢你对“杰克与魔豆”故事的引用！希望卡利斯不会发火。小心那家伙，他总是为些鸡毛蒜皮的小事上纲上线。在他向领导提出要禁酒后，我不得不把我的“战啤”酿制装置搬去了X-12的储藏室里。
——莫里

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sonic Emitter Data
ESP.TRADUIT: 声波发射器数据

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Attached to this message is the data I collected regarding the EM Pulse Wave Module's effect on our force field emitters. I'm sending the prototype weapon your way for testing. Please forward this on to Ohlen as soon as you can determine how we might shield our emitters from this weapon's EMP effect.
-Dr. Calis
ESP.TRADUIT:
我收集了电磁脉冲波模块对力场发射器的影响的数据，数据在信末的附件里。我正把原型武器送到你那里测试。一旦你能确定如何保护力场发射器免收电磁脉冲波的影响，请转寄这封信给欧伦。
——卡利斯博士

ESP.ORIGINAL: Request for Assistance
ESP.TRADUIT: 请求援助

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We've had a small issue with one of our Y-17 Trauma Harnesses. Sadly, a member of the X-12 research team choked on a buffalo gourd seed and died while working late last night. For some reason his Y-17 Trauma Harness will not shutdown. In fact, it has begun malfunctioning and causing the late Mr. Harris to attack other employees. Do you have any prototypes you could lend us as a means to stop it?
-Barb
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们的其中一套Y-17防创束身服出了一点小问题。很不幸，在昨晚加班的时候，X-12的一个研究员被水牛葫芦种子给噎死了。但不知道为什么，防创束身服没法停下来。事实上，束身服已经开始出现故障，并导致死去的哈里斯先生攻击其他的员工。请问你们那有什么原型武器能借给我们，让我们把它停下来吗？
——巴尔布

ESP.ORIGINAL: X-8 Test 2 Sonic Emitter Note
ESP.TRADUIT: X-8测试2需知

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Sonic Emitter is required to complete this test. If you were not provided with a Sonic Emitter or have misplaced the one provided to you, please contact your Big MT host to receive one before entering the testing area. Addendum: Due to staffing cutbacks, a new Sonic Emitter can now be received at The Sink Central Intelligence Unit.
ESP.TRADUIT:
完成该测试需要携带声波发射器。如果你没有拿到，或者遗失了声波发射器，请在进入测试区前，联系大山脉组织人员领取。
附录：由于裁员，现可在“汇聚节点”中央智能单元处，获取新的声波发射器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient Log: Y-17.9
ESP.TRADUIT: 病人日志：Y - 17.9

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient Log: Y-17.5
ESP.TRADUIT: 病人日志：Y - 17.5

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient Log: Y-17.0
ESP.TRADUIT: 病人日志：Y - 17.0

ESP.ORIGINAL: Schematics - K9000 FIDO
ESP.TRADUIT: 武器图纸 - K9000 菲多机枪

ESP.ORIGINAL: Schematics for upgrading the K9000 Cyberdog Brain Gun with a particularly aggressive and loyal cybernetic dog brain in a feisty red biogel suspension.
ESP.TRADUIT: 升级K9000赛博犬机枪的图纸。升级材料为一个泡在红色生物凝胶中，好斗而忠诚的赛博犬脑子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Per instructions from the higher ups after that *one* time the Giant Robo-Scorpion's attack routine malfunctioned, we've installed an emergency shutdown procedure. Let's hope we never have to use it - the prototype's systems will all be fried, and we won't be up and running again for weeks. The military's expecting delivery of a battle-ready model within six months, and the project has already had enough delays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据上级指示，在*那次*机械巨蝎的攻击程序失灵后，我们就安装了一个紧急停机程序。希望我们永远不必使用它，因为使用后原型机的系统将全部被烧毁，此后数周时间都无法再次启动和运行。军方本期望在6个月内交付一个可用于战斗的型号，而这个项目已经延期够长时间了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The new atomic laser is putting an incredible strain on the Giant Robo-Scorpion's generator - damn thing shut down right in the middle of weapons testing last week.
I pushed for reducing the laser's output by 25%, instead they slapped a backup generator onto the Scorpion. Dangerous, if you ask me. The systems weren't designed to handle the power from two systems at once, and if some rookie tech fires up the backup generator too early, well...
ESP.TRADUIT:
新的原子激光竟然会对机械巨蝎的发电机产生难以置信的负荷。真该死，难怪这玩意在上星期的武器测试途中宕机了。
我强烈建议将激光的输出功率降低25%，但他们却给这蝎子安装了一个备用发电机。要我说的话，这种做法很危险。巨蝎的系统在设计时就没考虑过要处理两个系统的电力，假如某个菜鸟过早了启动备用发电机，好吧…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hazmat Pod Security Code
ESP.TRADUIT: 防化服力场安全码

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unlock Code: 646F6E7470616E6963
Test Area A - Review
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试区域A - 回顾

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chayanov had me run through the first part of the facility to test the tripwires and proximity mines the other day and the suit kept chafing. Mori says some new firmware updates fixed the suit's fitment sync ability, but I'm not so sure. The legs kept binding up on me and the torso was ridiculously tight. Maybe I should stop lifting Fancy Lads from Slough's stashes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一天恰亚诺夫让我穿过测试设施的第一部分，以便测试激光绊线和感应地雷，但服装很紧，摩擦得我身体生疼。莫里说新的固件更新已经修复了服装躯干配件的同步功能，但我不太确定有没有效果。腿部部分一直紧紧捆在我身上，躯干部分也紧得离谱。也许我不该再从斯劳的秘密基地里拿这么多俏男孩夹心蛋糕了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Auto-Doc Upgrade: Cosmetic Enhancements
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动医生升级：整容功能增强

ESP.ORIGINAL: This holotape contains an upgrade file for the Sink robotic assistant: "Auto-Doc."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这盘全息磁带记录着汇聚节点机械助手"自动医生"的升级文件

ESP.ORIGINAL: Independent Research
ESP.TRADUIT: 个人研究

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been watching Mendoza stumble through the various X-13 tests and noticed a critical flaw in the tripwire emitter design. A skilled scientist or someone with advanced electronics repair knowledge could crack the casings and hack their IFF circuit to ignore the current test subject. I'll see if I can reinforce the casings after the leads visit the facility this week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在看着门多萨踉踉跄跄地通过各项X-13测试。期间我注意到，激光绊线发射器设计的一个巨大缺陷。有经验的科学家，或是有丰富电器维修知识的人，都可以破开发射器的外壳，并黑掉其敌我识别系统的电路，这样绊线就会无视当前的试验对象。这周领导视察设施之后，我会看看能否加固外壳。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mk II Boot Research
ESP.TRADUIT: Mk II 靴子研究

ESP.ORIGINAL: Researcher Kael's breakthrough with the Suit's software has led me to a breakthrough of my own. By adding an advanced servo buffer to the existing leg rigs, I've been able to increase the resolution of data sent to and from the central control module. Once these babies are hooked up to the torso, an agent should be able to limbo under barriers almost as fast as they can run!
ESP.TRADUIT: 研究员凯尔在服装软件上的突破性成果，使我这边也有了突破。在现有的腿部配件上增加一个先进的伺服缓冲器，我就能够提高进出中央控制模块的数据的分辨率。一旦这些宝贝被连接到躯干部分，特工就能够轻松地以全力冲刺的速度越过各种障碍物！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mk II Glove Research
ESP.TRADUIT: Mk II 手套研究

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been working with Mori on fitting the gloves to the torso and come up with a few improvements which should greatly enhance the user's manual dexterity. I adapted Redding's new rubberized dampening compound and applied it to the palms and other high-wear surfaces. Once the suit adjusts to the user, the benefits of these upgrades should be obvious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在与莫里合作，想办法将手套和安装在躯干部分上。我们还想出一些改进措施，这将大大提高使用者手部的灵活性。我还调整了雷丁的新型橡胶阻尼化合物，并将其应用于手掌和其它易磨损表面。在潜行服经过调整，适应了使用者以后，这些升级的好处就会很明显了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mk II Torso Research
ESP.TRADUIT: Mk II 躯干部分研究

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've uploaded Kael's latest firmware update to the suit. I think Kael has outdone herself this time. Self-updating firmware is an ingenious addition to this system. As we upgrade the suit, it'll automatically adapt the new systems to the user's specifications during testing and unlock the features as they come online. This will save hundreds of hours of fiddling with settings.
Note to self - Make Kael a keg of my infamous 'Battle Brew.'
ESP.TRADUIT:
我已经把凯尔最新研发的升级固件整合到服装上了。我想凯尔这次超越了她自己。能自动升级的固件是对这个系统的巧妙补充。随着我们升级这件服装，固件会在测试过程中根据用户的特性，自动适应新系统，并解锁新上线的功能。我们不再需要花上百个小时，去亲自摆弄设置。
提醒自己：给凯尔来一桶我臭名远扬的“战啤”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell...?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么鬼…？！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
What the hell is his damn problem?! All I was doing was reading the latest issue of La Fantoma!, and that grouch, Calis, called me an asshat. What the hell is an asshat, anyway? Funny, ha ha, my last name is Butz. That got old in grade school, the snobby bastard. Sorry, just needed to vent.
-Butz
ESP.TRADUIT:
他妈的，他是不是有病啊？！我只不过是在看最新一期的《夜魔侠！》，然后那个整天黑着一张脸的卡利斯，就骂我屁股长脑袋上。什么叫屁股长脑袋上啊？呵呵真有趣，因为我姓巴茨（Butz）是吧？那个上小学都留级的弱智，那个势利的混蛋！对不起，我只是发泄一下。
——巴茨 译注：屁股（butt）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get off your butt, Butz!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶紧给我干活，巴茨！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This is the last time I'm going to warn you, Butz. I can see that comic book poking up out of your field manual. You don't fool me, asshat. Next time I catch you slacking, I'm writing a disciplinary notice and you can spend your free time polishing emitter arrays.
-Dr. Calis
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是我最后一次警告你了，巴茨。我看见你挡在现场安全作业手册后面的漫画书了。你个屁股长脑袋上的蠢货，你糊弄不了我！下次再让我发现你划水，我就对你作通报批评，以后你就滚去一边抛光发射器阵列，一边打发你的空闲时间吧！
——卡利斯博士

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check out this mod I've been working on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来试试我做的这个武器改装模块吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey buddy! I've been helping the guys over in X-8 test out this new toy they've been building. Get this, it's a gun that uses a dog's brain to track targets! They asked me to play around with their gun trigger code, and I came up with this mod. Next time you're over there, would you give it a shot? Calis has me swamped setting X-13 up for the coming visit by the leads and he wants the turrets in place so we don't fail the new security requirements.
Thanks!
ESP.TRADUIT:
嗨伙计！我一直在帮X-8的家伙测试他们制造的新玩具。知道吗，这是一把用狗的大脑来追踪目标的枪！他们让我看看这把枪的激发代码，于是我就弄出了这个改进模组。下次你过来的时候，来试射一下试试吧？为了应对即将到来的领导视察，在卡利斯的催促下，最近我们在忙着布置X-13。卡利斯希望炮塔能就位，好满足新下来的安全要求。
谢啦！

ESP.ORIGINAL: RE: X-13 Shipment Notice
ESP.TRADUIT: 回复：X-13发货通知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Everything is under control down here. If I need your assistance, I'll let you know. Paris will be along shortly to retrieve the shipment.
-Dr. Calis
ESP.TRADUIT:
这里的一切都在控制之中。如果需要你的协助，我会通知你的。帕里斯很快会来取货。
——卡利斯博士

ESP.ORIGINAL: X-13 Shipment Notice
ESP.TRADUIT: X-13发货通知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your shipment of cattle prods arrived today. I'd like to remind you our systems are designed to prevent infiltration by enemy agents, not internal threats. If you're doing any testing on creatures, please forward that task to the animal testing facility. As you found with the Sonic Emitter, our force fields can't handle power fluctuations well.
-Cpt. Hamm Base Security
ESP.TRADUIT:
你们要的赶畜棒今天送到了。我想提醒你，我们的系统是被设计用来防止敌对势力间谍的渗透的，而不是处理内部威胁。不论你想对那些生物做何种实验，请把任务转交到专门的动物实验部门。正如你在声波发射器上的发现，我们的力场护盾无法很好地处理能量波动。
——哈姆上尉 基地安保部门

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suggestion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 建议

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've noticed your work has taken a dive lately. This seems to have coincided with a marked weight gain over the past few months. I've developed an implant which has been proven to increase performance while reducing weight in lab animals. Granted, we haven't run it through any human test trials yet, but I'm sure it is perfectly safe. Also, please refrain from snacking in the lab. If you smudge another camera, I'm banning all food from the facility.
-Dr. Calis
ESP.TRADUIT:
我注意到你最近的工作效率一直在下降，而巧合的是你的体重在这几个月里一直上升。最近我开发了一个以体重换效率的植入体，它已经在实验动物身上证明有效。当然，我还没有在人体上进行试验，但我保证会很安全的。另外，请不要在实验室吃零食。如果你油腻的猪手再弄脏一台摄像机的话，我就要禁止任何食物被带进设施内。
——卡利斯博士

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test Subject Observations
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试对象的观察记录

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've noticed some of the creatures have been increasingly aggressive when I come into the lab in the morning. Did something change in their diet? I'll run some tests if you like.
-Asst. Paris
ESP.TRADUIT:
今天早上进入实验室的时候，我发现部分生物的攻击性越来越强了。难道它们的食物配方有什么变化？如果你允许，我打算做些测试。
——帕里斯助理

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test Subject Observations
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试对象的观察记录

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I went ahead and did the lab test and noticed no appreciable changes in their blood work. I'm concerned our use of the cattle prods may react with the chemistry of the injections. This is new ground we're treading. I'd hate to see your hard work lost to a change in brain chemistry. These critters could be invaluable to the war effort if we can somehow control their behavior.
-Asst. Paris
ESP.TRADUIT:
我继续实验，并发现它们的血样没有明显的变化。我担心我们使用的赶畜棒可能和注射剂的化学成分发生了反应。这是我们涉足的全新领域。我不希望看到你的辛苦工作因为些大脑化学反应而付诸东流。如果我们能控制这些生物的行为，那么它们对战争的意义将会是不可估量的。
——帕里斯助理

ESP.ORIGINAL: RE: RE: RE: Test Subject Observations
ESP.TRADUIT: 回复：回复：回复：测试对象的观察记录

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Why the hell do you keep sending me these messages? You work right across the damn ramp from me. Walk your ass over here and say what you need to say. Stop wasting my time with these incessant messages!
-Dr. Calis
ESP.TRADUIT:
你他妈不停给我发这么多信息做什么？你的工位就在我对面的坡道上，所以你为什么不把你那该死的屁股抬起来，走到我面前，然后和我说你要说的。不要再没完没了地发信息浪费我的时间了！
——卡利斯博士

ESP.ORIGINAL: Independent Research
ESP.TRADUIT: 个人研究

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Slough is busy stuffing his face and trying to find new places to hide his junk food from Calis, I've decided to experiment with a mod from one of the techs over in X-8. I may not have been able to afford a doctorate like those eggheads upstairs, but I've been programming since I was in diapers. I found a ton of redundancies and exponential loop failures those halfwits must have missed. My fixes should speed up the refire rate of that K9 weapon they've been working on. Maybe if I leave it on one of their desks it'll actually get implemented. Lord knows they wouldn't take me seriously if I tried to take credit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斯劳还在忙着往嘴巴里塞满零食，并试图找到新的秘密基地来藏垃圾食品，以免让卡利斯发现。我则决定做个实验，看能不能给X-8的一项技术成果做些改进。我可能没办法像楼上那群书呆子一样弄到博士学位，但我从刚会尿尿的时候就已经开始编程了。我发现了成吨的冗余和指数循环错误，那些半吊子一定看漏了。对于那把他们一直在做的K9武器，我的改进应该能加快枪的再开火速度。也许只要我把改进方案放在他们的办公桌上，它就会真正得到实施。主才知道，如果我想邀功，他们会不会认真考虑我的贡献。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test Subject Observations
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试对象的观察记录

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Yes, yes. Run the tests, if it'll keep you out of my way. I'm going back down to the cages to see if a nudge from a prod will trigger their abilities. The other project leads will be stopping by in a few days and we must be able to show them progress!
-Dr. Calis
ESP.TRADUIT:
好，是的，进行测试吧，如果这能让你别来打扰我的话。我要回到笼子那里去，看看拿棒子戳一下能否激发它们的能力。其它项目的负责人这几天会来访，我们必须要让他们看到我们的进展！
——卡利斯博士

ESP.ORIGINAL: Data Retrieval
ESP.TRADUIT: 数据回收

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For this test, you must use any means necessary to retrieve three student files from an average high school. Utilize the Field Disrupter Capacitance Module for the Sonic Emitter to better navigate the area. Protectrons and basic security protocols have been activated.
Success - Retrieve three student files.
Failure - Security measures prohibit you from retrieving the files.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在这次测试中，你必须尽你所能，从一所普通高中里，取回三份学生文件。使用声波发射器的力场干扰电容模块，可以更好地探索该区域。保卫者机器人和基础安保协议已启动。
成功：取回3份学生文件。
失败：安保系统阻止你回收文件。
