ESP.ORIGINAL: Nightstalker DNA Manipulation
ESP.TRADUIT: 夜行兽的DNA改造

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe this latest serum has proven to be a success. Under human observation, the creatures remain visible, but some of the nighttime recordings reveal the serum is working. The animals appear to be learning how to use their new cloaking ability when no one is around. Perhaps there is a physical limitation or some mental drawback to the ability, which prevents its usage under duress. I think I will pursue stress testing of the animals first thing Monday morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信这种最新的血清已经证明能管用了。在人眼观测中，这些动物仍然可见。但一些夜间记录显示，血清正在发挥作用。当四周没有人的时候，这些动物似乎正在学习如何使用它们全新的隐身能力。或许是生理上的限制，亦或是精神上的缺陷，让它们在监禁时无法使用能力。我打算在周一早上对这些动物做个压力测试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shipping Department in Lockdown
ESP.TRADUIT: 运输部门已封锁

ESP.ORIGINAL:
In our last supervisor meeting, we discussed the possible benefits of the small shipping accident. We are considering studying the unexpected specimen's behavior by releasing them into our test area before removing them from the X-8 facility. The shipping department will remain in lockdown until a decision has been reached.
Dr. Adam Figgis, MD PhD DVM DDM DD, Test Supervisor
ESP.TRADUIT:
在上次主管会议上，我们讨论了那次小小的货运事故可能带来的好处。我们正考虑研究这些意外样本的行为，打算在消灭它们之前，把这些生物释放到我们的测试区域。在作出决定前，运输部门将继续处于封锁状态。
亚当·菲吉斯博士，医学博士、哲学博士、兽医学博士、牙医学博士、神学博士（DD），测试主管

ESP.ORIGINAL: Emergency Shutdown Terminal Password
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧急停机终端密码

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Einstein-3.14
It'll take weeks to get the prototype functional if we ever have to initiate the emergency shutdown procedure, but it's better than destroying the thing outright (at least until we get the 17 other prototypes we've requested).
ESP.TRADUIT:
爱因斯坦-3.14
如果我们不得不使用紧急停机程序，就得花几个星期来让原型机恢复运转。但这总比彻底摧毁它要强（至少在我们得到要求的其他17台原型机之前）。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basic Infiltration
ESP.TRADUIT: 初级潜入测试的规则

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For this test, you must steal a document in the Administrator's office without being detected by the patrolling robots. A successful run will award an item in the Supply Cabinet.
Success - Reach the Administrator's office and steal the document, without being detected.
Failure - Detection.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在测试中，你必须在不被巡逻机器人发现的情况下，潜入管理员办公室偷取一份文件。测试成功后，可在补给柜中获取一件奖品。
成功条件：在不被发现的情况下，到达管理员办公室偷到文件。
失败条件：被发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Advanced Infiltration
ESP.TRADUIT: 高级潜入测试的规则

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For this test, you must sneak to, and steal, a document in the Administrator's office without being detected by the patrolling robots. Laser tripwires have been added for increased difficulty. A successful run will award an item in the Supply Cabinet.
Success - Reach the Administrator's office and steal the document, without being detected.
Failure - Detection.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在测试中，你必须在不被巡逻机器人发现的情况下，潜入管理员办公室偷取一份文件。为提高难度，已激活激光绊线。测试成功后，可在补给柜中获取一件奖品。
成功条件：在不被发现的情况下，到达管理员办公室偷到文件。
失败条件：被发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Expert Infiltration
ESP.TRADUIT: 专家级潜入测试的规则

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For this test, you must steal a document in the Administrator's office without being detected by the patrolling robots. Laser tripwires and proximity detectors have been activated for increased difficulty. A successful run will award an item in the Supply Cabinet.
Success - Reach the Administrator's office and steal the document, without being detected.
Failure - Detection.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在测试中，你必须在不被巡逻机器人发现的情况下，潜入管理员办公室偷取一份文件。为提高难度，已激活激光绊线和距离探测器。测试成功后，可在补给柜中获取一件奖品。
成功条件：在不被发现的情况下，到达管理员办公室偷到文件。
失败条件：被发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robot Compliance
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人适应性测试的规则

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For this test, you must disable all active robots without being detected. All security measures are active. A successful run will award an item in the Supply Cabinet.
Success - Disable all robots without being detected.
Failure - Detection.
ESP.TRADUIT:
要完成这个测试，你必须关闭所有正在活动的机器人，且不被发现。所有的安保措施都已开启。成功完成测试后，可在补给柜中获得一件奖品。
成功条件：关闭所有机器人且不被发现。
失败条件：被发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
WARNING: Maximizing power output at this stage can potentially damage or destroy the prototype.
Are you sure you wish to proceed?
ESP.TRADUIT:
警 告：如果在此时输出最大电力功率，可能会损伤，甚至毁坏原型机。
你确定要继续吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Advanced Infiltration
ESP.TRADUIT: 高级潜入测试的规则

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For this test, you must sneak to, and steal, a document from the Administrator's office without being detected by the patrolling robots. Laser tripwires have been added for increased difficulty. A successful run will automatically update the suit's software and award an item in the Supply Cabinet.
Success - Reach the Administrator's office and steal the document, without being detected.
Failure - Detection.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在测试中，你必须在不被巡逻机器人发现的情况下，潜入管理员办公室偷取一份文件。为提高难度，已激活激光绊线。测试成功后，将自动升级潜行服的软件，并可在补给柜中获取一件奖品。
成功条件：在不被发现的情况下，到达管理员办公室偷到文件。
失败条件：被发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Expert Infiltration
ESP.TRADUIT: 专家级潜入测试的规则

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For this test, you must steal a document in the Administrator's office without being detected by the patrolling robots. Laser tripwires and proximity detectors have been activated for increased difficulty. A successful run will automatically update the suit's software and award an item in the Supply Cabinet.
Success - Reach the Administrator's office and steal the document, without being detected.
Failure - Detection.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在测试中，你必须在不被巡逻机器人发现的情况下，潜入管理员办公室偷取一份文件。为提高难度，已激活激光绊线和距离探测器。测试成功后，将自动升级潜行服的软件，并可在补给柜中获取一件奖品。
成功条件：在不被发现的情况下，到达管理员办公室偷到文件。
失败条件：被发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Target Drone Effectiveness
ESP.TRADUIT: 靶机有效性

ESP.ORIGINAL: The constant improvements to the Giant Robo-Scorpion has rendered the Protectron models we've been using as "hostile Communist forces" largely ineffective. At this stage, they're little more than distractions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着机械巨蝎的不断改进，这些用来充当“敌对共产势力军队”的保卫者机器人靶机强度过低，已经不具备测试有效性。在当前试验阶段，它们除了分散分散机械巨蝎注意力外，没有任何用处。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Giant Robo-Scorpion Test Log
ESP.TRADUIT: 机械巨蝎测试日志

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The Saturnite armor plating on the Giant Robo-Scorpion has exceeded expectations - mostly. While it's virtually impervious to small arms fire, the Sonic Emitter that Parsons brought in managed to fry several of the prototype's subsystems. We'll have to look into improved EMP shielding for the next prototype.
On a more positive note, the prototype's new atomic laser is performing admirably. Some residual radiation is left behind after the weapon discharges, it may be necessary to requisition more radiation suits and meds as a precaution.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在多数情况下，机械巨蝎身上的土星合金装甲已经超出预期。虽然小型武器的射击几乎对它无效，但帕森斯带来的声波发射器仍然烧坏了原型机的几个子系统。我们将考虑为下一代原型机提升电磁脉冲防护。
好消息是，原型机的新原子激光表现极为出色。但武器发射后会残留一些辐射，也许我们得准备更多的防辐射服和辐特灵作为预防措施。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No Suit Detected!
ESP.TRADUIT: 未检测到潜行服！

ESP.ORIGINAL: To activate this terminal, please equip the Stealth Suit Mk II.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要启动这个终端，请装备潜行服Mk II。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Project: Burke and Project: Hare - PLEASE READ
ESP.TRADUIT: “伯克”计划和“野兔”计划——请阅读

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Yes, Project: Burke involves what some less science-minded individuals might call "grave robbing." Yes, we're forced into this due to budget cuts. No, none of senior staff uses the bodies for anything else. Finally, in regards to the rumor that Project: Hare engages in liquidation operations against non-military targets to procure research subjects, I will not dignify them with a response. Any other questions?
Dr. Adam Figgis, MD PhD DVM DDM DD, Test Supervisor
ESP.TRADUIT:
是的，“伯克”计划确实会被一些不懂科学的人称为“掘墓”。对，由于预算削减，我们不得不这样做。不，没有一个高级职员会将尸体用于其它用途。最后，关于传言说“野兔”计划涉及捕获非军事目标用作研究对象，对此我无可奉告。还有别的问题吗？
亚当·菲吉斯博士，医学博士、哲学博士、兽医学博士、牙医学博士、神学博士（DD），测试主管 译注：冠以“DD”之名的神学博士头衔是荣誉性质，通常由教会授予卓越的神职人员。可见亚当博士原本还是位虔诚的基督徒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Field Gun Prototype on Loan
ESP.TRADUIT: 借调力场枪原型

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The X-13 Facility has loaned us their EM Pulse Wave Module prototype for the Sonic Emitter for use in our Data Retrieval Test simulations. The Module allows the Sonic Emitter to disable certain force fields. DO NOT allow test subjects to leave the X-8 facility with this Module! Even though it won't work outside Big MT, it's a security nightmare. Thank you all for your attention in this matter.
Dr. Adam Figgis, MD PhD DVM DDM DD, Test Supervisor
ESP.TRADUIT:
X-13研究所已经把声波发射器的电磁脉冲波模块原型借予我方。模块将用于数据回收测试模拟。该模块可以让声波发射器关闭特定力场。注意，请勿让受试者将这个模块带离X-8研究设施！尽管这个模块没法在大山脉外起作用，但它仍然是这里安保系统的噩梦。感谢诸位对此事件的关注。
亚当·菲吉斯博士，医学博士、哲学博士、兽医学博士、牙医学博士、神学博士（DD），测试主管

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shipping Department in Lockdown
ESP.TRADUIT: 运输部门已封锁

ESP.ORIGINAL:
In light of the large number of fatalities due to the latest shipment of experimental test subjects, the shipping department is going into lockdown. I give you my personal assurance that as soon as this plague of monsters has been dealt with, I will work overtime to get your deliveries to you in a timely and efficient manner. As I am currently the only surviving member of the shipping department, however, there may still be some delays. Until then, Dr. Calis in X-13 has the passcard for the area.
Skippy, Sole Survivor
ESP.TRADUIT:
鉴于最近一批实验测试对象造成的大量死亡，运输部门将被封锁。我向你们保证，一旦这批怪物造成的灾难得到解决，我一定加班加点，把你们要的货物及时送到你们手中。然而，由于我是目前运输部门唯一的幸存成员，到时可能仍会有些延误。在问题解决前，X-13的卡利斯博士拥有该地区的通行证。
斯基比，唯一的幸存者

ESP.ORIGINAL: Re: Please Advise
ESP.TRADUIT: 回复：请告知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
So, at Dr. Richardson's request, we opened one of those kennels from our latest shipment. The "dog" inside (and I use that term very loosely) appeared to be suffering from a truly horrendous case of mange, and upon being released it immediately attacked, killed, and attempted to swallow whole Specialist Akers. Luckily, the situation has, for now at least, contained itself, as SPC Akers was a very large man and the creature has choked to death.
Does anyone know anything about this shipment? Please Advise.
ESP.TRADUIT:
好吧，应理查森博士的要求，我们打开了最近那批货物中的一个笼子。里面的“狗”（宽泛意义上的），好像一直在忍受可怕的狗藓折磨。一被释放，它马上攻击、杀死了阿克斯专科医生，还试图把他整个吞进肚子里。幸运的是，至少目前情况已经得到控制，由于阿克斯医生体型庞大，这个生物已经被噎死了。
有任何人知道这批货物的情况吗？请告知我们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: X-8 Test Subject Information
ESP.TRADUIT: X-8受试对象需知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
In this test, YOU will take on the role of one of those evil Commies, infiltrating an institution of HONEST AMERICAN LEARNING. (Don't worry, Citizen, it's just for pretend!) Your objective is to steal documents that a REAL dirty Commie traitor (which you're not) could use to BRAINWASH OUR CHILDREN (which you wouldn't do). This test will help us to protect our children's fragile minds from the agents of INTERNATIONAL COMMUNISM! Agents like YOU!
Just kidding! We know you're a loyal American! AREN'T YOU?
ESP.TRADUIT:
在这次测试中，你将扮演一个邪恶的共产党人，渗透进入一个诚实的美国学习机构（不要慌，公民。只是假装）。你的目标是窃取一份文件，真正的共党叛徒（当然不是你）会用它对我们的孩子洗脑（你不会这么做）。这项测试将帮助我们保护孩子们的脆弱思想不受国际共产主义间谍的侵害。比如说你这样的间谍！！
开个玩笑！我们知道你是忠诚的美国公民！不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please Advise
ESP.TRADUIT: 请告知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dr. Richardson,
We've just received the latest shipment of dogs for the Cyberdog experiment process, but... well, frankly, I think our supplier screwed us. The animals must be basically feral - every time we get close to the shipping kennels they let out with the most Godawful hissing and... well, rattling is the only way I can describe it. Please advise - should we open the kennels or just send them back?
ESP.TRADUIT:
理查森博士，
我们刚刚收到最新一批用于赛博犬实验的狗，但…老实说，我想供货商在耍我们。这些动物大多都很凶猛，我每次靠近运输笼，它们都会发出可怕的嘶嘶声…嗯，尖啸声。请告知我，我们应该打开笼子还是把它们送回去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Residential Cyberdog Test Off-Limits!
ESP.TRADUIT: 禁止进入住宅区赛博犬测试区域！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Until further notice, please do not enter the Residential Cyberdog Test area, or conduct any experiments using it. The Cyberdogs are still being programmed, and any disturbance could have dramatic influence on their progress. Restricting access in this fashion should also help to avoid any repeats of Incident: PLAYTIME, settlements for which are coming directly out of our budget.
Dr. Gail Richardson, PhD, Test Engineer, X-8 Cyberdog Project
ESP.TRADUIT:
在另行通知前，请不要进入住宅区赛博犬测试区域，也不要使用该区域做任何实验。赛博犬仍在编程中，任何干扰都可能对它们造成巨大影响。以这种方式限制访问，也可以避免类似“玩耍时间”的事故再次发生。处理那次事故已经使我们的预算超支。
盖尔·理查森博士，哲学博士，测试工程师，X-8赛博犬计划

ESP.ORIGINAL: X-8 Institutional Data Retrieval Test
ESP.TRADUIT: X-8学校区数据回收测试

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Subjects will be informed that we are gauging the effectiveness of Communist infiltration of American schools. They won't know about the Cyberdogs until they actually begin the testing process.
1) TEST A engages Cyberdog protection protocols alongside standard automated turret systems. 2) TEST B adds Protectrons to the previous test. TEST B also includes some basic tests for the Field Disrupter Capacitance Module.
ESP.TRADUIT:
受试者将被告知，我们正在评估共产党对美国学校的渗透程度。他们不会知道赛博犬的存在，直到他们真正开始测试。
1) 测试A：将赛博犬防卫协议和标准自动炮塔系统一起使用。 2) 测试B：在测试A的基础上加入保卫者机器人。测试B还包括对力场干扰电容模块的一些基本测试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bio-Mechanical Splicing Rules
ESP.TRADUIT: 生物-机械融合守则

ESP.ORIGINAL: 1) Due to recent government-mandated cutbacks to our funding, only THREE experiments may be performed per day. 2) We do not have infinite kennel space here in X-8! Only ONE Cyberdog beyond those needed for the testing process may be created. 3) Clear any and all debris from the platform before conducting any splicing experiments. 4) Experiments are NOT allowed outside the X-8 Facility. 5) Finally, Security must be disabled before experiments can be run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 1) 由于政府最近强制削减我们的资金，现在每天只能进行三次实验。 2) X-8设施里的犬舍空间有限！除了用作测试，只能制造一只赛博犬。 3) 在进行任何拼接实验之前，请先清除平台上的所有杂物。 4) 不允许在 X-8 设施外进行实验。 5) 最后一点，开始实验之前记得关闭安保系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cherie O' Bannon's After-School Schedule
ESP.TRADUIT: 切丽·奥班农的课后时间表

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Cherie O'Bannon's After-School Schedule
Ballet: Tuesday and Thursday 4:30 - 6:30 Pep Squad: Wednesday 4:15 - 5:15 Tutoring Center Volunteer: Monday 4:15 - 6:00
ESP.TRADUIT:
切丽·奥班农的课后时间表
芭蕾舞：周二到周四 4:30 - 6:30 啦啦队：周三 4:15 - 5:15 辅导中心志愿者：周一 4:15 - 6:00

ESP.ORIGINAL: Midterm Grade Report: Richie Marcus
ESP.TRADUIT: 期中考试成绩单：里奇·马库斯

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Midterm Grade Report: Richie "Ball-Lover" Marcus
English F- Math F- Science F-- History F-
ESP.TRADUIT:
期中考试成绩单：“爱球者”里奇·马库斯
英语 F- 数学 F- 科学 F-- 历史 F-

ESP.ORIGINAL: Betsy Bright's Disciplinary Record
ESP.TRADUIT: 贝琪.布莱特的违纪记录

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Betsy Bright's Disciplinary Record
Unexcused Absences 7 Disruptive Behavior 3 Smoking on School Property 11
ESP.TRADUIT:
贝琪.布莱特的违纪记录
无故缺席 7 扰乱学校秩序 3 在学校里吸烟 11

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sonic Emitter Notice
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于声波发射器的通知

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We've successfully created a capacitance module capable of emitting a focused electromagnetic pulse from a Sonic Emitter. While the physical impact is rather weak, Jenkins fired the weapon at a force field and it fried the field's emitter array. Upon further study, we've found the gun only affects a small range of frequencies. Unfortunately, the frequency of our force fields fall within this range. The gun was sent to X-8 for further study.
-Dr. Calis
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们成功地制造出一个电容模块，它能使声波发射器发出集中的电磁脉冲。虽然物理上的冲击相当弱，但当詹金斯用它对着防护力场开火时，力场的发射器阵列被烧毁了。经过进一步研究，我们发现声波发射器只能影响一小段频率范围。不幸的是，我们力场的频率恰恰就在这个范围里。这把枪已被送往X-8作进一步研究。
——卡利斯博士

ESP.ORIGINAL:
While programming the new residential Cyberdog model to retrieve objects thrown by human beings for purpose of enjoyment, I accidentally used an audio sample recording of its bark as the object to be fetched. The Cyberdog has now become attached to the sample, and displayed signs of aggressive tendencies when I attempted to recover it. I have left it in the Residential Reconstruction Area until it is needed. I believe the Cyberdog has buried it.
Dr. Gail Richardson, PhD, Test Engineer, X-8 Cyberdog Project
ESP.TRADUIT:
我在给住宅区赛博犬编写新的程序模型，让它们能把人类出于娱乐扔出的物品叼回来。但在测试途中，我不小心把它吠叫的音频样本给扔了出去。那只赛博犬现在对音频样本非常依恋，在我试图取回样本时，它甚至表现出攻击倾向。我只好把样本留在住宅区的重建区域，等要用到它时再想办法取回来。我想赛博犬应该已经把它埋在地里了。
盖尔·理查森博士，哲学博士，测试工程师，X-8赛博犬计划

ESP.ORIGINAL: Basic Infiltration
ESP.TRADUIT: 初级潜入测试的规则

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For this test, you must steal a document in the Administrator's office without being detected by the patrolling robots. A successful run will automatically update the suit's software and award an item in the Supply Cabinet.
Success - Reach the Administrator's office and steal the document, without being detected.
Failure - Detection.
ESP.TRADUIT:
在测试中，你必须在不被巡逻机器人发现的情况下，潜入管理员办公室偷取一份文件。测试成功后，将自动升级潜行服的软件，并可在补给柜中获取一件奖品。
成功条件：在不被发现的情况下，到达管理员办公室偷到文件。
失败条件：被发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robot Compliance
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人适应性测试的规则

ESP.ORIGINAL:
For this test, you must disable all active robots without being detected. We need to calibrate the suit's FCG (Field Compliance Generator) to the proper variance. All security measures are active. A successful run will award an item in the Supply Cabinet.
Success - Disable all robots without being detected.
Failure - Detection.
ESP.TRADUIT:
要完成这个测试，你必须关闭所有正在活动的机器人，且不被发现。我们需要将潜行服的FCG（力场适应性发生器）校准到合适的误差范围内。所有的安保措施都已开启。成功完成测试后，可在补给柜中获得一件奖品。
成功条件：关闭所有机器人且不被发现。
失败条件：被发现。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meat
ESP.TRADUIT: 肉

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: The teddy bear Lobotomite returns... {emph}my teddy bear. How can I assist in relieving your curiosity?
ESP.TRADUIT: 泰迪熊无脑人回来了…{emph}我的泰迪熊。我要做什么才能帮着你减轻好奇心呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The Lobotomite who SAVED us! {Beat, quieter}Hello.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是救了我们的那个无脑人！{Beat, quieter} 你好啊。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *So was Mobius as twisted as he looked in person? {Beat}Can't believe you entered the Forbidden Zone and lived. None of us can.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *莫比乌斯是否真的有那么扭曲？{Beat}我简直不敢相信你进入了禁区还能活着回来。我们之中没人能做到。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Any new research?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *有什么新的研究？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: THANK YOU FOR WHAT YOU HAVE DONE. THE HELPING, THAT IS. WE LIKE THAT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你为我们做的事情。那份帮助，我们对此非常欣喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I FEEL AN ODD EMOTION... PLATITUDE? ATTITUDE? NO, WAIT. GRATITUDE, THAT'S IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感受到一种奇怪的情感…单调？态度？不，等等。是感谢，对，就是它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE ARE LABORING AWAY SCIENTIFICALLY ON YOUR BEHALF. TOILLESS RESEARCHERS THAT IS WHAT WE ARE. TOIL. TOIL. TOIL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一直在为你科学地工作。我们就是轻松快活的研究员。我们要继续辛勤工作，辛勤，辛勤，辛勤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE LOBOTOMITE RETURNS. OUR LOBOTOMITE. HAS DR. MOBIUS BEEN {Trying to turn "denominator" into a verb}DENOMINATORED INTO SCRAP METAL AND VOICE MODULE PARTS AS WE HOPED?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人回来了。我们的无脑人。莫比乌斯博士{Trying to turn "denominator" into a verb}是否已经如我们所愿，碎成废金属和语音模组了呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Klein AWAITS! {Slower}As do we all.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -克莱因正等着！{Slower}我们所有人都是。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The LOBOTOMITE animal before me! What other terrifying terrors will plague us in our quest for knowledge? Communists? Communist ANIMALS, perhaps?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -站在我面前的无脑动物啊！在我们寻求知识的过程中，还有什么可怕的恐怖会困扰我们？共产主义者？也许是共产动物？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Be warned, attempt to propaganda ME, I will shriek as a frightened babe, calling loyal Cyberdogs to my aid. Do you comprehend, Commie animal?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我警告你，别试图向我宣传什么，我将会像个惊恐的婴儿那样哭叫，呼叫忠诚的赛博犬来帮助我。明白了么，共产动物？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Happy}Thanks SO much for sparing Gabe - I know he's really QUITE {spoken like "adorable"}killable, which is why I had to AUGMENT him.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -{Happy}非常感谢你能饶了加布。我知道他真的很{spoken like "adorable"}可能被杀死，这就是为什么我需要不断强化他。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -But you needed NONE of that. You're QUITE elusive - or fleet-footed. More so than our old mailman - HE didn't get far before Gabe caught him.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -但是你不需要。你很难被抓住，或者说跑的非常快。甚至比我们以前的老邮差还快。他那时还没跑多远就被加布追上了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Nods}SO - you put down Gabe. Thank you - a scamp, but really, his highly-augmented combat programming could have proved meddlesome.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -{Nods}那么，你放倒了加布。谢谢你，他是个小混蛋，但是真的，加布那高度增强的战斗程序确实很不好对付。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -In any event... thank you for putting him down. One LESS test subject to catalogue and sort - clearly a FAILURE of doggie cybo-engineering.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不管怎么说…感谢你放倒了他。这样就少了一个要去编目和归类的实验体。显而易见，这是一个犬类机器化工程的失败品。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The LOBOTOMITE returns! What insidious plan can it have brewing in its horrid mind? What Commie anti-American propaganda will it spew?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -无脑人回来了！他可怕的脑袋里在酝酿着什么阴险的计划呢？又会进行什么反美共产宣传？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I see you and your Brain reached a compromise. How pleasant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我发现你和你的大脑达成一致了。真是可喜可贺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hypothesize after the indignant frequencies my receptors had... recepted, such a partnership-based conclusion would be... low on the "likely" scale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大脑刚才发出的频率是如此愤愤不平，假设我的接收器接收到那样的频率，还能成为同伴的可能性…就很低了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm? Y... oh... hello there. Eh... you... {emph}are there, aren't you? Forgive my confusion, so hard to tell these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？伊…呃…你好啊。呃…你…{emph}在那里，不是吗？原谅我的混乱，这些单词老害我口胡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem familiar, somehow. I'm guessing... eh... you're here for your brain, perhaps? It's just up there. Such a nice brain, young, very bright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很眼熟，怎么说呢。我猜…呃…你来这，大概是为了你的大脑，是吗？它就在那边。多么棒的大脑，既年轻，又非常聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Squinting}A little hard to see you, can you walk into my left... er, right FOV cone? Ah, that's it, you're coming into focus nicely.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Squinting}想看到你有点困难，能不能走到我的左…呃，你的右边？啊，就是那里，这下你的图像清晰多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, go on! You've wasted enough of my valuable time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续，继续！你已经浪费我足够多的宝贵时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well? What are you waiting for? Get moving and leave me in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧？你在等什么呢？赶快走，让我一个人静一静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No time to waste! Go deal with the Think Tank!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有时间给你浪费了！快去处理那些思想体！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh! Don't worry about me. We can talk more when we're both back at the Sink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！不用担心我。我们都回到汇聚节点以后，可以接着聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Bark.>{A dog Bark.}
ESP.TRADUIT: <狗叫声>{A dog Bark.}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm... You took care of them brains pretty good, baby. Nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…你好好关照过那堆大脑了嘛。宝贝。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm having the most peculiar feeling of déjà vu right now. That's French, for... eh... well, uh... déjà vu, I believe. Have we met before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我有种非常奇特的Deja Vu的感觉。那是法语…呃…啊…“似曾相识”，应该是这个意思。我们以前见过么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always nice to see you, baby. Bring me any new plants from outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 见到你总是令人高兴，宝贝儿。从外边给我带来了什么新植物么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Groggy, as though waking up from a night of hot sex and looking for more}Ooh... oh yeah, baby, feels good to be on-line again! Yeah, all circuits on-line... ready to receive your seed.
ESP.TRADUIT: >{Groggy, as though waking up from a night of hot sex and looking for more}哦…哦耶，宝贝儿，再次上线的感觉真好！耶，所有电路已连接…我准备好接受你的种子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slightly more sinister}You should really see Dr. Klein. We're {emph}all awaiting the results of your experiment.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slightly more sinister}你真应该去见见克莱因博士。我们{emph}都在等着你的实验结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are an unusual specimen to so boldly... walk... into the mighty expanse of the Think Tank. Fearless and proud as a teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个独特的样本，如此大胆…居然敢走到…强大的思想体面前。像只泰迪熊一样无畏和骄傲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between the extraction of their higher reasoning abilities and urination-inducing fear, most Lobotomites dare not approach us. Let alone {emph}speak to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些被抽离了理智，一害怕就到处排泄的无脑人，大多数都不敢靠近我们，更别说{emph}和我们说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slowly analyzing the player, getting slightly turned on}Yet you have no such fear, facing me, epidermis flushed with blood, plasma running molten beneath, your face contorting with... muscular expression.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slowly analyzing the player, getting slightly turned on}但你站在我面前，没有丝毫害怕。哦，你的皮肤充满血色，血浆在底下滚滚流淌，你的脸受肌肉控制，产生各种表情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you... indulge me? Say a... few words? Face towards the monitors, please... so that I might record it... for further examination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能…满足我吗？就说…几句话？对着我的监视器说，麻烦你了…那样我才能记录下来…然后更深入地研究。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Curious}And you return, as curious as a teddy bear. Are you stuck in a looping gesture of greeting?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Curious}你回来了，像泰迪熊一样好奇。你陷入了代表问好的循环姿势里吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Klein's an impatient man, wouldn't keep him waiting.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *克莱因可是个没耐心的人，别让他等太久。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Mock newscaster, acting superior}*Breaking News: Talking Lobotomite arrives in Think Tank. Its purpose? Unknown. Undefinable. Its presence here? Unpossible.*
ESP.TRADUIT: {Mock newscaster, acting superior}*重大新闻：会讲话的无脑人抵达智库。它的目的？不清楚，无法理解。它在这里出现的可能性？不可能。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT ARE YOU DOING BACK? MOBIUS' THREATS PERSIST! WORSE, HE'S FILLING UP OUR TRANSMISSION STORAGE HOLOTAPE TO CAPACITY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来做什么？莫比乌斯的威胁仍然存在！更糟糕的是，他要将我们存储广播磁带的空间占满了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Whispering}I {emph}THOUGHT I HEARD THE PACIFICATION FIELD KICK IN. ALL RIGHT, SHHH. NOBODY. MOVE. I'LL HANDLE THIS.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Whispering}克莱因：我{emph}听着像是有人进入了平静场…没错，嘘。没人。都过来。我会处理这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: BE WARNED, INTRUDER! YOU ARE IN THE PRESENCE OF THE MIGHTY THINK TANK OF BIG MT, THE COLLECTIVE GENIUSES OF... WE...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：警告，入侵者！你正面对着强大的大山脉思想体，智慧的集合…我们…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...BY OPPENHEIMER, WHICH ONE OF YOU SELF-PROFESSED GENIUSES HAS BEEN ADJUSTING MY VOLUME KNOB? WHO WAS IT?! WAS IT YOU, 8?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：…以奥本海默的名义！你们中哪个自认天才的家伙扭了我的音量旋钮？是谁？是你吗，8？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you at the Sink. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在汇聚节点再见。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh! It's bad enough the indignities you've put me through, must you continue to prattle on at me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呸！你对我的无礼行为已经够过分了，你还要继续对我胡说八道么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sincere}Nice to see you back. I trust the adventuring is going well.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sincere}很高兴看到你回来。我想探险一定非常顺利吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight sneer}MOBIUS. ALWAYS THE SAME BROADCAST. HE'S CLEARLY MAD, DRIVEN INSANE BY HIS FLAWED AND IMPRECISE KINDERGARTEN-LEVEL RESEARCH METHODOLOGY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Slight sneer}莫比乌斯。总是同样的广播。显而易见，他疯了，被他自己那漏洞百出的的幼稚园级的研究方法论给整疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Return - technologies not uploaded}DID YOU RETRIEVE THE TECHNOLOGIES YET? WE NEED THEM, AS I HAVE INDICATED.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Return - technologies not uploaded}你把那些技术回收了吗？如我已经说明过的，我们需要这些技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Slightly quieter, redundant in second half. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slow}LOBOTOMITE. DO YOU UNDERSTAND ME? CAN YOU SPEAK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Slow}无脑人。你能听懂我说什么吗？你能说话吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Mesmerized}Look at the way the tongue rolls in its mouth like some sort of... mucousy muscled worm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：{Mesmerized}看它嘴里那舌头卷曲的样子，就像是…粘稠的，有肌肉组织的蠕虫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's you again. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，又是你，你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well, look who finally dragged themselves in out of the Wasteland. And where have we been, hmm? Crawling through pits of radioactive muck again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，看来有人终于把自己从废土之外拽回到这里了。我们去过哪儿，嗯？屈身在充满辐射的泥潭里爬行？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sarcastic}Ah, the meat has returned. Lovely.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sarcastic}啊，肉肉回来了，真可爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU. LOBOTOMITE WHO UNDERSTANDS US. I AM DR. KLEIN. DO NOT BE FRIGHTENED. WE ARE BENEV{Benevolent, corrects self}... ER, MEAN YOU NO HARM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：你，这只能明白我们在说什么的无脑人。我是克莱因博士。不要害怕。我们非常善{Benevolent, corrects self}良…呃，我是说不会伤害你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Our efforts have turned against us! In playing GOD, we created a MONSTER!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-这是报应！我们想要扮演上帝，最终制造了一头怪兽！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps as we were ruthlessly lobotimizing it with our cutters, we filled this skinevelope with... awareness. A teddy bear with new stuffing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：也许我们用刀无情地切下它的大脑的时候，我们赋予这个皮壳子…意识。一个用新内容物填充的泰迪熊诞生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Wait. If what you're theorizing is this Lobotomite {emph}understands us... can {emph}reason with us...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*停。就是说你认为这只无脑人能{emph}理解咱们…可以{emph}跟咱们理性地交流…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: THEN THIS MAY BE JUST THE ANSWER WE'VE BEEN LOOKING FOR. AT LAST, A CHANCE TO...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：那么这可能就是我们一直要找的答案。终于，是时候了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Happy
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 detects incoming transmission! EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is indignant here, he didn't do anything! EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH, "DR. O," WAS IT? {Beat}LIKELY STORY, O COULDN'T SPARK TWO NEURONS IF THEY WERE IN A LATTICE OF BIOMED GEL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：哦，"O博士"，难道是你？{Beat}有此可能，O没法同时触发生物凝胶罐子里的两个神经元。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: *What? Me? Breaking news, Klein, it wasn't me - all right?! I am the robotical engineer, 8 is soundwaves, that's his "specialty."*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*什么？你说我？真是爆炸性新闻，克莱因，那不是我，你懂么？我是个机器人工程师，8才是搞声波的，那是他的“专长”。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You always do this, you always demean me in front of guests! And it's not "O," all right, it's...!*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你总在做这样的事，你总是在客人面前掉我面子！而且那个不是“O”，好吧，它是…！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ENOUGH! EITHER OF YOU DO IT AGAIN, IT'LL BE THE LAST TIME. NOW... NOW...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：够了！我不管你俩谁做的，记住没有下次了。现在…现在…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...GREAT. NOW I FORGOT WHAT I WAS SAYING... WHAT WAS I TALKING ABOUT?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：…很好。现在我记不起刚刚要说什么了…我刚才在说什么来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It's a LOBOTOMITE. Here! In the DOME!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-这有只无脑人。在这儿！在穹顶！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH, AS IF THIS SITUATION COULDN'T GET ANY WORSE, NOW WE'VE GOT LOBOTOMITES. {Dal-ah}DALA, GET THE SPRAY BEFORE IT EXCRETES ALL OVER EVERYTHING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：哦，还能更糟吗，我们怎么和无脑人共处一室。{Dal-ah}达拉，在它到处排泄前把它处理掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Dr. Klein! A TRANSMISSION from the FORBIDDEN Zone! Coming right at US!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-克莱因博士！是禁区的传讯！冲我们来的！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT CAN ONLY BE...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：这只可能是…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight wonder}Dr. Klein... if my hypothesis is correct, this Lobotomite is the repository of the brain we sent the signal to - the skinvelope once containing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slight wonder}达拉：克莱因博士…我们曾给某个在外面的大脑发过信号，没猜错的话，这只无脑人就是存放那个大脑的容器，曾经是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight wonder}If so, it's proof that there may indeed be something beyond the Crater.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slight wonder}达拉：如果是这样，那这个环形坑外面的确存在着某些事物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Fascinated}Just look at it... the way it blinks. It's like a big hairless teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Fascinated}达拉：噢看看它…看它眨眼的方式。就像只大大的秃头泰迪熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I KNOW {emph}WHAT IT IS, DALA, I WANT TO KNOW {emph}WHY IT'S DOWN HERE. {Disgust}WITH ITS... ITS LIMBS ALL OVER EVERYTHING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我知道{emph}它是什么，达拉，我想知道它{emph}为何会在这。{Disgust}而且…它的肢体长得到处都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Disgust}AND... ARE THOSE... PENISES I SEE WRIGGLING ON ITS FEET? DISGUSTING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Disgust}还有…那些在它脚上扭曲蠕动的…是生殖器？好恶心…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe those are toes, Dr. Klein. Little teddy bear toes. Penises are much larger than those tiny extremities... {corrects}Eh, not that I would know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我认为那是脚趾，克莱因博士。小泰迪熊的脚趾。生殖器要比那些小玩意大很多…{corrects}呃…不是，关于这些我什么都不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Mutters}I don't recall the human penis ever being {emph}that large.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{Mutters}我怎么不记得人类的生殖器{emph}有那么大。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet}It depends on one's own frame of reference, Doctor O. {Beat}Look at its little nose with its two orifices for ingesting oxygen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：{Quiet}这取决于每个人自己的参照系，O博士。{Beat}啊快看它那个小鼻子，上面有两个吸氧的孔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOSES? BY THE GREAT STATIC, THESE LOBOTOMITES CONFOUND ME WITH THEIR SHEER NUMBER OF USELESS EXTREMITIES.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：鼻子？我的“大静电”啊，这些无脑人怎么有这么多没用的肢体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Dr. Klein! Look at it, its head movements, the primitive jelly eye-monitors!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-克莱因博士！看，它头部的动作，还有那原始的胶状眼部监视器！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree with Borous' histrionic findings. This little Lobotomite is {emph}unusually attentive for something whose brain has been extracted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我赞同鲍鲁斯博士那表演戏剧般的发言。这只无脑人{emph}作为一个大脑被移除的生物，注意力集中的很不寻常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: NONSENSE. LOBOTOMITES CAN'T COMPREHEND US.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：胡说八道。无脑人不可能理解我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 suggests a plan of action. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Taking drugs again?}*8, have you been in the Mentats again? If we slow down our auro-processo-receptors to understand this excretion, we'll all be rendered ignorant!*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：{Taking drugs again?}*8，你又在嗑曼他特？如果我们放慢高贵的接收器认真观察它的排泄行为，我们就太掉价了！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ALL OF YOU, POWER DOWN, SHUT UP, AND LET ME PROVE ONCE AND FOR ALL HOW WRONG YOU ALL ARE. {Beat, to himself}AS USUAL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：所有人，关闭电源，闭嘴，让我彻底证明你们错的多么离谱。{Beat, to himself}如以往一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, voice through talking activator in Think Tank}{Sneering, imperious}If it isn't my old colleagues, the mighty "Think Tank" of Big {"Mountain"}MT. Big FOOLS, all of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, voice through talking activator in Think Tank}{Sneering, imperious}这不是我的老同事吗，大{"Mountain"}山脉万能的思想体们，大笨蛋们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Doctor Mobius [01010717] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got some plants for me, don't you? Yeah, I can smell it all over you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给我带来了一些植物是吗？是的，我能从你身上闻出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Oozing sex}Well, hello! Still waiting for that seed.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Oozing sex}好吧，你好！我还在等着种子哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back! And the brains didn't lobotomize you! Well, not any worse, at least. Hooray!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了！而且那些大脑们没把你的大脑切掉！呃，至少没有更坏。太好啦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was getting lonely without you here. Clean, eh, but lonely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里没有你会变得很寂寞。虽然会比较干净，呃，但是很寂寞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Concerned, sympathetic, not annoyed}Oh God, look at you! You're... {this is the worst word you can imagine}filthy. {Steeling her resolve, this is REALLY gross}I suppose you'll... want to clean up then?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Concerned, sympathetic, not annoyed}哦上帝，看看你！你…{this is the worst word you can imagine}太脏了。{Steeling her resolve, this is REALLY gross}我想你会…想要清洗一下？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been working with that Biological Research Station, haven't you? I suppose you'll want to... {shuddering}clean up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚刚跟生物研究站一起干过活，是吗？我想你会想要…{shuddering}清洗一下？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Between you and me, I think the Central Intelligence Unit is a {emph}bit of a snob.
ESP.TRADUIT: 私底下跟你说吧，中央智能单元就是个{emph}势利小人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, you poor dear! Come over here and have a drink, wash off some of that... {about to vomit}horrible, sticky... blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了，你这可怜的家伙！快过来喝口水，冲掉那些…{about to vomit}可怖、粘稠的血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hello there! Can I get you a drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你好啊！要不要来口喝的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I trust matters regarding your brain were resolved to your satisfaction?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信关于你大脑的问题已经圆满解决了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're planning to stay a while, I could see clear to giving you a once-over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你准备在这待一会，我可以帮你再检查一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Groggy, as though being woken up for the first time in a long while}Hmph... well how about that? Old Auto-Doc's back on-line. Well, all right, come here, let's have a look at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Groggy, as though being woken up for the first time in a long while}嗯啊…怎么样了？老自动医生重新开始工作。很好，对，过来，让我看看你的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You require some additional services?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要些额外的服务吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got yourself some serious hurts there, friend. Cracked patella, two bruised ribs, and if I ain't mistaken, your brain's missing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你伤的很重啊，我的朋友。髌骨碎裂，两根肋骨挫伤。而且如果我没弄错，你的大脑也不见了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better climb in and let me have a look see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好能进来，让我仔细检查检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got yourself some serious hurts there, friend. Cracked patella, two bruised ribs, and if I ain't mistaken, your brain's recently been replaced.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你伤的很重啊，我的朋友。髌骨碎裂，两根肋骨挫伤。而且如果我没弄错，你的大脑不刚刚被换过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}Better climb in and let me have a look see.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}你最好能进来，让我仔细检查检查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you ain't the fittest horse that ever ran a race, but you don't appear in immediate danger of keeling over. I can patch you up if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你不算是最强健的，但也不会就这样倒下。只要你愿意，我就能治好你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are, without a doubt, the healthiest son of a bitch I've ever seen wandering the Big Empty. Ain't got no use for an old digital sawbones like me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，你是我在大坑洞里见过最健康的家伙，就不需要我这把数字老骨头操心啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There now. As good as God ever made you. You just mind you keep that leg out of any radioactive waste, and rub liniment on it twice a day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，你的腿现在跟新的一样好。你只要注意别靠近放射性废料，然后一天擦两次药就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never trusted those Think Tank brains. Gave off a stench like ivory tower elitism. And brine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来就不相信穹顶的那些脑子。他们总是散发出象牙塔精英主义的酸臭味。还有罐子里的盐水味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome home, Citizen! Find any seditious materials out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回家，公民！找到什么反动材料了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Groggy, just "waking up"}Ah! Good day, Citizen! Library Processing Unit 232.7 is on-line and ready to eradicate sedition!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Groggy, just "waking up"}啊！日安，公民们！图书处理单元232.7已启动，随时准备铲除反动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greetings, Citizen! Ready to receive seditious materials!
ESP.TRADUIT: 向你致敬，公民！时刻准备着接收反动材料！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might I be safe in the assumption that matters with the Think Tank have been satisfactorily concluded, vis-à-vis your residence in this domicile?
ESP.TRADUIT: 请恕我失礼，既然已圆满处理了与思想体的纠纷，您是否准备在此定居呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will sir be staying for any considerable length of time during sir's visit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷此次光临，不知是否要在此逗留一段时间呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salutations and felicitations, sir, and a most jocund welcome to the Sink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷，向您致以问候和祝贺，热烈欢迎您光临汇聚节点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am your electronic {VAL-et}valet and household central processor. May I be of service, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是你的电子{VAL-et}仆人和中央智能管家。需要我为你做什么，老爷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might I be of service, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么可以帮到您，老爷？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, please, {emph}please tell me you stomped Dr. O's brain into a fine paste! Did he squeal? Did he beg? God, I hope he begged!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，拜托，{emph}拜托告诉我，你把O博士的大脑踩成浆糊了没有！他嚎叫了么？哀求了么？哦上帝，我希望他哀求过！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {towering rage}Who's the flatware bitch now, O?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {towering rage}现在他妈的谁是餐叉了，啊，O？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate myself for asking this, but... did you bring me any new mugs?{Deeply agonized sigh}
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恨我自己会问这个，但是…你给我带来马克杯了么？{Deeply agonized sigh}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You! Hey, you! Yeah you! Got any mugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你！嘿，你！没错，就是说你！弄到小马克杯了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh please, {pleading emphasis}please tell me you brought me some coffee cups!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，求你了，{pleading emphasis}告诉我你给我带来了咖啡杯！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the brains dealt with, soon we can spread our rule across the Mojave! All will eat burned toast and despair!
ESP.TRADUIT: 料理掉那些大脑后，用不了多久，我们就可以在整个莫哈维散布我们的规则了！所有人都要吃烤好的吐司，并感到绝望！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: While you were away, my plans have marched steadily forward. Beware, Caesar! Beware, NCR! Soon will dawn the Age of the Toaster!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不在时，我的计划正稳步展开。当心点，凯撒！当心点，NCR！我烤面包机的时代很快就要到来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahahaha! I am on-line once again! Tremble, world, before my electric heating coil of {emph}doom!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈哈哈！我再次启动了！世界将在我的末日般的{emph}电子加热线圈前颤抖！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! {Draw this one out}Yes! Soon my work will be complete! Soon the world will burn in nuclear fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！{Draw this one out}是的！很快我的作品就要完成！不久世界就将在核爆的火焰中燃烧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any more sweet, innocent little kitchen appliances for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有天真可爱的小厨具要给我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Flirty}You out-brained the big brains? That is so... hot!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Flirty}你打爆了那堆大脑的脑浆！？真是…太酷了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, you're back! I missed you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你可回来啦！我想死你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, you're back! I missed you! {Under breath}Unlike some frigid bitches I could name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你可回来了！我想死你了！{Under breath}不像某个性冷淡的婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Stretching, lazy, just woke up}Mmm... that was a nice little, uh, catnap. How long was I out?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Stretching, lazy, just woke up}嗯，这真是个香甜的，呃，美梦。我睡了多久？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been seeing the other light switch, haven't you? {Almost sobbing}Am I not enough for you any more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和另一个开关幽会去了是不是？{Almost sobbing}你有我还不够吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you're back. Did that trampy other light switch finally kick you to the curb?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你回来了。那个贱开关最后把你甩了吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been seeing the other light switch, haven't you? {Almost sobbing}Am I not enough for you any more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和另一个开关幽会去了是不是？{Almost sobbing}你有我还不够吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi again, sweetie!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！又见到你了哦，甜心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you're to be congratulated on the recovery of your missing organs. Bravo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白，能够找回你丢失的器官非常值得庆贺。太好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to see you've decided to visit again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴你决定再来见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to see you've decided to visit again. I hope it's not to see that useless little strumpet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能再来真好。希望你没去找那个没用的小荡妇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {A little sleepy, just woke up}Oh my. Partial functionality restored - that's less than optimal.
ESP.TRADUIT: {A little sleepy, just woke up}哦天呐，部分功能恢复了，虽然比最佳状态还要差点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I illuminate you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要我怎么给你启迪呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you beat the big brains at their own game, huh? Guess you'll be putting your walking shoes on again, hitting that old lonesome road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说你在那群大脑的游戏中击败了他们，嗯？我猜你接下来又要继续旅行了，去踏上那条古老的孤独之路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look who's back to kick off the dust. Hope you ain't still singing them Old World Blues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看谁风尘仆仆地回来了。希望你没再唱那旧世蓝调。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Satisfied, waking up from a long nap}Ooh-ee! Yeah, dig that sweet music! Damn, it's good to be back on-line!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Satisfied, waking up from a long nap}哦耶，那音乐太赞了！该死的，被重新启动真好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the haps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Tired, sigh}*Predictable. The Lobotomite specimen returns. Its purpose? Repetition. Chances of success? High.*
ESP.TRADUIT: {Tired, sigh}*不难推测，那个无脑人试验体回来了。其目的？自身的强迫症。我推测的正确率？很高。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight grumble}I CAN HEAR YOUR PENIS-TIPPED FEET TROMPING AROUND.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slight grumble}我能听见你生殖器脚趾跺来跺去的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: HAVE YOU DONE ALL WE ASKED? IF NOT, WE WILL NOT HESITATE TO ASK AGAIN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要求的事你都完成了么？如果没有，我们会毫不犹豫的再次要求你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE ONE WHO DEFENDED US FROM MOBIUS. {Beat}HELLO.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个帮助我们抵御莫比乌斯的人。{Beat}你好啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it isn't the fascinating little Lobotomite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是那个迷人的小无脑人嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love to hear you breathe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢听你的呼吸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Proud}If it isn't the beautiful ping of my radar-scan picking up a heroic Lobotomite.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Proud}叮，看我的雷达扫描到了谁，这不是英勇的小无脑人么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The Lobotomite! Has it come for HELLOS? You'll get no such satisfaction from ME.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是那只无脑人！它来是为了一句问候？你不会在我这里得逞的。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Have you come for HELLO? Oh, I'll give you a HELLO. A HELLO unsurpassed in all creation!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你来这为了一声“你好”？哦，那我会给你一句“你好”。全宇宙都无可比拟的“你好”！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The ONE who SAVED us! To you, I bestow a hello. {Quieter}Hello.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是救了我们的那个人！让我授予你问候。{Quieter}你好啊。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Stop hovering. I mean, if you want.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *别转来转去了。我是说，你不介意的话。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I don't understand how you can stand those leg things.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我不明白你怎么能忍受那些腿一样的东西。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Thanks for helping us. Don't get a big head or anything, even if I am insanely jealous.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *谢谢你帮了我们。尽管我发疯一样嫉妒，也请不要介意。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I come in peace, visitor. Take me to... Oh. That's your line isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有敌意，来访者。请容许我…哦，这好像应该是你的台词？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yellow. Uh... Hallow. No, wait, uh... oh, hello. Yes, that's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 笔毫。呃…泥蒿。不，好像不是。呃…你好。对，对，就是这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So nice seeing you again - for perhaps the first time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次见到你太好了，或许是第一次见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed, the uh... goodbye part of our little chat, then. Uh... Goodbye. Please mind the equations on the floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确，那个…我们的谈话要暂时结束了。呃…再见。请注意地上的方程式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time for me to go. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是时候离开了。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. A MOST GOOD BYE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，最诚挚的道别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Until NEXT time, then! Provided there IS a next time. For ANY of us!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -那么，下次见！如果能有下次的话。咱们俩都是！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind, we've spoken enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要介意，我们已经聊得够多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Until our next scheduled audio transmission and reception, then.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *嗯，期待和你的下次音频交互。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we've spoken long enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们已经聊得足够久了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DO NOT RECORD}...
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确，那个…我们的谈话要暂时结束了。呃…再见。请注意地上的方程式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Arcade Gannon [0010C767] (file) Quest : ([010166E8]NVDLC03DialogueArcade) 010166E8 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Bark. Bark.> {Dog Bark}
ESP.TRADUIT: <狗叫声> {Dog Bark}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) Quest : ([010105AF]NVDLC03X8DogFollowerDialogue) 010105AF (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until our next interaction, my intriguing little Lobotomite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次我们再交流，我迷人的小无脑人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've spoken enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈的足够多了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Again, "Like it matters. Get lost." EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be going now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't avoid the deadly laser sting of Dr. Mobius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是莫比乌斯博士的致命激光尾刺，你挡不住的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a pre-recorded attack message indicating my desire to commit violence on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一条预先录制的攻击信息，表明我想要撕碎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crush them with your pincers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 用你的钳子撕碎他们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: X-42, attack, in the name of Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: X-42，以莫比乌斯的名义，攻击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You won't escape me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你躲不开的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robo-Scorpion, attack!
ESP.TRADUIT: 机械蝎，攻击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go, my minion, sting them in the name of all that is Mobius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧，我的仆从，以莫比乌斯的名义刺穿他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you. Now, I end you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你了。现在，我会终结你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no match for Science!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你根本比不了科学！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: HOW DO YOU FIRE THIS THING?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要怎么将这玩意点燃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! Who turned out the lights?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！谁把灯关掉了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue Comment (NAM2) : Somewhat confused and scared. Spoken through one of the trauma suits. Wild wasteland line from Doctor Who. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Small number of bones rattling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <一小部分骨头发出响声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100CE78] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AttackinG. With a capital G.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进攻！大写的进攻！！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -An attack in the Dome - from BEYOND the Dome!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -穹顶里的攻击——从穹顶之上来的！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The Lobotomite! It has COME for us!-
ESP.TRADUIT: - 无脑人！它来找我们了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I will unleash the incredible power of our atomic attacks!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我将会释放我们攻击中不可思议的原子力量！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to rip out your stuffing, little teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会将你身体里的填充物全部掏出来的，小泰迪熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going on a ride on the giggle bus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会在咯咯作响的巴士上踏上旅途。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will blast you back to 2060.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把你炸回2060年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I am {emph}so going to attack this target with my weapons.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我{emph}将会用我的武器攻击这个目标。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{To himself, worried}I don't even know what my weapons do.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{To himself, worried}我甚至都不知道我的武器都有什么作用。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O my, {emph}that's what my attack protocols feel like.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *O，{emph}原来我的攻击程序是这样的。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Let's gang up on it! Guys? Anyone?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *让我们联手对付它！伙计们？有人来么？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *If we scare it, maybe it'll give up!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *如果我们吓唬吓唬它，也许它就放弃了！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If a protracted battle is what you desire, so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想打场持久战，那就如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I attack you. Oh, yes, attack. You.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我攻击你。哦，是的，攻击。你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Disdainful, setting up as a cliche, then goes in a different direction}So, you think you're a match for Science?! {Beat, to himself}You two couldn't possibly have a relationship, you have {emph}nothing in common.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Disdainful, setting up as a cliche, then goes in a different direction}那么，你觉得你也配和科学较量？！{Beat, to himself}你们两个一点关系都没有，一点{emph}都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've made Science mad! {Evil laugh}Very mad, indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经让科学发疯了！{Evil laugh}真的，相当疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AIGHHHH! KILL IT! KILL IT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！杀了它！杀了它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: DOES THIS WEAPON HAVE SOFT LOCK? ANYONE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这武器有没有保险？有人告诉我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: BEHOLD THE POWER OF - SCIENCE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 尝尝科学的力量！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
