NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Small number of bones rattling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <一小部分骨头发出响声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100CE78] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Small number of bones rattling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <一小部分骨头发出响声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100CE78] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Small number of bones rattling>
ESP.TRADUIT: <一小部分骨头发出响声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100CE78] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pitiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真可怜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking for a weak spot? There ARE NO WEAK SPOTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想寻找弱点？没有弱点可寻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll never disable me from the monitors around the room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你永远无法阻止我出现在周围的监视器上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's make this sporting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们动起身来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defiant to the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反抗吧，直到你的终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop that! You'll damage the hull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快停下！你会毁掉外壳的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hit my Robo-Scorpion, will you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，击中了我的机械蝎，你还能么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Destroy this one, I'll make more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只管摧毁，我会弄更多的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Grunt.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咕哝。>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Grunt.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咕哝。>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -What is this unholy violence?!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这是什么罪恶的暴力？！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Such pain as I've never experienced!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我从来没有体验过这样的疼痛！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Ouch! STOP! Ow! OW.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -好疼！停！噢！噢。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cannot believe you would hit a gender-neutral entity such as myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直不敢相信你会攻击我这样的中性存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This repeated hitting does not put you in a good light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样的反复击打对你不会有好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, god, yes, hit me. I {emph}love it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，上帝，对，打我。{emph}我喜欢这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unh! Treat me like a lab animal! Make me your teddy bear, pull my stuffing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！像对实验动物一样对待我！把我当做你的泰迪熊，把我里边的东西都扯出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Not the monitors! Or the shell!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *别打监视器！也别打外壳！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Take my lunch money! Take it!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *拿走我的饭钱！拿去吧！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Ooooooh, you're making me mad!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哦啊啊！你快把我逼疯了！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Confused}Is that pain I feel?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Confused}这就是疼痛吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That burns my biogel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那烧灼着我的生物凝胶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I lose another monitor...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我失去了另外一个监视器…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AIGH! MY TANK! IT PUT A DING IN IT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！我的罐子！它在上面打了个坑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT SCRATCHED MY TANK!
ESP.TRADUIT: 它划伤了我的罐子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT'S FIGHTING BACK! IT'S NOT SUPPOSED TO DO THAT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在反击！它不应该这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: STOP RESISTING!
ESP.TRADUIT: 停止反抗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT'S PRODUCING AN EQUAL AND OPPOSITE REACTION!
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在制造一个等量的反作用！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Grunt>
ESP.TRADUIT: <咕哝。>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: <轻微的骨头断裂声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100CE78] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: <轻微的骨头断裂声>

ESP.TRADUIT: <轻微的骨头断裂声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100CE78] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: <轻微的骨头断裂声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100CE78] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFA]NVDLC03GenericDialogueCorpseSuit) Corpse Suit Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flee
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃跑

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There is no hope! Run for your intellect!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -没有希望了！为了你们的才智，快逃吧！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -We are powerless against its power!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -面对它的力量，我们无能为力！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am currently fleeing. How exciting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在逃跑。真刺激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *My self-preservation routine is circumventing my aggression protocols!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我的自我保护模式干扰了我的攻击程序！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *My cowardice programming - it's kicking in.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我的懦弱程序，它正在强制运行。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {To himself}Well, I've experimented with a frontal assault long enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: {To himself}好吧，我已经试验正面对抗足够久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to debug my tactical routines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候调整我的战术模式了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Fleeing}I WILL NOW USE ACCELERATION AND VELOCITY TO MY ADVANTAGE.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Fleeing}现在我要利用我在速度和功率上的长处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: RETREAT PROTOCOLS ENACTED.
ESP.TRADUIT: 撤退协议已生效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: NEED TO REACH MY CHARGING STATION.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要去我的充电站了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The VICIOUS ATTACK ENDS... as quickly as it BEGAN!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -邪恶的攻击很快就结束了…和它的发生一样迅速！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to attack me again, please fill out the proper forms - and wear gloves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还想攻击我，请填写好表格，记得还要带上手套。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *That wasn't very nice, bullying me like that.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *像那样欺负我，并不好。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you didn't mean to do that? Not to worry, all is forgiven, forgotten, and forbidden.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你不是故意的？别担心。一切都会被原谅、被遗忘、被禁止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WERE YOU JUST TRYING TO GET MY ATTENTION?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是想引起我的注意吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assault
ESP.TRADUIT: 突击

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -An UNPROVOKED attack! UNPROVOKED!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -一次无缘无故的攻击！无缘无故！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Chiding}This seems a rather desperate cry for attention, my little teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Chiding}像是声为了呼救的绝望嚎叫，我的小泰迪熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Sarcastic}Remember that time I suggested we get bodyguards? Yeah, that woulda been nice, huh?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{Sarcastic}记得那次我说我们需要保镖么？对，那应该很不错，嗯？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Mildly curious, player just punched him}My, is it vivisection time already?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Mildly curious, player just punched him}天啊，已经到做活体解剖的时间了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT'S THE SCHRÖDINGER BOX FOR YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是薛定谔的箱子，给你的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Focus the atomic laser stinger. Full power!
ESP.TRADUIT: 聚焦尾刺的原子激光。最大功率！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Laser stinger - fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 激光尾刺，开火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sting the pest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 刺死那只虫子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Laser sting!
ESP.TRADUIT: 激光尾刺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel the full power of my Robo-Scorpion's arsenal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尝尝机械蝎武器全功率运转的威力吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sting them, my pets! Sting them stupid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 刺死他们，我的宠物！把他们都蛰成傻子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better get a nuke if you want to hurt my pet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想伤到我的宠物，最好使用核武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: {Bomb flying toward him}哦，垃圾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one told me the target had bomb things!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人告诉我目标有爆炸物！

ESP.TRADUIT: {Player throws a bomb at Borous}无脑人！它在朝我扔炸弹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a bomb here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有个炸弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look - a bomb converging on my position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，一个炸弹朝我飞来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Uh-O.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *唔-O*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stored energy combined with light, heat, sound, and pressure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蕴含着光、热、声和压力的能量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You dare use physics?! Against {emph}me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢用物理？！来挑战{emph}我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: {Bomb warning}一个充满动力的抛射物！

ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗开始

ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Death
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have GOT to be kidding me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定是在开玩笑吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no way this is happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不可能会发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My calculations were perfect! There was no other outcome except success!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的计算非常完美！除了成功不会有其他结果！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nooooooo!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My Robo-Scorpion!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的机械蝎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooooooh, you'll pay for this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦哦哦哦，你会为此付出代价！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Dying, gel is running out of body}O... My name... was Dr. Zero... Not O. Zero.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{Dying, gel is running out of body}O…我的名字…是0博士…不是O。是零。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I REGRET... NOTHING!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…我没什么后悔的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Borous FALLS! The audience GASPS in TERROR!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -鲍鲁斯倒下了！听众在恐惧中喘息！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe I'm dead or dying. No wait - I am dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要死了，或者快死了。不，等等，我死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Thinking, slightly introspective}So that's what being killed feels like.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Thinking, slightly introspective}所以那就是被杀死的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Says this out loud}Burble... Spark... Burble. And... So... I... Die.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Says this out loud}噗噗…火花…噗噗。所以…我…死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I DID IT ALL FOR... SCIENCE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都是为了…科学。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，自投罗网的家伙在这呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 找到了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The eye of Mobius sees you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯之眼看到你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 暴力时间到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think you could hide from me? Uh, again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为可以躲过我？啊，又一次？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AIGHH! THERE IT IS! KILL IT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！在这！杀了它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: LOBOTOMITE! GET THE SPRAY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人！吃我一发激光！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 雷达扫描成功。已捕捉到目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Corpse-ify the intruder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将入侵者变成尸体！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sense an intruder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现一个入侵者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯命令机器蝎：扫描未知目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If someone's out there, I, Dr. Mobius wish to say hello to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那里有什么人的话，我，莫比乌斯，想向你问个好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's be friends, you and I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 交个朋友吧，你和我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: ::（口哨）就像要揪出哪个藏着的人一样。::

ESP.TRADUIT: 你好啊。我没有恶意。我带来的死亡都是迅速的，一点都不痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: COME OUT. UM. PLEASE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出来吧。嗯。求你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait for it to come to you, my pet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的宠物，等着吧，它会来找你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, forget this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，忘了这个吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to waste any more energy cells on this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没必要为这浪费更多能量电池。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's scuttle off, find something else to sting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们先撤吧，再找些别的东西来蛰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where the hell did it come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是他妈的从哪里来的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: These intruders are getting frustrating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些入侵者真是令人失望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, everyone, calm down. Might have been a blip.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *What in the biologic fuck was that all about?*

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Introspective}Did I imagine all this? {Beat}Just like the tortoises.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Introspective}这都是我的臆想？{Beat}就跟那些乌龟一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I SWEAR, SOMETHING'S WRONG.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发誓，有什么不对劲。

ESP.TRADUIT: {Grumbling}我的这些耳目还需要改进。

ESP.TRADUIT: {Dupe}-无脑人不见了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: {Dupe} 我相信我们把实验体弄丢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Guess we can go back to our rooms and lock the doors now, huh?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我猜，现在可以各回各家然后锁上门了，是吗？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well. Now I have this adrenaline rush that's going to make me loopy all day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，很好，现在这股肾上腺素的贲流，会让我发疯一整天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHEN I FIND IT, IT'S GOING IN THE SCHRÖDINGER BOX.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我找到它，我要把它放进薛定谔盒子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no match for the power of Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯的力量势不可挡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel the wrath of the science of X-42!
ESP.TRADUIT: 感受X-42科学的愤怒吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF9]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpionGiant) Giant Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack!
ESP.TRADUIT: 进攻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the name of Dr. Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: 以莫比乌斯博士的名义！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Destroy the intruder, my minion!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的仆从们，消灭侵略者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01015EF8]NVDLC03GenericDialogueRoboScorpion) Robo-Scorpion Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The Lobotomite is no proof against our amazing sensors!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -在我们惊人的传感器下，无脑人无所遁形。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beginning dissection. And vivisection.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始解剖，以及活体解剖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{DUPE: Sarcastic}Remember that time I suggested we get bodyguards? Yeah, that woulda been nice, huh?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{DUPE: Sarcastic}记得那次我说我们需要保镖么？对，那应该很不错，哼？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A challenge!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个挑战！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You dare to cross Dr. Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你胆敢和莫比乌斯博士作对！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will reduce you to atoms! {Correcting, quieter}I mean, a more chaotic, painful array of atoms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你粉碎成原子！{Correcting, quieter}一堆混乱、痛苦的原子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: THINK TANK, FORM OF - TACTIC TRIANGLE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 思想体，组成战术队形！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01014186] (ID) Quest : ([01015EFB]NVDLC03GenericDialogueSecuritronDamaged) Damaged Securitron Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a holotape to upgrade you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一个升级你的全息磁带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}And the great stone in the middle of the Big Empty lay untouched, filled with countless technological wonders...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}而巨石穹顶仍矗立在大坑洞中央，多年无人触碰，上面记录着无数的科技奇迹…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Wonders that, in the end, had been answers to the wrong question.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}这些奇迹，到头来，不过是一个错误问题的答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The problems began to outpace the solutions, first geometrically, then exponentially. As the war escalated, so did the questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}但答案开始跟不上问题产生的速度。随着战争升级，问题也越来越多，先是以几何级增长，之后是指数级。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}For years, the minds and computers of Big Mountain were a blaze of trajectories, weapon schematics, and nuclear theories.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}年复一年，大山脉的头脑和电脑研究出了无数弹道理论、武器图纸和原子理论成果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Equations and calculations marched endlessly across chalkboards and computer terminals toward one solution: Winning the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}在黑板和电脑终端上，方程和算式被无止境地推演，只为算出唯一解：赢得这场战争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Do Not Record}
ESP.TRADUIT: {Do Not Record}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Although sheltered from the frontlines, the scientists waged their own war, fighting their battles at the atomic level.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}尽管远离前线，但科学家们仍在另一个属于他们的战场战斗，在原子层面的战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Do Not Record}
ESP.TRADUIT: {Do Not Record}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Great War brought a new energy to Big Mountain and its scientists.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}之后，伟大战争为大山脉及其科学家带来了新的研究动力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Do Not Record}
ESP.TRADUIT: {Do Not Record}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The nucleus of this research was the Dome, a huge stone facility that held the labs of every science known to man.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}穹顶是这里研究的中枢。这是一座巨大的石制设施，人类所有已知科学门类的实验室皆备于此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It was a think tank where no problem could not be solved, where no question could not be answered.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}这是一座智库，在这里没有无法解开的难题，没有不能回答的疑问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Sonic emitters, space age alloys, DNA hybridization, force field particle research, Auto-Doc advances in cranial, cardiac, and trauma surgery...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}声波发射器、太空时代合金、DNA重组技术、力场粒子研究，还有自动医生在大脑、心脏、外伤手术领域的进步…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}...the hopes and dreams of a century became realities in the electronic forges of Big Mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}…一个世纪的梦想与希望，在大山脉的电子熔炉中被一一打造为现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}They sought to create a new world, fueled by technology, for the benefit of all mankind.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}他们力图以科技为燃料，推动打造一个新世界，造福全人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Do Not Record}
ESP.TRADUIT: {Do Not Record}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Scientists of vision were drawn to the facility to tackle the greatest technological challenges of the era.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}志存高远的科学家们纷纷被吸引至此，来攻关那个时代最重大技术难题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Do Not Record}
ESP.TRADUIT: {Do Not Record}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}In the years before the Great War, Big Mountain had been the home to the brightest minds of the 21st century.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}在伟大战争爆发的前些年，大山脉聚集了21世纪最聪明的头脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've recovered all the technological information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我取回了所有的技术资料。

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHAT? YOU DID? YOUR SURVIVAL, LET ALONE SUCCESS, BARELY REGISTERED ON MY PROJECTIONS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你做到了？你能活着——更别说成功——几乎要出乎我的预料之外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOW, ALL I NEED TO DO IS CHECK MY TRANSMISSION DATABANK, MOBIUS IS ALWAYS FILLING IT UP WITH HIS PSYCHOTIC CALLS...
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我只需要检查一下我的传讯数据库，那儿总是塞满了莫比乌斯疯癫的呼叫……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH YES, THERE'S THE SCHEMATICS, JUST LIKE YOU SAID. HOW TRUTHFUL.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这就是那些图纸。就像你说的那样，多真实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{X-8 not repeated}As the Courier made his way through the X-8 facility, the computers analyzed the test subject's movements.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{X-8 not repeated}在邮差穿过X-8设施的时候，电脑们分析了该测试对象的运动数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}They eventually created new Cyberdogs to root out Commie traitors from the Wasteland... {more to himself}traitors like Betsy Bright... Richie Marcus...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}X-8最终创造出新的赛博犬，用来铲除那些潜伏在废土上共党叛徒…{more to himself}像贝琪.布莱特和里奇·马库斯那样的叛徒…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}...although they couldn't seem to find any Commies, so they turned on themselves, howling sonic barks that echoed miles across the landscape.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}…但它们好像没有找到任何共党。所以它们暴走了，开始攻击自己。它们互相发出的声波咆哮，在数里的范围内回荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{X-8 was repeated}As the Courier ran through the X-8 facility multiple times, the computers analyzed the test subject's movements.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{X-8 was repeated}在邮差反复多次穿过X-8设施时，电脑们分析了该测试对象的运动数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Rather than performing a superficial observation, they realized the subject barely knew what Communism was - or even what a high school was.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}它们没有进行粗浅的监测，而是意识到这个测试对象几乎不知道什么是共产主义，甚至连什么是高中都不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}This confused them for a time, until the facility finally realized that its research had... {surprised}succeeded.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}这一度让它们非常困惑，直到这所设施最后意识到，它的研究早已…{surprised}成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}So it let its Cyberdogs out into the wastes to help protect small communities from physical aggression rather than communist propaganda.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}于是它让赛博犬进入废土，去保护那些小聚落免受物理层面的袭击，而不再是精神层面的共党宣传攻势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{X-13 not repeated}The infiltration program in X-13 continued to scan for the subject and the Stealth Suit prototype long after the test was over.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{X-13 not repeated}X-13的潜入测试程序还在不停地搜寻测试对象和原型潜行衣的踪迹，哪怕测试早已结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Frustrated and unable to find its lost technology, X-13 expanded its network of laser tripwires, sensors, and Robobrains out across Big {Mountain}MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}对无法找回失去的技术感到沮丧，X-13将激光绊线、传感器、机器脑部署在了整个大山脉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}This glittering blue light beam forest cleanly bisected anything that entered its depths, slicing them into small, segmented parts for easy disposal.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}一束束密集的蓝光构成幽深的激光树林，将所有深入其中的东西切成两半，然后再细细切做臊子，以便于清理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{X-13 was repeated}{Sexually suggestive, as if the center blew its load into the suit tech}The infiltration program in X-13 felt spent, having repeatedly upgraded the Stealth Suit until it could upgrade it no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{X-13 was repeated}{Sexually suggestive, as if the center blew its load into the suit tech}X-13的潜入测试程序感到被榨干了，它反复给潜行衣升级，直到升不动了为止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It felt warm, fulfilled, and a bit sluggish. {Beat, suspicious}It realized not long after, the Stealth Suit had left it without so much as a note on the nightstand.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}它感到温暖、满足，和一点小小的慵懒。{Beat, suspicious}之后不久，它发觉潜行服已经离开了，连一张放在床头柜的纸条都没有给它留下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}So the infiltration program sent out Robobrains into the wastes looking for its wayward technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}所以，潜入程序向废土派出了机械脑，去寻找它那任性的小技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It eventually found REPCONN HQ, and set up a {emph}new research center, testing and murdering Fiends who kept breaking into the facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}它最终找到了REPCONN总部，然后设立了一个{emph}新的研究中心，用来试验和谋杀那些不断进入设施里的恶魔帮们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Mobius alive}Dr. Mobius continued his research undisturbed in the Forbidden Zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Mobius alive}在禁区，莫比乌斯博士心无旁骛地继续着他的研究。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}As much as he had attempted to create better scorpions, he tried the same with humanity, with considerably less success.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}就像他试图制造更好的机械蝎那样，他也付出同样多的心血，尝试让人类变得更好，虽然取得的成果要少很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}These failures didn't bother him overmuch. Once the rush of Mentats wore off, he forgot he had failed in any event.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}但这些失败并不会让他困扰。一旦曼他特带来的快感消失，他就会忘记他曾有的任何失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Gentle, complimentary}After all, the bright young mind who had come to visit him in the Forbidden Zone had already exceeded his expectations.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Gentle, complimentary}毕竟，那个曾到禁区拜访他的聪明年轻人早已经超出了他的预期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Mobius dead}The Forbidden Zone continued to be, true to its name, forbidden. No more Robo-Scorpions were sighted in its canyons.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Mobius dead}禁区还是那样名副其实，它的峡谷中再也没有出现过机械蝎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Big {Mountain}MT became even emptier, devoid of Dr. Mobius' proclamations forecasting the destruction of anything that dared possess sentience.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}大坑洞{Mountain}变得更空荡了。以往宣称要毁灭一切知觉生物的广播，莫比乌斯博士的广播，已不再存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Still, it is said he lived on in the equations inscribed on the floor and walls of the Forbidden Zone dome...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}但是依旧流传有这样的说法：他还在禁区穹顶，就活在那些地板和墙上的方程式中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're past due for your lobotomy, Klein.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于你做过的大脑切除手术，是时候算账了，克莱因。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A... FIGHT? I... I'VE NEVER BEEN IN A FIGHT. WHAT... UH, WHAT, WHAT, WHAT DO I...
ESP.TRADUIT: 要…要打架？我…我从来都没打过架呐！什么…我我到底该…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: AIIGGHGHH! COLLEAGUES! THINK TANK! ALERT! ALERT! WE ARE UNDER ATTACK!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊啊啊啊啊啊！同事们！思想体！警报！警报！我们正在遭受攻击！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not handing my brain over... there's some things we should discuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会交出我的大脑……有些事情我们需要谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Disdainful}AND WHAT COULD WE POSSIBLY HAVE TO SPEAK ABOUT. YOU HAVE THE BRAIN. WE HAVE THE TECHNOLOGY. ALL YOU MUST DO... IS SURRENDER.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Disdainful}我们还有需要谈什么？你有脑子，我们有技术。你所需要做的仅仅是…交出你的大脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: WITH IT, WE CAN FINALLY LEAVE THIS PLACE. I CANNOT TELL YOU HOW BORING THIS PLACE GETS, CHOPPING UP THE LANDSCAPE AND EVERYTHING IN IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了它，我们终于可以离开这鬼地方了。我都没法告诉你这地方变得有多无聊。我们只能一直待在这，把这里的一切切碎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND WE HAVE SO MANY QUESTIONS TO ASK YOUR BRAIN FIRST. ABOUT THIS... MOJAVE PLACE. A FERTILE TESTING GROUND FOR OUR EXPERIMENTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且我们有很多问题要问你的脑子。关于这个…叫莫哈维的地方。对于我们的实验来说，这可是一片丰饶的试验田啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found my brain, now you and I are going to settle things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到我的脑子了。现在我们是时候解决一些事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I RECOMMEND WATCHING YOUR TONE WITH ME, LOBOTOMITE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说话时，注意你的语气，无脑人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOW... "YOUR" BRAIN. HAND IT OVER. OR WE'LL EXTRACT IT AGAIN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在…“你的”大脑。把它交出来。否则我们就再把它挖出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've defeated your Giant Robo-Scorpion, you're next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经打败了你的机械巨蟹，而你就是下一个。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... did I leave that on? {To self}I thought I'd powered it down - {realization}was wondering what was causing the power outages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢…我忘记把那玩意关了？{To self}我记得我关了呀——{realization}难怪刚刚停电了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surrender, Mobius, I don't want to fight you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 投降吧，莫比乌斯。我不想和你打。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. Well... that's good. Were we supposed to fight? I certainly don't feel violent, but... well, these contraptions make it hard to tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。好吧……这很好。我们应该相斗吗？我也没觉得有受到暴力攻击，但是…好吧，待在这罐子里，确实不太好分辨不同的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}We could say more, but the stories in the Big Empty speak for themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}我们还能再说更多，不过大坑洞的故事不言而喻，无需多费口舌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Now armed with the {Trans-portal-ponder, combination mish-mash of Transporter + Transponder}Transportalponder, the Courier could return to the Dome at any time and crack open the secrets of the Big Empty, one by one.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}现在有了{Trans-portal-ponder, combination mish-mash of Transporter + Transponder}传送器，邮差可以随时回到穹顶，然后继续一个接一个地揭露大坑洞的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Sink sat vigilant, waiting for its master to return, shoes covered in Mojave dust.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}汇聚节点一直恪尽职守，等待着鞋子沾满莫哈维沙尘的主人再度光临。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Draw this to a close, wraps up the end movie}Only one road yet remained, and it was one the Courier had to walk alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Draw this to a close, wraps up the end movie}现在只剩下一条路了。而这条路，邮差必须要独自去走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Bad Karma}{Ruthless, authoritative}As it had been in the years before the Great War, Big {Mountain}MT... the Big Empty... became home to one of the most powerful minds of the 23rd century.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Bad Karma} {Ruthless, authoritative}就如伟大战争前的那些日子，大山脉{Mountain}…或者说大坑洞…聚集了23世纪最强大的头脑们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Courier who had been brought to the Big Empty became its new overlord, using its facilities ruthlessly and decisively when needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}那个被带到大坑洞的邮差，成为了这里新的主宰。只要有需要，他就会果决无情地使用这里的设施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Sometimes Science is more than a quest for discovery - it is a weapon to be used in the service of one with the strength to understand it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}有时，科学不仅仅是为了探索发现新事物，它更是一把武器，为有实力理解它的人所用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma}As it had been in the years before the Great War, Big {Mountain}MT... the Big Empty... became home to one of brightest minds of the 23rd century.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Good or Neutral Karma}就如伟大战争前的那些日子，大山脉{Mountain}…大坑洞…聚集了23世纪最聪明的头脑们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Courier watched over the Big Empty for years to come, caring for it, and keeping its discoveries safe until they were needed to help others.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}在以后的岁月里，邮差一直看管着大坑洞，悉心守护着它的科学发现，直到有一天它们需要用来帮助别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Which had always been Big {Mountain}MT's purpose. Past the laboratories and Science, it had always been intended as a place to build the future of all mankind.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}这本就是大山脉{Mountain}存在的目的。除了实验和科学，它一直都被设计成一个构建全人类未来的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Think Tank alive}Dr. Klein and the Think Tank remained alive, unaware of the world outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Think Tank alive}克莱因博士和其他思想体活了下来，并且对外面的世界毫无察觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}They looped through their daily routine, none the wiser about the world beyond... although perhaps "wiser" was the wrong word.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}他们每天按部就班地的生活，日复一日，对外面的世界一无所知…不过也许知道的太多也不是件好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The world outside belonged to the Courier, and if anyone would shape it... well, the Courier had already called dibs.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}外边的世界属于邮差。如果他们想要插足其中…好吧，还得先问过邮差的意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Think Tank dead}The Think Tank basement, filled with the lobotomized robotical frames of the doctors, now served as a graveyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Think Tank dead}博士们的大脑被“切除”了之后，剩余的机械骨架残骸被堆在智库的地下室。那里现在成了一个墓地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The monitors had recorded the battle in its entirety, including the Think Tank's final shrill terrified screams, whimpers, and pleas for mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}他们的监视器记录了战斗的全过程，包括思想体们惊恐凄厉的惨叫、呜咽以及求饶的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}They broadcast these humiliating last moments as a warning to anyone approaching the perimeter that other smarty-pants were not welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Narration}他们将那耻辱的最后时刻向外广播，意在警告其他接近边界的自作聪明的家伙：这里不欢迎他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The {emph}Courier was the inheritor of the Big Empty, and there was room for only {emph}one will in the halls of the Think Tank Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}那位{emph}邮差成为了大坑洞的继承者。智库穹顶只容得下一个{emph}至高无上的意志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}In the aftermath, Big Mountain's silent experiments went to sleep, their creators slowly dying in the new world that had been left behind.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}战后，大山脉在无声的实验中走向沉睡，它们的创造者也被遗忘在新世界的角落里，渐渐死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}On the night of October 23rd, 2077, the scientists received an answer that put all their questions to rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}2077年10月23日的晚上，科学家们收到了一个答案，让他们所有躁动的问题归于沉寂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([01003735]NVDLC03Intro) 01003735 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: StealthSuitEQUIPBark
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行服装备载音

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Stealth Suit Equip Bark>
ESP.TRADUIT: <潜行服装备载音>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Injecting Stimpak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在注射治疗针。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will keep you on your feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这会让你痊愈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does that feel better?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好些了么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please take this. I don't want you to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请使用这个吧，我不想你死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a Stimpak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来针治疗针吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're out of Stimpaks. {Quiet, depressed}Maybe you'd be better off with an Auto-Doc suit....
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的治疗针用完了。{Quiet,depressed}或许你穿一件自动医疗服会更好…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more Stimpaks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有治疗针了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't give you anything for that injury.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有能给你处理伤口的东西了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good boys and girls take their Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好孩子要打吗啡针-X。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will stop the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这能止痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Technically, it's impossible to overdose on painkillers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 理论上说，过量使用止痛药是不可能的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will only sting for a second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只会疼一下下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take this, it will help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用这个，会有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh no! We're out of Med-X!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不！我们的吗啡针-X用完了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope it doesn't hurt too bad, we don't have any Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望那伤得不重，我们没有吗啡针-X了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more medicine. So sad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 悲伤，没有药品了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cessation of hostilities complete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗状态已终止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad guys dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坏人已被消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fighting over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was that all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开战时间到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-oh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呼-哦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready... steady... fighty!
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备…稳住…战斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This one looks pretty tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个看上去不好对付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sneaking done. Fighting now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行结束。现在开战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜拜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did I do something wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做错了什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you like me any more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不再喜欢我了么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会走开的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll miss you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会想你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello. It's nice to meet you. Who can I hide you from today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好！见到你真高兴。今天我能帮你躲避谁呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sneaky sneaky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 隐蔽，隐蔽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever wanted to be invisible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想要过隐身？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you even know you were wearing me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你正在穿着我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shhh... we're very stealthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘘…我们现在非常隐蔽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you love me if I help you hide?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我帮你隐蔽，你会喜欢我么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do so love integers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我太喜欢整数了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm imagining all sorts of imaginary numbers right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在脑中虚构各种各样的虚数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm running out of floor space for my calculations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地板快被我的算式填满了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hums as he bustles about, dum de dum, as if happy to be working}:: Hums ::
ESP.TRADUIT: {Hums as he bustles about, dum de dum, as if happy to be working}::哼唱声::
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Singing to himself, tune of "Dry Bones"}Electron's attached to the... neutron. The neutron's attached to the... meson. Meson's connected to the... proton.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Singing to himself, tune of "Dry Bones"}电子连接着…中子。中子连接着…介子。介子连接着…质子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They said I was mad. Preposterous. Not an angry bone in my body, had them all removed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说我疯了。荒谬。我身上一根怒骨都找不到，它们早就从我体内被移除了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And one... as in MOBIUS has won! {Evil laugh}I hope it's blowing up right now in your faces.{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯：一，就如莫比乌斯必将一统大山脉！{Evil laugh}我真希望它现在就在你们面前炸开。{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: TWO AS IN TOO LATE.{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：二，就如而今已经太晚了。{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Mobius?! Uh, three as in we, as in we are in trouble. That didn't rhyme.*{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*莫比乌斯？！呃，三，就如烦，就如我们麻烦大了。我好像没押上韵。*{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Four as in 4-BIDDEN! Do you hear me Think Tank? It is I, Mobius, hacking your frequencosity.{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯：四，就如禁止！思想体们，听见没有？是我，莫比乌斯，我黑进了你们的频率。{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Five by five... {pauses}someone's coming in live...*{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*五。信号强度满格五…{pauses}有人连线很清楚。*{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nine, all will be fine.{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：九。希望我们能得救。{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -SIX! Halfway to destruction, measured in clicks!-{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-六！毁灭读秒已过半，余留时间没多久！-{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: SEVEN. YES, SEVEN.{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：七。是的，七。{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "8, counting down." EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Ten? Borous... why the hell did you install an atomic core?! It'll blow when we reach "one," right?*{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*十？鲍鲁斯…见鬼了你给它装原子核干吗？！等我们数到"一"就会爆炸，对吧？*{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Gabe! NO! His Cyberdog atomic core - it's ACTIVE! That means an exceedingly IMPRECISE countdown to critical failure in...-{2D}
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-加布！不！他的赛博犬原子核，已经激活了！这意味着在极其不准确的倒计时之后，就会迎来严重失败…-{2D}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5CB]NVDLC03X8CountdownQuest) 0100E5CB (EDID) EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D - broadcast over speakers}What, are you a salesman? Go away. There is no access to the Dome. It is FORBIDDEN. {Beat}And locked.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D - broadcast over speakers}什么，是售货员吗？走开，穹顶闲人免进。这里是禁区，{Beat}也被锁上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D - broadcast over speakers}Attention: Visitors. Combat experiment in progress. Please put on your goggles and take your Rad-X now.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D - broadcast over speakers}注意：来访者，战斗试验正在进行。请戴上护目镜，并服用放射线-X。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D - broadcast over speakers}The X-42 Giant Robo-Scorpion... is alive! Awaken, my pet, initiate your search-and-destroy protocol in the name of all that is Mobius!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D - broadcast over speakers}X-42机械巨蝎…苏醒了！醒来吧，我的宠物，以莫比乌斯之名，启动你的“搜索-毁灭”协议！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0100F428] (mod) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's Salient Green?
ESP.TRADUIT: 绿色浆糊是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just the miracle of life in sticky, gooey, liquid form, baby! Heat that gunk up over a campfire, and just watch it congeal into all kinds of plants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是粘的、胶质的、液体形态的生命奇迹，宝贝儿！把那团浆糊在火上加热，然后只管看着它凝结成各种各样的植物吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if I bring you samples of dried plant life, you can clone them and grow them in these planters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果我带给你风干的植物样本，你就可以克隆它们，并种植在这些花盆里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know it baby. I just need some samples and I got you going. Take a few days, but trust me - it's all kinds of good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道的，宝贝，我只需要一些样本就行。需要花几天时间，但是相信我——好处很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to process some plants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要处理掉一些植物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love it when you talk like that. Let me just get that interface up and running for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乐意效劳。让我把界面弄出来，为你处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry back with that seed now, baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快些带着种子回来，宝贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does that mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the miracle of life, baby. You bring me some succulent genetic samples, and I'll work my mojo on them. Clone you up all kinds of plants. Aw yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是生命的奇迹，宝贝。你给我带些多汁的基因样本，我就能施展魔力，为你克隆各种植物，噢耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also break them down for you, if you're into the kinky stuff. Bring me any old plant parts, and I'll grind them up into Salient Green for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你对那些古怪的东西很来劲，我也可以帮你将植物分解。带给我任何植物组织，我会把它们磨成绿色浆糊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you like that, don't you baby?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，你喜欢那样，不是吗，宝贝？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the miracle of life, baby. You bring me some succulent genetic samples, and I'll work my mojo on them. Clone you up all kinds of plants. Aw yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是生命的奇迹，宝贝。你给我带些多汁的基因样本，我就能施展魔力，为你克隆各种植物，噢耶！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also break them down for you, if you're into the kinky stuff. Bring me any old plant parts, and I'll grind them up into Salient Green for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你对那些古怪的东西很来劲，我也可以帮你将植物分解。带给我任何植物组织，我会把它们磨成绿色浆糊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you like that, don't you baby?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，你喜欢那样，不是吗，宝贝？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me again about what you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再和我说一次你是干什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I command you to open your port and receive my seed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我命令你打开端口，接收我的种子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, yeah, baby, just slip it in there. All the way down in that dark, moist earth. Mmm... launching interface.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢耶，宝贝，把它塞进那里。直捣那黝黑的，湿润的……泥土。嗯……正在登入界面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My seed? I think you've got your biology mixed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的种子？我想你把生物学知识弄混了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Naw, baby, I'm all about biology. I'm the original, certified, rarefied, testified GS-2000 Biological Research Station. I'm a seed-clonin' machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吶，宝贝，我就是为生物学而生的。我是原型、稀有、有资格、有测试保证的GS-2000 生物研究站。我是一个种子克隆机！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got seeds? I will clone the {emph}shit out of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有种子吗？我可以{emph}克隆出一大堆来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you just say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚才说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your seed, baby. I'm the original, certified, rarefied, testified GS-2000 Biological Research Station. Yes sir, I'm a seed-clonin' machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的种子，宝贝。我是新颖、原型、有资格、有测试保证的GS-2000生物研究站。是的，先生，我是一个种子克隆机！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got seeds? I'll clone the {emph}shit out of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有种子吗？我可以{emph}克隆出来一大堆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just came over to fill some of these empty bottles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是来给空瓶子灌点水的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Apologetic}Oh, I'd love to, darling, but the circuits that allow me to dispense water into non-organic containers burned out years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Apologetic}噢，我乐意效劳，亲爱的，但是相应的控制电路在多年前就烧毁了，我现在没法将水装进无机容器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd have to find a replacement for that module.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要找到那个模块的替代品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to need to find yourself some empties first before I can fill them for you. Any empty bottle will do... eh, just not too dirty, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得先找到一些空瓶子，我才能帮你装满它们。任何空瓶子都行…呃，只要别太脏，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can do that! They... {furtive, nervous}they've been thoroughly washed, haven't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题！它们…{furtive, nervous}它们都已经彻底清洗过了，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd just like a drink, thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想喝点水，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can have as much as you like! Just, eh... please don't put your lips on the faucet? It's so unsanitary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想喝多少就喝多少！只是，呃…请别把你的嘴唇放到管口上好吗？那太不卫生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem kind of worried about dirt. What's wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来有点过于在意污垢了。怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh, it's just so... unsanitary! Do you know how many germs are in one cubic centimeter of dirt? {Hysterical}Seventy... hundred... gajillion!
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔，那实在是…太不卫生了！你知道一平方厘米的污垢里有多少细菌吗？{Hysterical}七百万亿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you want that getting washed down your gullet day in and day out? I didn't think so!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让这么多细菌天天被咽下你的食道吗？我可不想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing right now. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在没什么事。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay loyal, Citizen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持忠诚，公民！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some seditious material for you to process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些反动材料给你处理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic, Citizen! Just input your quantity of seditious material on my interface, and in no time at all I'll have you a beautiful, clean book!
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好，公民！把你那大量的反动材料放进我的端口，我立马就给你制作出一本美丽的、洁净的书！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Won't that keep you happy and docile, Citizen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那难道不会让你快乐又温顺吗，公民？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eradicate sedition?
ESP.TRADUIT: 消除反动？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, Citizen! That's my duty and sole joy in life! All those books from before the War, full of seditious, treasonous, {emph}complicated thoughts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，公民！那是我的职责以及生命中唯一的乐趣！那些战前书籍，充满了反动{emph}、叛逆和难懂的思想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just dump them in and lickety-split I'll have them pulped, scrubbed clean, and pressed out again clean and white and sedition free!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把它们扔进来，我立刻就能把他们打成纸浆，擦洗干净，然后印刷出洁白干净，不含丝毫反动的书！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you do anything beyond healing me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了治疗我，你还能做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, firstly I would say providing wholeness of the body is service enough, but if you must know, I'm also programmed with cosmetical subroutines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，首先我得说，保证你的身体完整健康就已经很足够了，但如果你一定要了解，我也被写入了美容的子程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Diagnostics says they're off-line at the moment, though. Something about corrupted data files and all manner of such foolishness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过检查显示，该功能还处于离线状态。现在只有一些损坏的文件之类的可笑玩意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want a haircut or a nose-job that won't leave you looking like a Ghoul with {ALO-PEE-SHEE-AH}alopecia, you'll have to find replacement disks for them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想在理发或者鼻子整形后，看起来不像个秃顶的尸鬼{ALO-PEE-SHEE-AH}，你就得先找到美容程序的替代磁盘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, and I won't swear to this, but I recollect at some point having a few implant installation modules. Can't speak to where they got to, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，我记不太清了，但是印象中我以前还有些植入物的安装模块，虽然我也不知道它们去哪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need anything right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在什么也不需要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'll be right here if you change your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果你改变了想法，就再来这里找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to engage your services.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你的服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And rightly so, I should think. All right, then, let me just fire up the old interface for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正好我也是这么想的。好吧，让我为你启动那久未用过的界面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's me again. I wanted to ask some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又来了，我想问些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to ask you some @@[?-*##*-?]@@? questions.
Blasting me with static-y clicks isn't helpful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向我发出电流声是没用的…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did something happen with your voice module?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的发声模块出什么问题了？
