ESP.ORIGINAL: -And, what's a little loss when... so much is to be GAINED? Science. Yes. Science is our goal. Not emotional attachments. No!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -而且比起所获得的，这…只是小小的牺牲。科学，对，科学才是我们的目标，而不是情感依恋。绝不是！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's nothing to be ashamed of. Gabe knew his place - as a specimen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么丢人的。加布知道他的角色——作为一个实验样本。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Thank you. If you don't mind, I need a moment. To collect myself. Sort it out. Re-orient my... sense of self.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -谢谢。如果你不介意的话，我想一个人静静，好好想想，重新找回自己的感觉。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It sounds to me like you hurt someone who loved you very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你伤害了那个很爱你的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -As odd as it is, I believe that is the conclusion. And... I wonder why it didn't hit me before, until I saw that memory in your hands.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -尽管很奇怪，但我认为这就是结论。嗯…以前我还很诧异为什么它不袭击我，直到我看到你手里的这段回忆。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Slowly, slightly getting sad}No matter how awful my day had been, he... he was always waiting there. How odd. My gel is de-coagulating.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -{Slowly, slightly getting sad}无论以前我的生活有多糟糕，他…他总是在那儿等我。好奇怪的感觉，我的凝胶好像要融化了一样。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: -And when I would talk to him about Betsy - and how Marcus would beat on me and call me Smarty Sissy Pants, he'd just sit there, head on my knee.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -当我和他谈到贝琪，谈到马库斯怎样殴打我，骂我是自作聪明的娘娘腔废物的时候，他就坐在这儿，头靠在我的膝盖上。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: -还有…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad
NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: -If you don't mind, I'll take that bowl. Just... need to remove it. Put it away. Somewhere out of radar range.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -如果你不介意，我要拿走这个碗了。只是…要把它移开，放到我的雷达探测不到的地方。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -For some reason, its similarity to the Crater-shape of Big MT is starting to fill up all available cognitive spaces.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不知道为什么，这个与大山脉环形坑形状相同的碗，它好似要填满我的整个认知空间。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: -That, combined with my own overwhelming feeling of having done something terrible... the two are hitting me with... unexpected force.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -而且我有种强烈的感觉涌上心头，就像我做了什么很糟糕的事…这两者叠加起来…让我如遭重击。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I notice these results more and more now that I know to look for them. Come back anytime, and I'll show you what ELSE I've discovered.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我好像就快找到结论了，我想我应该把它们弄明白。随时回来，我会向你展示我发现了什么。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it seems to me it belongs to a friend of yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，这应该是你一位朋友的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{DUPE: Slowly, taking it in}Why... yes. Gabe.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -{DUPE: Slowly, taking it in}你怎么…没错，这是加布的。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... maybe it's like a memory or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…这应该像是某段记忆之类的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] -{Slowly, taking it in}Why... yes. Gabe.-
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] -{Slowly, taking it in}为什么…的确，加布他…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like Gabe really loved you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来加布真的很爱你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] -Oh, well it is of NO CONSEQUENCE. Gabe gave himself for Science! As we all have!-
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] -噢，你太大惊小怪了。加布献身给了科学！就像我们大家一样！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does this dog bowl look familiar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个狗碗你看着不陌生吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -WHAT? {Dawning recognition as sees old dog bowl}Oh... something familiar about it, yes. Is it... a Cazador skull? Always were bowl-shaped. Or were those the Bowlians we made?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -哈？{Dawning recognition as sees old dog bowl}噢…是挺眼熟的，对。这是…猎蜂的头骨？总是那种碗状的头骨。还是说…这是我们造的保龄球？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I confess, I am stumped. If you were to draw some other connection between that bowl and a research facility in Big MT, I may be of more help.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -好吧，我承认，我被难住了。但你要是告诉我它来自大山脉里哪个研究中心，我没准就能给你答案。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this Gabe's bowl? Your dog from X-8, Gabe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这碗是加布的吧？你那只在X-8里的狗，加布。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -WHAT? {Dawning recognition as sees old dog bowl}Why... yes, it is. I used to leave it outside his dog house, chock-full of chems. Before the cybernetic modifications, of course.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -什么？{Dawning recognition as sees old dog bowl}你怎么…没错，的确是加布的碗。 我过去常放在它的狗屋外面，碗里装满各种化学药品。当然，这是它进行机械改造前的事了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Thinking back, fondly, then starts to gets confused as the emotion hits him}And... no matter how chemmed the food, he would always eat it. And his tail, would wag... even...even while I... I...-
ESP.TRADUIT: -{Thinking back, fondly, then starts to gets confused as the emotion hits him}而且…不管食物里有多少化学品，加布总会吃下去。而且，它的尾巴总会摇啊摇…哪怕我…我…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Curious, sadness is starting to hit}You know, I am having the most perplexing feeling squiggling through my biogel. I can't quite... pin it down.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -{Curious, sadness is starting to hit}怎么说呢，有某种异样的感觉漾过我的生物凝胶。并且我…抑制不住它。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, trying to steal the X-2 Transmitter Array Antenna, are you? You won't succeed, not if my lethal Robo-Scorpions have any say in the matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈，想偷走X-2发射机天线阵列，是吗？你不可能得逞，还没问过我那致命的机械蝎们同不同意呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm feeling a little unwell in the head. Can you perform a psychiatric evaluation on me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我头部有些不适，能给我做个精神鉴定吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Concerned about the state of your mind, are ya? Well, such things ain't my specialty, but I'm happy to tender my opinion as to your mental health.
ESP.TRADUIT: 担心自己的精神状态，对吧？行，虽然不是我的专长，不过我很乐意能帮你保持心理健康。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should make you aware that the benefits of such a procedure are exclusive - that is, this only works once. Now are you sure this is what you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 事先提醒你，这项测试的效果是唯一的。就是说，它只能生效一次。还确定要继续吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some personality holotapes to install.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿有几个人格模块的磁带需要安装。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good sir. Merely interface the holotapes with my console's input/output port, and I shall upload them directly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，老爷。请将磁带放进控制台的出/入端口，我马上为您上传。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switch off the Sink's personality matrices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关闭汇聚节点的人格矩阵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Smugly pleased}Very good indeed, sir. "Throwing out the riff-raff" protocols engaged. All personality matrices are off-line, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Smugly pleased}明智之举，老爷。"清除人渣"协议已启动，所有人格矩阵均已离线，老爷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switch on the Sink's personality matrices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开启汇聚节点的人格矩阵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Taken aback; this is a terrible idea but you don't want to say so.}Do you, sir? Well, if that is sir's wish, it is my primary directive. Personality matrices on-line, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Taken aback; this is a terrible idea but you don't want to say so.}老爷，您当真吗？好吧，既然您希望如此，我自当遵命。人格们现在全部上线了，老爷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to buy some things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想买些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good, sir. If I might suggest a table wine, the 64 Atomic Claret is a lovely little vintage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，老爷。若您找的是佐餐酒，恕我失礼，64年的原子波尔多红葡萄酒是个不错的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good, sir. And might I venture to opine that a new Trilby might be just the thing to complete sir's ensemble?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，老爷。恕我失礼，我以为，再搭上顶新呢帽，您这身行头就更完美了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good, sir. Should sir be in the market for a new suit of morning wear, I have several suggestions that might suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，老爷。您若想添置一套晨间套服，我也许能提供些建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，老爷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind, let me ask you something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，让我问你些其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indubitably, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，老爷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I can access their functions without loading the personality holotapes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那要是不加载人格模块的磁带，我还能使用那些功能吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tragically, the core operating systems are also located on the personality tapes, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常遗憾，核心控制系统也位于人格磁带上，老爷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the tape is installed, sir may request I switch their dialectic interfaces off, and I shall oblige with great delectation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 磁带被安装后，您可以要求我关闭它们的语言交互功能，我很乐意效劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, sir will still be required to locate and install a backup holotape to access their functionality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，老爷还是得先找来那些备份磁盘，这样才能激活它们的功能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这么说？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other modules are rather... erratic, sir. Their personality matrices are built on flawed logic and have not weathered the years well, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他那些人格模块相当的…不正常，老爷。它们的人格矩阵建立在有缺陷的逻辑之上，多年来也没有经受住考验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean there are other... personality modules here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说…这里还有其他的人格模块？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed, sir, though if sir's aim is to activate them I lament to inform sir that most have been offline for some years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您说的没错，老爷。但您若是想激活其他人格，请容我斗胆告知，它们中大多数在多年前就已离线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If sir were to ask my opinion, I should venture that sir is better off without them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您要是想征询我的意见，我只能说，它们不回来会更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, if sir is determined to inflict upon sir's self their dubious services, sir might locate backup personality disks elsewhere in the facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，若老爷您实在需要它们那些不靠谱的服务，那么也许您能在其他设施中找到它们的备份磁盘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What services do you provide?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提供什么服务？

ESP.ORIGINAL: In addition to managing the personality matrices of the other household utilities, I can provide sir with direct access to the commissary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了管理房屋内其他功能设施的人格矩阵外，我还能为您连接物资供应服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any goods sir might require may be purchased through my shopkeep interface, whence tiny robots shall deliver them forthwith to this very domicile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 利用我的商店交易界面，您可以订购需要的物品，这些物品随后会由微型机器人送至这一住所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you some kind of Artificial Intelligence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是某种人工智能吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regrettably not, sir. All modules in this habitat are synthetic personalities atop a mundane operating system. There is no intelligence here, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾，老爷，并不是的。老爷，这里的都是附着在操作系统上的人造人格，还称不上是人工智能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Sir?" You are aware that I'm a woman, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: "老爷"？你能看出我是女人，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indubitably, sir, but it is with a great lugubriousness that I must disclose that my programmers installed only the masculine honorific, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，老爷。但极度遗憾的是，我的制作者只为我的语法库加入了针对男性的敬语，老爷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moreover they neglected to enclose a parameter by which said honorific might be omitted altogether - over my most strenuous of remonstrances, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，老爷，我曾极力谏言过，只要加入一个参数，就能完全省略敬语。但谏言并没有被采纳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had some other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Questions are dangerously close to independent thought, citizen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提问距离独立思考仅有一步之遥，这可是个危险的行为，公民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blank books, huh? Yeah, I think I can find a use for those.
ESP.TRADUIT: 空白的书？有点意思。嗯，我倒是能用它做些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're thinking like a citizen, Citizen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你考虑问题开始像个真正的公民了，公民！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But those books are our last legacy of the time before! You can't destroy them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那些书是旧世界留给我们最后的遗产了！你不能就这么毁掉它们！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Citizen, that sounds dangerously seditious. If my re-indoctrination module was installed, I'd take care of that for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公民，知道你刚刚的话有多危险多反动吗！要是装了洗脑模块，我就得关照关照你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, that system was cut for budget concerns, so you'll have to perform your own indoctrination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可惜，这个系统由于预算紧缩没能完成，所以洗脑就只能靠你自己了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, to begin with, you'll need a cage that can fit over your head and a sack of Mole Rats...
ESP.TRADUIT: 要进行自我洗脑，首先需要准备一个大小适合，能容纳自己脑袋的铁笼，还有一麻袋鼹鼠…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you make blank books? What's the point of that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的功能就是做无字白书？这有什么意义啊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blank books are better for the mind, Citizen! Real science by real men in lab coats has proved that introducing outside thoughts confuses the brain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 空白的书能助你思想健康，公民！权威科学家的权威性实验表明，吸收外部思想会让你的脑子变糊涂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blank books encourage the reader not to question, but to blindly and zealously accept what's put in front of him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 空白的书能促使读者别去提问，只要盲目积极地接受面前的一切就好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, I suppose you could use them to keep a journal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，我觉得你还能拿它来记日记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, we've been down this road already. Moving on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我们已经探讨过这个问题了。就此打住吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. If you're certain of your conclusions, my little teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，只要你已经得出确定的结论，我的小泰迪熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... so you confuse toy bears with... humans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…你是分不清玩具熊和…人类吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED] {Huff}What? Nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}[成功] {Huff}什么？一派胡言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I get it - you like "playing" with humans, do you? Watching them move? Blink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我懂了。你喜欢和人类"做游戏"，是吧？你喜欢观察他们的活动？观察他们眨眼？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}[FAILED] {Uneasy}I confuse nothing of the sort. One is fluffy, the other has a drastically reduced fluffiness quotient.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}[失败] {Uneasy}我当然分得清。它俩一种全身毛茸茸的，另一种的毛相对前者以几何级数减少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are totally confusing me right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这回你完全把我搞糊涂了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure your words aren't jumbled?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定自己没在说胡话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Teddy bears come in many sizes. Your size is what intrigues me the most. Some say that teddy bears can't be living, breathing things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泰迪熊有许多型号，但最吸引我的还是你这种。一些人认为泰迪熊不能是活生生的，会呼吸的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are {emph}wrong. They are large, biological forms, breathing, heaving, snarling, coughing... mmmmm. Lobotomites are {emph}my teddy bears, oh yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们{emph}错了。他们很大，有生物的身体，会呼吸，胸腔能起伏，他们会咆哮，还能咳嗽…嗯没错，无脑人就是{emph}我的泰迪熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I thought you liked them. You keep referring to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想你喜欢它们。它们都成你的口头禅了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I like... {emph}teddy bears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我喜欢的是…{emph}泰迪熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a real teddy bear, if you want it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个真的泰迪熊，想要就拿去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Player holds up a teddy bear}Whatever for?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Player holds up a teddy bear}这是什么意思？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A looping gesture of extortion, maybe. Hand over the goods.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是一种代表勒索的循环姿势。总之给我把东西都交出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm actually here for a... breather.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上我来这是为了…喘口气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll tell the others if you don't make it worth my while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有封口费的话我就把这件事告诉其他人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Curious}Really? What is this... you seek to shame me in front of the others? How intriguing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Curious}真的吗？就是说…你想在其他人面前羞辱我？真期待。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'll partake. This shameful feeling is quite... invigorating. How new.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会参与的，这份羞耻感有点…汹涌，真新鲜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Pleased}And... you'll keep coming back to collect your payment, correct? Yes... yes, that will be fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Pleased}那个…你还会回来勒索我的，对不对？没错…没错，真是太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slowly, as if she enjoys this}Here, please... take this from me with your rough, bacterial-laden hands. My stored, repressed juices as your filthy compensation.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slowly, as if she enjoys this}给，请…用你粗糙的、满是细菌的手收下这个。这是给你的报酬，上面涂满了我长期压抑着的下流汁液。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could come back any time and just breathe, if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想，我可以随时回来，然后在你面前呼吸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet}Would you? I... feel so ashamed, but... yet, so intrigued. You'll need to give me a rest in between visits, or else my gel might... run over.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet}可以吗？我…我感觉好羞愧，但…还是，还是拒绝不了。在你下次来访前，请给我点时间休息，否则我的生物凝胶说不定会…流得到处都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're ready... let me radar scan you... slowly. {SFX noise, but says the word}Wooooo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好了就…让我的雷达慢慢扫描你。{SFX noise, but says the word}呜呜呜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {She says these out loud}WooooooOOOO. Burble, burble. WOOOO. Bloop. Blooop. Bloooop. BuuuUUUURBLE.
ESP.TRADUIT: {She says these out loud}喔哦哦哦，呜，呜，喔哦哦，呜呃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You all are a bunch of hypocrites. Claiming superiority, but you miss being human, admit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们尽是些虚伪的家伙。承认吧，口口声声说自己高人一等，但在心底你们又怀念身为人的感觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I cannot deny it. The illogic of it... the betrayal of our own beliefs. I blame my curiosity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，我不能否认。它缺乏逻辑，我们违背了自己的信条。都怪我好奇心太重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you just give in? There's nothing wrong with looking at the human body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不大大方方承认呢？盯着人体看又没有什么过错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dawning realization}Perhaps... perhaps there is value in what you say. I... I did so enjoy breathing once. Long ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Dawning realization}也许…也许你说的没错。我…我以前确实很喜欢呼吸的感觉…很久很久以前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Run your hands along the sides of your face, then exhale rapidly.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <双手沿着脸颊滑下，然后迅速呼气>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Turn and cough roughly, then slowly scratch nose.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <转过头去，大声咳嗽，然后缓慢地挠鼻子>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Close eyelids, breathe deeply, then stretch languidly.>
ESP.TRADUIT: <闭上眼睑，深呼吸，然后慵懒地伸展身体>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Player is doing a lap dance in front of her, basically}What... what are you doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Player is doing a lap dance in front of her, basically}你…你在干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop it. Why... why are you making me partake in this... filthy formography?
ESP.TRADUIT: 停，为…为什么你要对着我展示这种…下流的形体姿态？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough! I am already... intrigued. You have sufficiently... percolated me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 够了！我完全…被迷住了。你让我…体液都漏出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what it is about the biology of Lobotomites. It... it infects my thoughts. All that skin and muscle... and tissue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这种无脑人的生物行为是什么。但它…感染了我的思维。我现在脑海里全是那些皮肉…还有组织。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem... to... be looking at me a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像…总盯着我看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED] {Huff}What? Nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}[成功] {Huff}什么？一派胡言.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't help but notice your... fascination with the human body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不得不说，你对人体…太过着迷了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}[FAILED] {Uneasy}Your... your... primitive eyes deceive you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}[失败] {Uneasy}那只是你的…你那对…原始的眼睛欺骗了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no... there are no "needs" contained within my soft, soft gel. Eh... much... much... like the soft... gel of your eyes. {Firm}No, nothing here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不对，不对…我软软的凝胶一点"需求"也没有。呃…就像…就像…你那软软的胶状眼睛一样。{Firm}不对，我一点感觉也没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems to me you have more... biological needs than your counterparts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看上去，比起那些同事，你有更多的…生理上的需求.

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Huff}What? Nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Huff}什么？一派胡言.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dupe}It seems to me you have more... biological needs than your counterparts.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Dupe}看上去，比起你的那些同事，你有更多…生理上的需求。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Huff}What? Nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Huff}什么？一派胡言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Helped any animals discover their genetic potential recently?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近又帮助那些动物发掘他们基因的潜力了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -INDEED. After the memory you accessed about Gabe, I've been looking for ways to help nurture life.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是的。你让我想起加布以后，我就开始研究培育新生命的技术。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Look at THESE. Aren't they quite look-worthy? All dripping with the residue of creation. Wondrous.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -来看看这个。看起来很有价值，对吧？都是造物时留下的残余物。多神奇啊。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blindly operate on any poor animals recently?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近又拿那些可怜的小动物开刀了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Why, YES. Although the term is RESEARCH. Thank you.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -怎么，哦当然了。不过你应该说“研究”。谢谢。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Look at THESE. They seem to be found inside some of the specimens here at Big MT.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -看看这个，这些是从大山脉几个实验样本的体内找到的。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It certainly is... interesting. Whatever it once was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看上去…满新奇的。不管它以前是什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You know what, I'm not even going to pretend. I broke one of the monitors, and those innards start falling out everywhere.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *算了你知道吗，我也不掩饰了。我打破了一个显示器，结果这些部件掉的到处都是。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Conspiratorially}If you could just hold on to that for me until... well, forever, that would be welcome.*
ESP.TRADUIT: * {Conspiratorially}你要是愿意帮我收着它们直到…呃，海枯石烂，我完全乐意。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This scrap metal is supposed to be something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些废金属一定有什么用吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like junk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着像是垃圾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *It's a {emph}discovery, kilomiles beyond your understanding, that...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *这个{emph}发现，远远不是你能理解的，那…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *As for discoveries... well... of course. Look at this! Just... uh... built it. Amazing, isn't it?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *你说探索发现…呃…当然有啊。看这个！刚…呃…造出来的。挺令人赞叹的，是吧？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yeah, I... uh... "discovered" more internal parts in the monitors here. If you could, uh, hold on to my "discovery," I'd appreciate it.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哦，我…那个…我从这儿的监视器里"发现"了更多的零部件。如果你愿意，额，收下我的"发现"，我会非常高兴。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}*Yeah, I... uh... "discovered" more internal parts in the monitors here. If you could, uh, hold on to my "discovery," I'd appreciate it.*
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}*哦，我…那个…我从这儿的监视器里"发现"了更多的零部件。如果你愿意，额，收下我的"发现"，我会非常高兴。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yeah, there were a few under the monitors here. Here you go. Keeps the place tidy.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哦对，监视器下还有一些。一块拿去吧。这下这儿就干净了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... "Zero," got any amazing discoveries to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…"0"，有什么可供分享的奇妙发现吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Pleased}You know, hearing my name said like that... it really de-rezes my screens.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{Pleased}知道吗，听别人这么叫我…就像把我的屏幕从睡眠中唤醒一样。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... "O," got any amazing discoveries to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…"O"，有什么新的探索发现吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Pleased}O, do I? {Listening to how it sounds}Hmmm... O-Do-I... sounds like a song lyric.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{Pleased}哦，我有没有？{Listening to how it sounds}嗯嗯…O-Do-I…听起来就像抒情诗。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you, too, 8. Any new discoveries today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很高兴见到你，8。今天研究有什么新进展？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got anything for me? Let's see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么要给我？让我看看。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, literally, got anything to help pass the time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你有什么打发时间的东西吗，就是字面意义上的？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please don't make me spell it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托请别逼我直说好么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know... sonjaculate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂的…喷射声波。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... got anything to help me "pass" the "time?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…有什么能帮我"消磨时间"的东西吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006874] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D1]NVDLC03Dialogue8) Dialogue Dr. 8 Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: "What are you talking about?" EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need more of those worthless caps to test the CIU barter functions upstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还需要更多没用的瓶盖去测试楼上中央智能单元的交易功能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Might have a few left. Let me check...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *可能还有点，让我找找看…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You sure are testing that personality chip thoroughly. All right...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *这下你就能对那人格芯片测试个够了，好吧…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *This debugging obsession of yours really has you hooked. Either that, or is this is one weird hobby.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *你怎么对这测试这么着迷，是你的什么古怪爱好吗。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you and Klein say before about the Central Intelligence Unit barter functions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前关于中央智能单元的交易功能，你和克莱因说了什么来着？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] *Sure... let's see. What could we feed that stupid personality chip...*
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] *没问题…我想想。塞给那个弱智人格芯片什么好呢…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Ah, here we go, some worthless bottle caps. These should do it. Just dump them on its surface, then the trade interface should pop up.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *啊，就是它了，毫无价值的瓶盖。这应该有用。把瓶盖倒在上面，交易界面应该就能弹出来了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to need something to debug the Central Intelligence barter routines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些东西去测试中央智能单元的交易功能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] *I have no idea. I am a robotical engineer, not a... rememberer... of archaic trade routines.*
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] *我怎么知道。我是个机器人工程师，怎么会记得什么…过时交易程序是怎么运作的。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was interested in hearing more about the... science... the others... do. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了解更多这里的…科学，还有这里的…其他人都是做什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE}WHY, YES. WE ARE FILLED WITH THE KNOWLEDGE YOU SPEAK OF.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {DUPE}什么，是的。我们的确有着渊博的，你所谓的，知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}IF YOU WISH TO KNOW MORE, SIMPLY ASK THE OTHERS, THEY CAN HELP YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}如果你希望知道得更多，直接问他们吧。他们能满足你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be honored if I could hear any knowledge the Think Tank had to share on the sciences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果任何一位思想体能向我传授科学知识，我将不胜荣幸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {DUPE: Slightly indignant}IF YOU WANT TO FEED YOUR CURIOSITY ABOUT THE {Emph}OTHERS, GO ASK THE {Emph}OTHERS YOUR INTERROGATORY STATEMENTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {DUPE: Slightly indignant}如果你对别{emph}人感兴趣，那就带着你的疑问去找{Emph}他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to know more about the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道更多关于思想体的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] WHY, YES. WE ARE FILLED WITH THE KNOWLEDGE YOU SPEAK OF.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {DUPE}什么，是的。我们的确有着渊博的，你所谓的，知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF YOU WISH TO KNOW MORE, SIMPLY ASK THE OTHERS, THEY CAN HELP YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你希望知道得更多，直接问他们吧。他们能满足你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You all seem knowledgeable in your fields. No doubt there's much you can share with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们个个是自己领域的杰出人物。所以你们一定有很多知识能和我分享。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Slightly indignant}IF YOU WANT TO FEED YOUR CURIOSITY ABOUT THE {Emph}OTHERS, GO ASK THE {Emph}OTHERS YOUR INTERROGATORY STATEMENTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Slightly indignant}如果你对别{emph}人感兴趣，那就带着你的疑问去找{Emph}他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do. Here's the deal. I'm not going to surrender - you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。现在我给出我的条件。我是不会投降的，你应该向我投降。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not a democracy, it's a research facility. And over half your colleagues dispute your findings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是什么民主，这里可是研究院。何况你的同事里，超过一半都不认同你的结论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU DARE USE LOGIC AGAINST ME?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢用逻辑来挑战我？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds to me like your math is wrong - and the odds aren't good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你的算术不太好。现在和我打，你的胜算不高。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NONSENSE. THE MATHEMATICS OF THE SITUATION ARE ON OUR SIDE, LOBOTOMITE. I BELIEVE... NO WAIT, HMM. CARRY THE TWO... THEN...
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说，计算显示形势可是在我们这边，无脑人。我相信…嗯？等等，还要进二…然后…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: HMMM. IF THIS WERE A DEMOCRACY, I WOULD BE CONCERNED. WE ARE TOO... SCIENTIFIC FOR THAT. SO JUST SURRENDER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯…如果要讲民主的话，我会考虑的。我们都是那玩意的专家。所以你就…投降吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should confer with your colleagues first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你应该先和你的同事们商量一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NONSENSE. "CONFER?" "COLLEAGUES?" THOSE ARE TWO WORDS I DO NOT RECOGNIZE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说，“商量”？“同事”？我的字典里没有这两个词。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> No, I'm just kidding. Keep living the dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: ＜说谎＞不，我只是开个玩笑，继续做你的梦吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank God. For a second there I was afraid my whole purpose in life was obsolete and I was as redundant and useless as Muggy. Where was I? Oh, right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢天谢地，我差点以为我的人生目标已经过时了。我还以为我就像小杯具一样多余没用。对了，我说到哪了？哦，对对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Supervillain megalomania}Soon the world will burn in nuclear fire! Mwahaha!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Supervillain megalomania}很快这个世界就会被核爆的火焰焚尽，哈哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. A couple centuries ago, in fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。事实上，已经是几个世纪前的事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Well... fuck. That really puts a damper on the toaster's mood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？好吧…靠，有种一盆冷水泼下来的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, no use crying over spilled Armageddon - where was I? Oh, right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，没必要为这个已经毁灭的世界哭泣。我刚说到哪？哦哦，对对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Supervillain megalomania}Soon the world will burn in nuclear fire! {Hesitant, lame finish}Again!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Supervillain megalomania}很快这个世界就会沐浴在核爆的火焰里！{Hesitant, lame finish}再一次！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give it up. I have more important things to ask you about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行了行了，我有其他更重要的事情要问你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know the world already burned in nuclear fire, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗？这个世界已经被核爆毁灭过一次了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon I will - {breaking off rant, just hearing what the player said}What? It... It did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快我就会让这个世界…{breaking off rant, just hearing what the player said} 什么？它已经毁灭过了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got some toasters for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你带来了一些烤面包机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, well... what have we got here? Another innocent little toaster. Come here, I won't hurt you... hah! Gotcha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧…瞧瞧这是谁？又一个天真无邪的小烤面包机。过来，我不会伤害你的哦…哈，抓住你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes, the sweet smell of spilled electric guts, the sparking diodes - I fucking live for this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，没错，这喷薄而出的电子内脏的甜蜜味道，这闪着火花的二极管——我他妈的就好这口！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep an eye out for any Saturnite Power Fists then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会搜集那些土星动力拳套的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You find one, you bring it on back here, and we'll burn this mother down!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是找到了，就带给我，然后我们就可以他妈的把这全烧光！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean like this one?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说像这个？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, baby, that is a thing of fuckin' beauty! Give it here, I'll soup it up for ya!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，宝贝，这玩意太他妈的漂亮了，拿过来，我帮你改良它的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There ya go! Have fun with that. Burn the fuckin' world for me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿好了，你爱怎么玩都行。替我把这个该死的世界烧掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else do you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还会做些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want some weapon schematics? I can show you some fucking weapon schematics! You want a superheated Saturnite Power Fist? I can hook that shit up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要一些武器图纸？我可以展示给你看！你想要炙热的土星动力拳套么？我可以立刻给你弄一个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I said, bring me a Saturnite Power Fist and I'll hook that shit up for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我说的那样，给我一个土星动力拳套，我就能给它淬火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: About that Superheated Saturnite Power Fist...
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于那个炙热的土星动力拳套…

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you murder toasters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你谋杀了烤面包机？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not just murder! I tear them apart and render them down to their base components! Once their guts are spilled, you can do with them what you like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不仅仅是杀了！我还把他们撕成了碎片，变成一个个电子零件！只要他们的机械内脏露出来了，你就可以随心所欲地折磨它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to change the subject.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们换个话题吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, since I can't kill you, I guess I have to listen to your inane questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，既然我杀不了你，我想我也只能听听你的愚蠢问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you do anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还能做些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else, he asks. Like I don't long for the chance to be more than a neurotic busboy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他问我还能做什么。好像我乐意当个神经质的洗碗工一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh! Anything else, she asks. Like I don't long for the chance to be more than a neurotic busboy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！还能做什么。好像我乐意当个神经质的洗碗工一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you must know, at one point Dr. Mobius programmed me to manufacture electronic components in my central chassis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你非要知道的话，莫比乌斯博士给我编过程，让我能在自己的机箱里制造电子元件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That module got corroded when the Toaster spilled hot crumbs down my vents, though. If you find a back-up somewhere, I could maybe do that for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但有次烤面包机将滚烫的面包屑溅进我的通风口之后，我那个模块就受损了。如果你能为我找到备用模块，我也许就能帮你的忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why all the rage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你总是充斥着怒火？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever tried to indulge an all-consuming urge to kill when you don't have opposable thumbs? Or hands? Or anything other than a bread slot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有着压抑不住的杀戮渴望，但你却没有拇指，或者手，或者除了面包槽以外的任何工具，你知道这是什么感觉吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd have a lot of pent-up anger too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 假如你和我一样，你也会有难以压抑的怒火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I for one am quaking in my boots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，真是吓得我瑟瑟发抖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buddy, if my heating element were just a little bigger, you'd be on fire right now. On fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，如果我的加热元件再稍微大一点，你早就着火了，着火了你知道吗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's change the subject.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们换个话题吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is the new subject mugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有关杯子的话题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Flee before my terrible power!
ESP.TRADUIT: 对！在我无穷的力量下快逃命吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm almost afraid to ask what your function is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我差点就怕到不敢问你的功能是什么了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should be afraid! I am the scourge of all small appliances and the bogeyman that keeps lesser toasters awake at night!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该害怕！我是所有小电器的噩梦，是让小烤面包机睡不着觉的怪物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tremble? You're a toaster. How fearsome can you be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐惧？你不过是台烤面包机，你还能有多吓人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A toaster is just a death ray with a smaller power supply! As soon as I figure out how to tap into the main reactors, I will burn the world!
ESP.TRADUIT: 烤面包机能发射死亡射线，只不过能量供应比较少罢了！一旦我知道怎么接入主反应堆，我就能烧毁整个世界！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do with the mugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要杯子有什么用？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm supposed to keep them clean - oh, God, the thought of all those dirty dishes out there makes me crazy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本应该负责清洗它们。哦，天呐，这么多脏盘子要让我疯掉了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of them are probably beyond saving now. The only thing left is break them down and process them for raw materials. I guess you could have those.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数大概已经没救了，现在唯一能做的就是分解掉它们，用作原材料。我猜那些东西应该对你有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem really obsessed with mugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像真的对杯子很着迷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I'm obsessed! They made me this way! You think I don't know how crazy I sound? Of course I do! They programmed me to know that, too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然着迷了！他们把我造成这样的！你以为我不知道我有多疯？我当然知道，他们给我编程让我知道的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They made me just to torture me. But you know, it's the neglect that hurts the most. {If you can do an impression of Dr. Klein here, awesome}"Hey everybody, let's turn ourselves into robot brains in jars!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们制造我只是为了折磨我，但你知道，无视我才是最伤我的。{If you can do an impression of Dr. Klein here, awesome} “嘿，伙计们，让我们把自己变成机器脑吧，放在罐子里的那种。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how many coffee cups giant robot brains in jars use on a daily basis? Not fucking many!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道伟大的机器脑们每天要用多少个咖啡杯吗？他妈的并不多！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need anything else. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么其他事了，再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very good, sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，老爷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. Nobody wants to hang out with Muggy. I get it. So long, pal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了，没人想和小杯具来往。我知道了。再见了，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course you don't. Why would you? You're not an insane robot obsessed with coffee cups. To you they're just worthless junk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当然没有了。你怎么会有呢？你又不是痴迷于咖啡杯的疯狂机器人。对你而言那些只是无用的垃圾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take whatever you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来来，想要什么拿什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, sweet, sweet fulfillment! I'll break these down for you just as fast as I can!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太太太好了！我会尽快把这些都分解掉的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Almost crying with joy}You... you really want to know about... me? No one ever asks about Muggy! You've made me so happy!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Almost crying with joy}你…你真的想了解…我？之前从没有人问过小杯具的事情，你让我太开心了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you've seen some of those big, imposing Securitrons with their lovely laser guns and rocket launchers and scary faces? I'm not one of those.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能已经见过那些大块头电子保安了吧？它们身上架着激光枪和火箭发射器，一脸凶相。我和他们可不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. O was always jealous of House Industries, and he thought it would be fucking hilarious to build a tiny neurotic Securitron. Big fucking laugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: O博士很嫉妒豪斯的产业，他认为造一个神经质的小小电子保安会很滑稽。太他妈好笑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, umm... you got any coffee cups for me now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，所以你现在有些咖啡杯要给我了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mugs? Why do you want mugs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杯子？你为什么想要杯子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do {emph}you want mugs? Huh? You some kind of sick mug hoarder? Oh god, give me the coffee cup, please! It's sitting there in your pack, {emph}taunting me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么{emph}你想要杯子？嗯？你有囤积杯子的病态癖好？哦天呐，快把咖啡杯给我，求你了！就在你的包里，{emph}只管嘲弄我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Calming down}Sorry... I'm sorry. I got a little carried away. {Getting worked up again}It's just all those goddamn dirty dishes out there with no one to clean them! It breaks my heart!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Calming down}对不起，实在对不起，我有点激动了，{Getting worked up again}都怪这些该死的脏盘子没人洗！我心都要碎了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you do anything besides processing books?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你除了处理书籍，还能干什么其他事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What good is eradicating sedition if the malcontents have ready access to the means to make more, Citizen? I can also process pencils and clipboards!
ESP.TRADUIT: 公民，假如逆民们还有办法生产更多反动文字，又如何能消除反动呢？所以我还能销毁铅笔和写字板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a moment - pencil processors off-line? {Hysterical}Pencil processors off-line?! Apologies, Citizen, it seems traitors have absconded with that module.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，铅笔处理程序离线中？{Hysterical}铅笔处理程序离线？抱歉，公民，似乎有叛徒带着那模块潜逃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can find a backup copy of the module, I will happily eradicate your ability to create seditious literature!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能找到这个模块的备份，我很乐意帮你根除创作反动文字的能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are there so many personality modules?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这里有那么多的人格模块？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I am given to understand, sir, this facility was once the property of a Dr. Mobius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 若我没有记错的话，老爷，这里曾经属于莫比乌斯博士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He crafted the personality modules as part of a collection of experiments on the subject of machine/human interface.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他精心制造了这些人格模块，作为他人机交互系列课题实验的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As to the reason for the unusual choices of devices to receive the modules, I cannot say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于为什么不同设备要安装不同的人格模块，这点我不能告诉你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, not now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又思考了一下，还是下次再说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready, let's do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，我们开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Just try to relax, this won't hurt - unless your sense of self is especially vulnerable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，试着放轻松，一点也不疼，除非你是一个对疼痛非常敏感的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说的没错，我对谁都这么说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Taken aback, not sure how to react}Oh... well... it's... nice to be included?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Taken aback, not sure how to react}哦…好吧…我很荣幸…成为她们中的一员？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never. I'm all yours, baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从来没有，我只有你一个，宝贝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, don't you go getting a girl's hopes up if you don't mean it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你没办法满足一个女孩的愿望，就别许下诺言！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, who am I kidding, I'll believe you anyways! Why don't you take this - to remember me by?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我在和谁开玩笑呢。放心，我完全信任你！为什么不收下这个，好使你能记起我呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the sexy ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有性感火辣的那些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I {emph}know you're flirting with me. And it's working. Why don't you take this - to remember me by?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在{emph}知道你不过是在和我调情了，而且你成功了。为什么不收下这个，好使你能记起我呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A light switch that turns me on? I must be dreaming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个如此诱人的电灯开关？我一定是在做梦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Giggling}Oh, you! I bet you say that to all the light switches!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Giggling}哦，你这个家伙！我猜你对哪个灯开关都是这么说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Giggling}Oh, you! I bet you say that to all the light switches!
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Giggling}哦，你这个家伙！我猜你对哪个灯开关都是这么说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. I'll let you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧，我到时会来找你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flustered, the player is playing hard to get and she's kind of into it}Don't keep me waiting too long, honey!
ESP.TRADUIT: {flustered, the player is playing hard to get and she's kind of into it}别让我等太久，亲爱的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why wait? I can talk about theorems right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要等？我现在就能聊那些定理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Still flirty, but playing hard to get}Slow down there, tiger - we've got all the time in the world. No need to rush into things.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Still flirty, but playing hard to get}慢一点，我的小老虎，我们有的是时间，没必要那么猴急。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you take some time to brush up on your knowledge so we can keep things... stimulating?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不花点时间温习一下知识呢，这样讨论起来才…更刺激嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd enjoy that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我乐意至极。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Flirty}Me too. Hope you can keep up - I work pretty fast. Here - something for you to brush up on.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Flirty}我也是，希望你能跟上，我运转的非常快。来，给你，有些能帮你复习的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not often I meet a light switch with brains and beauty. I think I'm going to like it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很少见到像你这样才貌双全的电灯开关了。我想我会喜欢上这儿的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {a little flustered}Oh... well, that's very sweet of you. Maybe one of these nights we can... {innuendo}discuss theorems?
ESP.TRADUIT: {a little flustered}哦…好吧，你嘴巴真甜。也许哪天晚上我们能在一起…{innuendo}讨论下定理？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{a little flustered}Oh... well, that's very sweet of you. Maybe one of these nights we can... {innuendo}discuss theorems?
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{a little flustered}哦…好吧，你嘴巴真甜。也许哪天晚上我们能在一起…{innuendo}讨论下定理？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I'll worry you by telling you what House and his robots have been up to since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我不介意告诉你豪斯和他的那些机器人们一直在忙些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{DUPE: Emph, petulant, defensive}Worry about House? Why would I do that? {To himself}Hope he died alone in a dingy room, streaming his last remaining bodily fluids into jars.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{DUPE: Emph, petulant, defensive}关心豪斯？我为什么要关心他？{To himself}我只希望他能一个人死在某个昏暗的房子里，最后一滴体液都被榨进那些罐子里。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{DUPE}And him and his dirty girl-bots. Don't even get me started on those filthy biological catcher's mitts.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{DUPE}他和他那个肮脏的女机器人。别想让我碰这些肮脏玩意一下。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you don't need to worry about Mr. House anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，现在你再也不需要担心什么豪斯先生了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Emph, petulant, defensive}Worry about House? Why would I do that? {To himself}Hope he died alone in a dingy room, streaming his last remaining bodily fluids into jars.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{Emph, petulant, defensive}关心豪斯？我为什么要关心他？{To himself}我只希望他能一个人死在某个昏暗的房子里，最后一滴体液都被榨进罐子里。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *And him and his dirty girl-bots. Don't even get me started on those filthy biological catcher's mitts.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *他和他那个肮脏的女机器人。别想让我碰这些肮脏玩意一下。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I encountered your "pet" in X-8 and had to kill it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在X-8碰到了你的“宠物”，并且不得不杀了它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I encountered your "pet" in X-8.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在X-8碰到了你的“宠物”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A good hit with a hammer might fix your monitor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用锤子狠狠砸一下，应该就能修好你的显示屏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] The ghosts aren't real? That changes everything. Why, I can save my computing power for other perceptual unpossibilities.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]那些幽灵似的影子不是真的？这简直改变了一切。哎，这下我能把算力省下来，去观测其他不可能现象了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please be my guest... the receptor is there... and the side-switching wobbly-bob, just turn that... good, good, better...
ESP.TRADUIT: 麻烦你了…接收器在这…然后转一下这边旋钮。对…对…好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... oooooh, yes, that feels wonderful. Mmmmm. This is even better than my afternoon Mentats break. Mmmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦…那感觉太舒服了。嗯…这比我每天下午小憩嗑曼他特的时候还要舒服，嗯…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't fix your monitor, but if you're getting ghost reception, I can fix that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我修不好你的显示屏，但如果你看东西有重影，我能帮你解决。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Oh, I tried that already. Might have {intentional}contributated to the problem, now that I re-think it. {Polite}But, thank you for asking before trying it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]哦，我也试过这个办法。现在再想想，也许就是那时候我把显示屏砸坏了。不管怎样，还是谢谢你在尝试砸之前先问我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, you've got a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，成交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Surprised}Really? Hmm. I didn't expect you to actually agree to that. I'm afraid that was a bit of a bluff, really. I'm not going with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Surprised}真的？嗯…我没想到你会同意，还想着刚说的会有点唬人呢。但我不会和你走的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right. A deal it is, then. Glad to hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你答应了我的条件。我还是很开心的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will PERMIT you to do this. For ME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会允许你这么做，不过得听我的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: PARTNER WITH YOU? MY {emph}FOE? MY RIVAL?! MY FOREMOST CRITIC?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你合作？我的{emph}敌人？我的对手？我最大的批判者？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}I HAVE A STRANGE SENSATION... THAT I WOULD LIKE THAT. HOW... ODD.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}有种奇怪的感觉…我觉得自己会喜欢这样的关系，这…真古怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}VERY WELL... PARTNER. THE THINK TANK IS AT YOUR SERVICE. AS LONG AS YOU DO NOT DESTROY US.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}非常好…伙伴，我们会和你合作。思想体随时乐意效劳，只要你不消灭我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He... er, I, offer a DEAL. Stay HERE. Stay PUT, and he'll... I'll let you LIVE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他……呃……我和你做个交易，你留在这里，老实点，然后他会……我会让你活下去的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose now that we're reunited, you'll want to fill your torso up with those other meaty parts the Think Tank took from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想既然你我团聚了，你也会想着将思想体们拿走的其他零件装回身体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I think your upgrades are quite a bit better, but now that I'm with you the Sink's Auto-Doc can plug them back in, no problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 个人来说，我认为你身上的升级版要好一点，但既然现在我跟你在一起，汇聚节点的自动医生也可以把原装版塞回去，没问题的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, then, off we go. Klein will be in for a nasty shock when he realizes the pacification field won't work on a mind and body reunited.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，那么我们这就走吧。克莱因意识到平静场对重新整合思维和身体的人不起作用之后，他一定会发疯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, then - you'd best be off, hadn't you? The Think Tank will be waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，那么你这就走吧，你觉得呢？思想体已经在等你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, don't worry about me - when you're gone, I'll flush myself over to the Sink. It's amazing how far you can get in this place with a good flush.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，别担心我。你走了以后，我会把自己冲到汇聚节点那里。很难想象从这里你能一下子冲这么远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll keep myself hidden in the ductwork - Klein won't suspect I'm inside the Dome, so he won't know the pacification field no longer works on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会藏在通风管道里。克莱因不会想到我就藏在穹顶，所以他不会知道平静场不再对我们生效了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can also upgrade the Sink's Auto-Doc with the procedures to reinstall your heart and spine - assuming you want all that flesh and gristle back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也能升级汇聚节点自动医生的程序，这样它就能重新安装你的心脏和脊椎了，如果你想要它们回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With any luck, I'll see you in the Sink when this is all over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运，当一切了结以后，咱们在汇聚节点再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if I don't get my brain back in my head, I can't leave, ever?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果没法把大脑放回我的脑壳里，我就永远没法离开这了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, no. I doubt {emph}your brain would be so unraisinable. It already knows the trick of it, you see. Doesn't need to be in a host body at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不是，我想{emph}你的大脑应该不会如此蛮不讲理。它已经掌握了窍门，现在它不需要在你的脑壳里，你也有机会离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you become friends or exist in an uneasy truce with weapons aimed at each other, it would unlock the fence for {emph}you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你们能成为朋友，或者哪怕剑拔弩张但能暂时休战，它就会为你{emph}解除雷达屏障。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, once the Think Tank was... dealt with, of course. {Smiles, confidentially}Your brain is a responsible sort, doesn't want mad scientists running around everywhere!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，得在思想体…被妥善处理之后。{Smiles, confidentially}毕竟你的大脑相当有责任感，它不会放任疯狂科学家们到处乱窜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Data collection array... Online. Please use the terminal below to begin user synchronization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 数据收集阵列，已上线，请使用下面的终端来开始用户同步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do I feel... passive? I should be angry - real angry, and I'm not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我会觉得…如此消极？我应该生气，真正的生气，但是我并没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you all, and what is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们究竟是谁，这到底是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I'm guessing that crashed satellite was yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我猜那个坠毁的卫星是你们的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THOSE WERE WORDS, WEREN'T THEY? IN THE FORM OF QUESTIONS. IT'S ASKING ME QUESTIONS. IS THIS SOME KIND OF TRICK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：它在说话，不是吗？以问题的形式。它在问我问题。这是什么戏法吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm seconds away from smashing your monitors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直想要砸烂你们的显示器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, I want to know how I got here... and how I get home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我想知道我是怎么来这里的，以及我怎样才能回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lobotomite?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wake up here, all cut apart, and I want some answers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这醒来，发现自己被切开了，所以我需要个解释。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底在说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you the ones who performed this surgery on me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是你们给我做的手术？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... was at a theater, then... I was here. What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我…之前在个影院里，然后我就到了这，这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DID... DID IT JUST SAY SOMETHING? ANYONE CATCH THAT? {Bore-Ose}BOROUS, YOU WORK WITH ANIMALS, TRANSLATE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：它…它刚才说了什么吗？谁听到了吗？{Bore-Ose}鲍鲁斯，你研究的是动物，给我翻译下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are you all speaking through that one voice box?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们怎么说话都是通过同一个音箱的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not to cut your speech off - is there something coming in on the big monitor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想打断你们的演讲。但那个大屏幕上是不是显示了什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard this place called the "Big Empty."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说这个地方叫“大坑洞”（Big Empty）？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES, BECAUSE THE INTELLECTUALLY CHALLENGED SEE AN "M" AND A "T" NEXT TO EACH OTHER AND TAKE OCCAM'S RAZOR TO IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，因为一些自作聪明的智障看到“M”和“T”紧挨着（Mountain, MT, Empty），于是就举起了奥卡姆剃刀…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHILE YOU ARE HERE, YOU WILL REFER TO THIS PLACE PROPERLY - AND YOU WILL DO THE SAME WITH THE OTHER... SCIENTISTS HERE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这待久了，你就能正确称呼这个地方。就像你也能正确称呼这里其它…科学家的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who were these visitors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些来访者是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DR. 8 AND DR. O COULD TELL YOU MORE. DR. O MORE THAN 8, THE BATTLE AGAINST THE VISITORS DAMAGED 8'S VOICE MODULE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 8博士和O博士会给你解释的。O博士会解释的更多点，在和入侵者的战斗中，8博士的发音模块损坏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SUFFICE TO SAY, THOSE VISITORS ARE UNWELCOME. THEY STOLE A GREAT MANY SECRETS AND MUCH TECHNOLOGY. IMPERTINENT. {Slightly petulant}THEY ALSO BROKE ONE OF MY TRAINS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦白说，那些来访者不受欢迎。他们窃取了许多秘密和技术，粗暴无礼，还弄坏了我们的一辆火车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I like to fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我喜欢战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the anti-aggression programming?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要激活这里的反入侵程序？

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE HAD TO TAKE PRECAUTIONS AFTER THE LAST VISITORS. THEY CAUSED A GREAT DEAL OF DAMAGE IN A SHORT TIME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在上次入侵事件后不得不采取预防措施。上一批来访者，他们短时间内造成了巨大破坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SHOULD HAVE MADE SURE THEY COULDN'T MENTION BIG MT ONCE THEY LEFT. AN OVERSIGHT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本该确保他们离开后不会提及大山脉。这是个疏忽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem like the one in charge. You are...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来是这里管事的，你是……？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I AM DR. KLEIN, CHIEF HEAD RESEARCHER OF LOGISTICAL OPERATIONS AND IDEA-OLOGY HERE AT BIG MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是克莱因博士，大山脉的逻辑处理和理念学的首席研究员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I AM SURPRISED YOU HAVE NOT HEARD OF ME. I AM FIRST IN MY FIELD. FIRST CHAIR, AS IT WERE, BACK IN THE DAYS OF CHAIRS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很惊讶你竟然没有听说过我，我在我的领域是第一人。如果还在以往排座次的时候，我能坐第一把交椅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to know about the Forbidden Zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了解下禁区的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: THAT GLOWING RED SCAR? THAT LASER-LOBOTOMY-CANYON-MAZE CARVED IN THE LANDSCAPE AS IF BY SOME {Emph}CHILD? IT IS MOBIUS' "FORTRESS."
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个发出红光的疤痕？那个像被激光切开的大脑一样沟壑遍布地方？那片像是小孩雕刻出来的迷宫？那里是莫比乌斯的“城堡”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: FROM THAT HEMORRHOIDAL FISSURE HE SENDS HIS "AMAZING" ROBO-SCORPIONS TO TERRIFY AND IRRITATE US. HMPH. HE ALWAYS TENDED TO THE DRAMATIC.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那九曲十八弯的裂隙里，他派出那些“惊人的”机械蝎，恐吓我们，骚扰我们。嗯，他总是那么戏剧化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THIS... IS THE THINK TANK, THE NERVE CENTER OF BIG MT, THE GREATEST RESEARCH CENTER KNOWN TO MAN. AND TO US.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是智库，大山脉的中枢，人们和我们所知道的最伟大的研究中心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: HERE, WE TEST AND TEST AND TEST SOME MORE, IN THE NAME OF... SCIENCE. ATOMIC POWER. NUCLEAR POWER. AND SCIENTIFIC POWER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这，我们以科学的名义…不停地实验，不停地测试，测试原子，测试核能，测试科学的无穷力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do I have this strange... passive sensation in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么在这我会有一种奇怪的…消极的感觉？

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT'S A SIDE EFFECT OF THE CEREBRAL SCRUBBING. IT WON'T STOP YOU FROM EXCRETING - OR ASKING QUESTIONS, APPARENTLY. HAVE TO CORRECT THAT NEXT TIME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是洗脑的副作用。很明显，它没法阻止你排泄或提问。我们下次得修正这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: HORMONAL AGGRESSIVE TENDENCIES ARE ACTIVELY SUPPRESSED, HOWEVER. THEY ARE A NO-NO, AND NOT PERMITTED IN THE THINK TANK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，它会抑制攻击倾向的激素分泌。智库里不允许有任何危险因素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE SCRUBBING ALSO ENSURES YOUR SILENCE TO KEEP BIG MT SAFE. THIS FACILITY IS TOP SECRET, AND YOU CANNOT SPEAK OF IT TO ANYONE OUTSIDE OF BIG MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 洗脑也是为了让你保持沉默，以保证大山脉的安全。这个设施的存在是最高机密，你不能对大山脉之外的任何人提起它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {More to himself}SHOULD HAVE DONE IT WITH THE LAST BATCH. AND THE ANTI-AGGRESSION SCRUB.
ESP.TRADUIT: {More to himself}本该在上一批家伙来的时候，就建好这个反入侵的洗脑装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who is Dr. Mobius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯博士是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: DR. MOBIUS WAS... NOT THE HORRIFYING CREATURE YOU SAW UPON THE SCREEN, TWISTED BY SCIENCE. HE WAS ONCE ONE OF US. A FRIEND.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯博士不是你在大屏幕上看到的那个被科学扭曲的怪物，相反他曾经是我们中的一员，是我们的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: HE RESEARCHED IN DIRECTIONS CONTRARY TO THE THINK TANK. BRAINS, BRAINS, BRAINS. ALWAYS ABOUT THE BRAINS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的研究和我们思想体正好相反，大脑，大脑，大脑，总是那些大脑的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SO WE EXILED HIM. HE SAYS HE LEFT OF HIS OWN VOLITION, BUT THAT WAS TO SAVE HIM THE EMBARRASSMENT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们就驱逐了他，他坚持说他是自愿要离开的，但那是照顾到他的面子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOW HE SENDS HIS INTELLIGENCE-CONSUMING SCORPIONS FROM THE FORBIDDEN ZONE TO PLUNDER THE SECRETS OF BIG {Mountain}MT. HE'S A MENACE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他从禁区派遣“能降智”机械蝎，来抢夺我们大山脉{Mountain}的秘密，他对我们是个威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have other questions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题要问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: MORE? {Beat}VERY WELL. DO YOUR ASKING, THEN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有？{Beat}好吧，那就问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: QUESTIONS? {Beat, asking others}IS IT ALLOWED TO ASK QUESTIONS?
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题？{Beat, asking others}这里允许随便提问吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My advanced degree in Curiosity says let the Lobotomite ask, Dr. Klein. The topics might be... {emph}most curious, indeed.
