ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因博士，我的好奇学高级学位告诉我，应该让这无脑人问。{emph}实际上，这话题可能会是最令人好奇的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead, you might make me more fertile or impregnate me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，也许你还能加强我的生育能力，或者让我怀孕呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Impregnate YOU? What, do you want to make me VOMIT inside my tank?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -让你怀孕？别逗了，你还想让我在我的容器里射出来吗？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The mere NOTION makes the edges of my biomed gel crystallize into asymmetrical patterns.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -光是想想就让我的生物凝胶晶状体边缘变得不均匀了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, that's all right, trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还是算了，相信我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Oh, that's too bad. Perhaps we can perform a sterility castration some other time, then.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -哦，那太糟了。也许我们可以改天再做绝育手术。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Submit your questions! I shall respond - with deadly ANSWERS.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -提出你的问题！我会给你一个无可置疑的答案。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think they're sterile, they breed, all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为它们是不孕的，它们能繁殖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I cannot expect a LOBOTOMITE to understand the careful surgical castrating procedures used in their creation.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我也不指望一只无脑人能理解我创造这些生物时进行的绝育手术有多精妙。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Perhaps a demonstration of my castrating POWER would settle your doubts.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -也许展示一下我做绝育手术的能力就能打消你的疑虑。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you think they haven't escaped?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么原因让你认为他们没有逃出去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Because Big {Mountain}MT's safety measures are far more sophisticated than their primitive animal instincts. WE are their lords and masters.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -很简单，大山脉{Mountain}布置的安保系统比那些原始动物本能要精密得多。我们就是它们的上帝和主人。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Contained at Big Mountain? Those things are all over the Mojave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 被圈养在大山脉里？它们早就遍布整个莫哈维了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: -No, such creatures are found only here, for research purposes. They would no more be capable of escape than breeding.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -胡说，那些生物只存在于此，用作科学研究。根本不可能跑出去，更别说繁殖了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nightstalkers? Those crazy coyote-snake... things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 夜行兽？你指那些疯狂的郊狼和蛇的…混合体？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are responsible for Cazadores?
ESP.TRADUIT: 猎蜂也跟你有关？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Indeed. Docile. Curious. Safe. Sterile. They are contained here at Big {"Mountain"}MT to preserve DNA and for observation.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -对。这种生物性格温顺、好奇心强、很安全，而且高度不育。它们被圈养在大{"Mountain"}山脉里以供DNA保存和实验观察。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the Big Em... uh, Big Mountain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能跟我说说大坑…呃，大山脉吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It is our HOME. THREATENED by the horrors of Mobius.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这是我们的家园！它在莫比乌斯恐怖威胁下危在旦夕！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -All we wish to do is continue our research, layer upon layer, above and beneath the floor of the Crater until we have our answers.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我们唯一的愿望就是继续研究，地上地下，一层层地不断研究，直到找到答案。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: -But NO! Mobius will not let us rest. Scaring us with his scary robots with their laser tails and blowing up all the time.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -但是不！莫比乌斯不会让我们休息。他用那些长着镭射尾巴，整天爆炸的机械蝎吓唬我们。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about the Big Empty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我讲讲大坑洞（Big Empty）吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -That castrated nickname of our facility is NOT its true name. The true name is: BIG {Mountain}MT. Where are your manners?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -那个掐头去尾的外号（Big Empty）绝不是它真正的名字。它真正的名字是：大山脉（BIG MT）。你的规矩都丢哪儿去了？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does Klein want these particular technologies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么克莱因专门想要这些技术？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There is LOGIC and purpose in it. If these technologies are needed to pierce the FORBIDDEN ZONE... so be IT.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -自然有逻辑和目的蕴含其中。如果必须有这些技术才能突入禁区…那就是这样。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Science! is powerful, and in the right hands... OUR hands... if we had hands, we would be nigh-unstoppable!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -科学的力量，无比强大！掌握在正确的人手中…我们手中…好吧如果我们有手，我们就将所向无敌！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know more about Mobius and the Forbidden Zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于莫比乌斯和禁区，我想知道更多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The malignant tumor that is Mobius plagues us ALL. His hunger for power, INSATIABLE.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -那恶性肿瘤，莫比乌斯，折磨着我们所有人。他对权力的饥渴，永远无法被满足。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: -From his LAIR in the FORBIDDEN ZONE, his terrifying ROBO-SCORPION army clicks and whirs across the crater of Big MT. EVER-seeking. EVER-stinging.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -他那可怕的机械蝎大军从禁区里倾巢而出，轰鸣着横扫整个大山脉。搜索，蜇人，永不停歇！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: -He must be STOPPED. Or all of Big {Mountain}MT... shall be DESTROYED.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -必须阻止他。否则整个大山脉{Mountain}…将被破坏殆尽。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you - what do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -BEFORE you is the brain of Dr. Borous. Head of Animalogy, Beastology, and DNA-Scrambling technology here at Big {"Mountain"}MT.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你面前是鲍鲁斯博士的大脑。大{"Mountain"}山脉动物学、野兽学和DNA重组技术的首席。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I lay the bones and hearts of animals bare beneath my searing gaze. Especially the dogs. I did so love dogs once. {Thinking, happy}Especially Gabe, that rascal.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我带着灼热的目光研究动物的骨头，心脏。尤其是狗，我以前真的很喜欢狗。{Thinking, happy}特别是加布，那个小淘气。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -But there are MANY animals to shape. Industrious Cazadores, the happy-go-lucky Nightstalkers... they are my living, breathing DNA test tubes.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -但还有很多动物可以塑造。勤劳的猎蜂，快乐的夜行兽…它们都是我活生生的DNA试管。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. I just had some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点。我只想问些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Just as I feared! Questions, quizzes, just as there were in American High School! And if there are NO answers, how will the Think Tank graduate?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -正如我害怕的！问题、小测，就像这里是美国中学！如果没法作答，思想体该怎么毕业啊？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you always get this dramatic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么总是像表演戏剧一样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -DRAMA? There is no DRAMA in Science! As I learned in High School, Science! is an intellectual pursuit DEVOID of bestial emotions.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -戏剧？科学中没有戏剧的位置！正如我在高中学到的，科学，是不受原始情感左右的理性工作！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Unless, of course, you are a Communist. {Under his breath}Like Betsy Bright, who "sat" "next" to me in math. And her smoking confederate, Richie Marcus.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -当然，除非你是一个共产主义分子。{Under his breath}就像我数学课的同桌贝琪·布莱特，还有她的烟友，里奇·马库斯。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -As I learned in my High School, American High, AHS, "Drama" is for movies, things of FICTION. Here, in the Think Tank, the ONLY star is... SCIENCE!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -就像我在高中——美国高中学到的那样。“戏剧”就像电影，是虚构的东西。而在思想体里，唯一的明星是….科学！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Animal? Did you just call me an animal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 动物？你刚刚把我称作动物？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Yes, animal. Hormones, pores, GLANDS, all wrapped up in SKIN. Who knows what terrifying secrets lie beneath your EPIDERMIS?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是的，动物。激素、毛孔、腺体，全都被包裹在皮肤里。谁能知道你的表皮下还藏着什么可怕的秘密？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Scalpels shall tell us your secrets, even if we must cut DEEP for such knowledge. {Beat, slight pride}I was head of my Biology class at American High, you know.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -解剖刀能够告诉我们你的秘密，为了这些知识我们可能需要切得深一点。{Beat, slight pride}知道吗，我在美国高中时可是生物课代表。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这么说？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Klein knows things we don't. And I think he told some of those things to the last visitor. Dangerous things if they ever got out.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *克莱因知道我们不知道的东西。我认为他将其中一些告诉了最后那位来访者。如果那些东西从这里泄露出去，那就很危险了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who were the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Two other human specimens. One arrived not long after the troublemaker... and the last one, not sure when he showed up.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *另外两个人类样本。其中一个紧随那捣乱者而来…另一个，我也不确定他是何时出现的。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Thought the first one was going to be lobotomized in Y-17, she got out somehow.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *本以为其中一个会在Y-17执行大脑切除手术，结果她不知用什么方法逃了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *The last subject... Klein might know more. He talked to him, then let him leave the Think Tank. Hope he knew what he was doing.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *最后那个实验体…克莱因可能知道的更多。他们聊过，然后克莱因放他离开了智库。希望他知道自己在干什么。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我发生了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *This human... I can't believe it... he broke out of the Think Tank. In seconds.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *这个人类…简直难以置信…他只用了几秒钟就逃出了智库。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Then he went for Yangtze, got bomb collars, and started practicing on the subjects that were still there until he got the right frequency.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *然后他去了长江集中营，拿到了爆炸项圈，开始用还留在那里的实验体做试验，直到找到正确的频率。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *We were sending robots to stop him and he was slicing and cutting through their shells with some suped-up laser gun like they were cheese... paper.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我们派机器人去阻止他，他拿着几把强力激光枪切开它们的装甲，就像切奶酪…或者纸。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *When he hacked into the mainframe, 8 tried to stop him and got fried. Me? He rerouted my processors to take control of the train network here.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *当他黑进中央处理器的时候，8试图阻止他，结果被烧坏了。我？他黑进我的处理器，控制了这儿的火车网络。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *If you see the tunnels with the trains plowed into them, you can thank our visitor for that. He wrecked the whole place.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *如果你看见有些被火车堵住的隧道，那就是这位来访者的手笔，他把这地方搞得一团糟。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *While we were trying to keep containment on the surface, turns out he used one train to punch out a tunnel and escape... sealed now, but...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *在我们试图夺回控制时，他用一辆的火车撞开隧道逃了出去…现在那里也堵了，但…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That doesn't sound impressive - breaking machines, that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听上去让人不齿，那是在破坏机器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Who asked you? You just wait until a working machine threatens you, and you'll wish I was around!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *管你怎么想。等到一个运转中的机器追杀你的时候，你就会希望我在你身边了！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Giant Robot Scorpion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个机械巨蝎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yeah, crazy right? Something right out of a Midnight Science Fiction Feature. Ridiculous. What are the odds?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *对，很疯狂是吧？就像从午夜科幻小说里跑出来的东西一样，很荒唐。可能性有多少呢？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard you and 8 were attacked by previous visitors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说你和8被先前的来访者攻击过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I don't like to talk about it. 8... he can't talk about it, they fried his voice module something good.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我不喜欢谈那些。8…他也没办法谈那些，他们把他的发音模块烧坏了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *It wasn't all the visitors, though - only one of them got out of control. He's the one that took control of Little Yangtze, our old human farm.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *不是所有的来访者，他们中仅有一位失控了。他控制了长江集中营，我们曾经的畜人场。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about this facility?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以给我介绍一下这个设施吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Big {Mountain}MT used to be a mountain. Then there was a... slight mishap. Now it's a crater - the Dome used to be buried, now it's exposed to the sky.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *大山脉{Mountain}过去曾经是一座山。后来出了一起…轻微的事故。现在它变成了一个环形坑。智智库的穹顶过去是埋在地下，现在它才重见天日。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Don't get me wrong. Makes the sky light up like a planetarium at night. All those spectra... so soothing.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *别误会我。现在夜里的天空像星象仪那样明亮。所有那些光谱…如此清晰。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Mobius and these monsters of his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于莫比乌斯和他那些怪兽的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Grumbled}*That "genius" Mobius somehow cobbled together these really impressive-looking robot scorpions with spare parts. Even painted them.*
ESP.TRADUIT: {Grumbled}*那个“天才”莫比乌斯用零配件就组装出这些令人印象深刻的机械蝎。甚至还给它们画了涂装。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Tried to see what makes them tick. Can't even examine them without them detonating all over me. Left with shrapnel and burns. Every. Time.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我曾想弄明白它们是怎么运转起来的。但没等我检查多久，它们就炸的到处都是，只剩下些弹片和残骸。次次如此。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Supposedly, he has even larger models, even a Giant Robot Scorpion hidden deep within the Forbidden Zone. Yeah, right. Giant monsters. Sure.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *恐怕，他还有更大的模型，甚至是一只巨大的机械蝎，藏在禁区深处。是的，巨大的怪兽。毋庸置疑。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have another name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有另一个名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yeah, I do. It wasn't always "O." I had took that one by default because sometimes it's easier to accept the mistake as long as the purpose works.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *是的。我的名字并不总是“O”。我默认使用它，只是觉得既然这个名字能起到称呼我的目的，那我还是接受这个错误更轻松些。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I don't want to get into it. It's a sore topic with me. Makes my gel ripple.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我不想提起它。对我来说它是个痛苦的话题，让我的生物凝胶泛起涟漪。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *All things robotical. You see a robot, I made it. See a broken robot, I made it that way. Deconstructed it down to parts.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *制作所有机械化的东西。你看到一个机器人，是我做的；看到一个破碎的机器人，也是我做的，只是把它肢解了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I have a gift with machines. I can render {emph}anything inoperable - {emph}preserve them in a non-functioning state.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *我天生擅长摆弄机器。我能让{emph}任何东西变得无法操作——{emph}让它们保持在无机能的状态。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down. Just wanted to ask some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静。我只是想问些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Fine. Ask.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *好吧。问。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agenda? I don't have any agenda, not with RobCo, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 图谋？我没有任何图谋，至少没有和罗科公司有关的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Ooohh, really? You have their tech. On. Your. Arm.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哦呵呵，真的吗？你有他们的技术，就在你的手！臂！上！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some problem with RobCo?
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗科公司有什么问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, my Pip-Boy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我的哔哔小子？

ESP.ORIGINAL: *How dare you bring RobCo tech in here! What, are you showing off? How great Robert House and his biiiig company are?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *你怎么敢把罗科技术带到这里！怎么，你在炫耀吗？罗伯特·豪斯和他的大大大公司很伟大是吗？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Mocking Robert House}"Oh! We can make Securitrons better than any robot those geniuses at Big {Mountain}MT can make, and they'll last a thousand years!"*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{Mocking Robert House}“哦！我们做出的电子保安，比大山脉{Mountain}里那些天才们做出的任何机器人都更好，它们能运转上千年！“*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Rrrr! You're lucky I don't have hands to tear that Dip-Boy off your arm - or feet to stomp on its stupid metal guts! Ooooo, damn RobCo!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哈！你真幸运，我没有手，不能把那烂哔小子从你的手臂上扯下来。我也没有脚，不能把它愚蠢的金属内脏踩烂！啊啊啊，该死的罗科！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to talk to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟你谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Congratulations, you've succeeded. What, you come to humiliate me, tell me how I've yet to find a means of stopping Mobius' scorpions?*
ESP.TRADUIT: *恭喜，你成功了。怎么，来羞辱我的是吗，说我这么久还没找到办法来阻止莫比乌斯的蝎子？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Or better, ask how "progress" is going on Securitron construction at the plant? We've had setbacks in research is all. That's all. And...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *还是问我工厂里电子保安的生产有何“进展”？我们的研究陷入了瓶颈，就这样。并且…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you mean "impossible."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想说的应该是“不可能”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: *O really. Now the Lobotomite is master of the dictionary arts. What, do you have a doctorate in verbology? No? I do. And...*
ESP.TRADUIT: *哦是真的吗。这无脑人是个语言艺术大师唉。怎么，你在动词学上获得过博士学位？没有？我有。而且…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll head out, then, and be back with these... things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我这就出发，给你们带回这些…东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: WELL. GOOD. WHAT ARE THE TOKEN WORDS SPOKEN IN THIS CASE... UH... "THANK YOU?" YES - THANK. YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：很好。在这种情形下应该说什么？呃，[QUOTE]“谢谢你”？[QUOTE] 是的，谢谢，你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, is it leaving? Uh, but... {trying to be professional}eh, Dr. Klein, the Lobotomite will need rest. Recuperation. Things like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：等等，它是要离开吗？嗯，但是…{trying to be professional}呃，克莱因博士，无脑人需要休息、恢复和诸如此类的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I volunteer {emph}my chambers so it might be stared at, my monitor radars slowly scanning its form to collect sensitive data.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意贡献出{emph}我的房间，这样就能盯着它看了，可以让我的监视雷达慢慢的扫描它的身体，来收集敏感的数据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -NO! That would put it too CLOSE to us! It could press BUTTONS, turn lights ON and OFF, and worse, let OTHER Lobotomites in!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-不！那样它就离我们太近了！它可能会按按钮，让灯开开关关，更糟的是，能让其他无脑人进来！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Muttering}*We could give it Mobius' old room. It's where its brain got scooped out anyway, and plus, some of its parts are already there.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：{Muttering}*我们可以将莫比乌斯以前的房间给它。反正那里是它的脑子被挖出来的地方，而且它的一些其他器官也已经在那了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Might be more comforting for it to hang out with its spine and heart. Home is where the heart is, after all. {Chuckles}See what I did there? Went {emph}literal.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *对它来说，和脊椎、心脏待在一块可能会更舒服。毕竟，家是心所在的地方嘛。看看我都在做什么？在按字面意思解释。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I SUPPOSE. {Thinking}WE'LL HAVE TO MOVE THAT COUCH OUT OF THERE, BEEN PUTTING THAT OFF TOO LONG.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我想…{Thinking}我们还要把那个手术台搬出去，它放在那很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is indicating his contribution, modestly. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *8 says let the Lobotomite take the Sink Central Intelligence Personality Chip and re-install it.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*8说可以让无脑人拿走汇聚节点中央智能单元的人格芯片，并重新装上它。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: *That stuffy Mobius-programmed butt-ler can walk the Lobotomite, feed it, barter with it for us.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *那个莫比乌斯编程的古板管家可以牵着无脑人出去散步，喂它吃的，还能和他交易。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would also prevent it from going to Higgs Village and taking up residence there. With my teddy bears. And it would be nice to have it so... close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：这也能阻止它去住在希格斯村，和我的泰迪熊待在一起。而且能让它待在…如此近的地方也很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOUR LOGIC COMBINED WITH MY DESIRE TO KEEP THE THINK TANK LOBOTOMITE-FREE HAS SWAYED ME. HERE, I PRESENT THE SINK CENTRAL "INTELLIGENCE."
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：你们的话富含逻辑，而且我也不想让无脑人住在穹顶里。好吧，你们说服了我。收下吧，这就是汇聚节点的中央智能单元。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: LOBOTOMITE, TAKE THIS CHIP TO THE SINK. PLUG IT IN, AND MAKE SURE THE CHIP IS CLEAN, OR IT COULD SKIP.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人，把这个芯片带到汇聚节点，插入。记得确保芯片是干净的，否则它会失效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: THEN MAKE WHATEVER CRUDE BIOLOGIC DEMANDS YOU NEED OF THE SINK. IT WILL CATER TO MOST OF YOUR HORMONAL WHIMS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在汇聚节点，无论你有多么粗俗的生物需求，有什么激素激发的奇思妙想，它都能满足你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Debug: Cut if no variable and we're using a chip}YOUR LOGIC COMBINED WITH MY DESIRE TO KEEP THE THINK TANK LOBOTOMITE-FREE HAS SWAYED ME. HERE, I PRESENT THE SINK CENTRAL "INTELLIGENCE."
ESP.TRADUIT: {Debug: Cut if no variable and we're using a chip}你们的话富含逻辑，而且我也不想让无脑人住在穹顶里。好吧，你们说服了我。收下吧，这就是汇聚节点的中央智能单元。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: LOBOTOMITE, I HAVE SWITCHED ON THE PERSONALITY IN THE SINK. IT WILL BE ACTIVE WHEN YOU RE-ENTER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脑人，我已经开启了汇聚节点里的人格系统。你重新进入时，它就会生效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: MAKE WHATEVER CRUDE BIOLOGIC DEMANDS YOU NEED OF THE SINK. IT WILL CATER TO MOST OF YOUR HORMONAL WHIMS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在汇聚节点，无论你有多么粗俗的生物需求，有什么激素激发的奇思妙想，它都能满足你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are these technologies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要找回的都是些什么技术？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE TECHNOLOGIES ARE THE X-2 TRANSMITTER ANTENNA ARRAY, USED TO FOCUS COHERENT THOUGHT AT EXCESSIVELY HIGH FREQUENCIES.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：这些技术包括X-2发射机天线阵列，利用极高的频率集中逻辑思维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The psycho-analytic cardiac-dampening sneaky stealth suit, a suit like NOTHING this world has ever heard, seen, or could EVER see!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-一套兼具精神分析、心率控制功能的潜行服，这套服装世界上没人听说过，也没人见过！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is saying, "hey, what about my item! I made something, too!" EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and 8's Sonic-Soundwave-Emitter-Projecto-Gun, able to broadcast sound at lethal frequencies. {Beat, quieter}It also gives a great biogel massage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：…还有8的作品：声波发射器，一条能射的枪。它能以致命的频率广播声音，{Beat, quieter}也能给生物凝胶做一次极好的按摩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: THERE. WE HAVE INFORMED YOU OF ALL WE NEED. WE ESTIMATE IF YOU ARE FOCUSED, YOUR TIME INVESTMENT WILL BE MINIMAL. EH, BY OUR STANDARDS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：就这么多。我们已经告知你要去找的所有东西。我们估计，如果你足够专心，想找齐这三项技术用不了多少时间，呃，以我们的时间标准来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF YOU WORK {Emph}QUICKLY, YOU WILL BE THE RECIPIENT OF A GESTURE OF GRATITUDE FROM US. WE DO NOT BESTOW THESE OLD WORLD GESTURES LIGHTLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你进展{emph}够快，你将能得到我们表示感谢的手势。我们可不会轻易做这些旧世界的手势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: FINE. SO... YES. GET THESE THINGS FOR US. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO COMPREHEND THEIR COMPLICATED SCHEMATICS. THAT IS FOR US TO DO.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：好。那么…是的。为我们带回这些东西。不必尝试理解它们复杂的图纸，那是我们思想体的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That does it, forget this. I'm not helping you until I get my brain back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样吧，忘掉这回事。除非我拿回我的大脑，否则我不会帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the hell am I even talking to you right now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到底干嘛要跟你废话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you so sure Mobius has my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么让你如此确信莫比乌斯有我的大脑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE HAVE NO IDEA! THIS LINE OF QUESTIONING ISN'T IMPORTANT TO US RIGHT NOW! WHY ARE YOU ASKING THESE TANGENTIAL QUESTIONS? STOP IT!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我们不知道！现在这些问题对我们根本不重要！为什么你要问这些不沾边的问题？别问了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE NEED THESE TECHNOLOGIES. YOU NEED TO GET THEM. YOU MUST GET THEM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要这些技术。你需要弄到它们。你必须弄到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can say "no," and I'll do it again. I'm leaving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能说“不”，现在我要再说一遍。我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: LEAVING? BUT YOU CAN'T. I DON'T MEAN THAT AS A THREAT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：走？但你走不了。我没有威胁你的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Slightly confused. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this, I'm not going to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘了这件事，我不会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: "No?" Why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: “不能”？为什么不能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hesitating, embarrassed}You... are equipped to retrieve the technologies with your primitive form. We are not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：{Hesitating, embarrassed}你…这个原始的身体给了你回收那些技术的能力。而我们做不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *It's kind of embarrassing. You have hands. And... uh, a heartbeat, sort of. And eyes. Mostly the hands. There's door handles, and lockers, and...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*说来尴尬。你有手和。唔，有心跳之类的东西。有眼睛。最重要的是有手，而那里有些门把手、储物柜，还有…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: ENOUGH. WE NEED YOUR HELP. WILL YOU HELP US?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：够了。我们需要你的帮助。你会帮助我们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll help. What do you need me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会帮忙，你需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: EXCELLENT. {Beat}THIS IS TURNING OUT MUCH BETTER THAN THE ACTIVATE-THE-RETREAT-PROTOCOLS-AND-COWER-IN-MY-ROOM IDEA I HAD EARLIER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：好极了。{Beat}我先前还想着离开这，然后就此缩在我的房间里呢。现在这情况比我预想的好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Agreed. {Tries to interject with his contribution, but he really hasn't contributed anything}O, and I've used my robotical knowledge to um... eh... transmit the... radio map waves to...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*赞成。{Tries to interject with his contribution, but he really hasn't contributed anything}哦，我刚刚也利用我的机器人知识，将…呃…地图的信息传输到…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is indicating his contribution, modestly. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Settle down, 8, I would have gotten it in a second, all right?! {emph}8's transmitted the last known coordinates of the research centers. They, um...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*别急，8，我很快就会说到你了？！{emph}8已经传给我已知的研究中心的坐标。它们，嗯…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Increasingly quieter}They... well, move sometimes. Or get buried. Or blow up.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{Increasingly quieter}它们…好吧…有时位置会变。或者被埋了，要么就爆炸了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is indicating his contribution, modestly. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: 8 IS CORRECT. ALL WE NEED ARE THE SCHEMATICS. THIS DOES NOT MEAN WE DO NOT WANT THE COLD, HARD TECHNOLOGY, HOWEVER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：8是对的。我们最需要回收的是技术的图纸。当然了，也不是说我们就不想要冰冷的，实在的技术成果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SO DO NOT GIVE INTO YOUR BIOLOGICAL TIRED-LAZINESS AND DECIDE YOU WOULD SWEAT TOO MUCH CARRYING THEM. YOU HAVE A NEW SPINE. USE IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，快去把技术带回来吧。别屈服于你那生物性的，出于懒惰的疲倦感，你现在有根新脊椎，好好利用它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND EVEN IF YOU DIE IN THE ACT OF RECLAMATION, SIMPLY REACHING THEM WILL AUTO-TRANSMITIFY THE SCHEMATICS TO US. THAT IS STILL GOOD. FOR US.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你在回收技术时死掉，但只要你触碰到它们，就可以将图纸自动传输给我们。对我们来说，那样也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why me? Can't you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要我去干？你们不能自己去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: UM. NO.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：呃…不能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not going to help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不打算帮助你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：哦（"OH"）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Yes, Dr. Klein? What?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*是，克莱因博士？你在叫我？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: NOT YOU, O, YOU IDIOT! I MEANT "OH," IN THE SENSE OF "OH, I WASN'T PREDICTING IT WOULD RESPOND THAT WAY." CAN IT SAY NO?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：不是你，O，你个白痴！我说的“OH”，意思是“哦，我没想到它会这样回应”。它能说出“不”吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, you scoop out my brain, now you want me to save you?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，是你们切了我的脑子，现在又想要我救你们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THAT IS CORRECT, YES. {Beat, not sure, calculating}I HOPE YOU'RE NOT DEMONSTRATING RESENTMENT NOW. {Conclusion}IF YOU ARE, WELL, WE CAN'T HAVE THAT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：确实，你说的对。{Beat, not sure, calculating}我希望你现在不是在表达愤恨。{Conclusion}不过就算是，好吧，我们也不会让它发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said something about needing technologies to stop Mobius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到需要一些技术来阻止莫比乌斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. IT IS OUR ONLY CHANCE, A DESPERATE PLAN THAT CAME TO US AFTER MOBIUS' FIRST BROADCAST.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。这是我们仅有的机会，在莫比乌斯第一次广播后，我们就开始准备这个孤注一掷的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: MAYBE... JUST MAYBE... IF WE RECLAIM THESE BURIED TECHNOLOGIES, WE CAN PUT AN END TO MOBIUS AND THE HORRORS SPAWNING FROM THE FORBIDDEN ZONE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许…仅仅是或许…如果我们回收了这些失落的技术，我们就能了结莫比乌斯，以及来自禁区的恐怖事物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Quiet, trying not to embarrass himself}What? Like... stuff? Things?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{Quiet, trying not to embarrass himself}你说的是什么？像是…事物？东西？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. THINGS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：对。东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Slightly confused. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Quiet, skeptical}I don't know... might be some old Nuka Cola or Sunset Sarsaparilla bottlecaps lying around. It... It's not "currency" per se...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*我不知道…或许是一些古老的核子可乐或者夕阳沙士的瓶盖，在这到处都是。它…它本质上不能算“货币”…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Still, might be enough to trick the Sink's trade routines. Mobius put that test line for caps in the code as a debug command, I think.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *不过，或许能够骗过汇聚节点的交易程序。我想莫比乌斯可能曾将有关瓶盖的测试行，作为测试命令加入到代码中。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe that was Mobius' reason. His wild speculation concerning post-holocaust economic systems was quite extensive. And of high decibel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我不认为那是莫比乌斯的设定。他曾对战后经济体系作出过大量推测，尽管没什么根据，但还是很有说服力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ENOUGH! SURRENDER THESE SO-CALLED BOTTLECAPS, NUKA AND SUNSET ALIKE. IN THEIR ROLE AS THINGS, THEY WILL SERVE AS ADEQUATE TEST SUBJECTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：够了！将这些核子可乐和夕阳沙土之类东西的瓶盖交出来吧。这些瓶盖会是合格的测试品，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: *What are we going to do? There's no way we can breach the Forbidden Zone. There's those robot scorpions everywhere!*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*我们该怎么办？我们无法攻进禁区，那里满地都是机械蝎！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The FORBIDDEN ZONE, where no brain has EVER entered! Nor ever RETURNED.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-禁区，没有一个脑子曾进入过！更别谈回来了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Correcting}Except Dr. Mobius. And the technologies that could save us, they are out of our reach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：{Correcting}除了莫比乌斯博士以外。而且那些能够拯救我们的技术，都在我们够不着的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND DR. MOBIUS MOCKS US. DID YOU SEE HIS CRACKED MONITOR? HE'S CLEARLY LET HIMSELF GO.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：而且莫比乌斯博士在嘲弄我们。看到他那被破损的显示器了吗？很明显他已经放飞自我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is calmly suggesting a reasonable course of action here. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *What? Ask the Lobotomite for help? 8, I think you need the fluid levels in your logic-assist-pumps checked.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*什么？向无脑人寻求帮助？8，我认为你需要检查下自己的逻辑辅助泵，看看里面的液位是不是有问题。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this Lobotomite responded, Dr. Klein, then it is clearly intelligent, perhaps even displays heretofore unknown levels of helpfulness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：如果这个无脑人能作出反应，克莱因博士，那么它显然有智能，甚至可能会展露出愿意帮助我们的可能性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -But what of its brain? We scooped that out! We don't even know where we left it! And for putting it back in... none of us have the knowledge!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-但是它的脑子怎么办？我们把它挖出来了！我们甚至不知道把它丢到哪里了！至于把它放回去…我们没人懂这知识！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, but it's still aware and responsive. Look at it... it's regarding us even now, with its big teddy bear eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：是的，不过它仍有有意识和反应。看啊…即使在此刻，它还在用它的大泰迪熊眼睛注视着我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we ask it politely and leave the part about the unnecessary ruthless lobotimizing out, it might be favorably disposed to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们礼貌的询问它，别管那不必要的、残忍的大脑切除手术，或许它会愿意和我们合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume full responsibility. I take my duties in the prodding and excision of living, breathing tissue {emph}quite seriously.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我承担全部责任。我对切除鲜活的人体组织的工作有点{emph}太认真了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Quiet, grumbling}All right, all right. Here. Cap away. Hope that stupid chip chokes on them.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{Quiet, grumbling}好的，好的。瓶盖在这。希望那个愚蠢的人格芯片能会被这东西噎死。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Quiet, grumbling}Fine. It's not going to help. That chip will probably refuse them anyway, as stuck up as it is.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{Quiet, grumbling}好吧。可能不会起作用。那人格芯片也许会拒绝接收它们，就像会被噎死一样。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Quiet, irritated}Why don't you make the Lobotomite a bottlecap factory, Klein? Or better yet, give it a ton of things to activate the chip?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{Quiet, irritated}克莱因，你不如给无脑人造个瓶盖工厂算了？或者干脆给它一大堆来激活这个芯片？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not understand, yet I am intrigued by this potential display.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我不明白，不过我对这种可能的展示很感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is calmly suggesting a reasonable course of action here. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Quiet}No, 8, you don't need to fill up the emitter again, really. {Beat}Klein means things... for trade. Display for trade.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{Quiet}不，8，你不用装填发射器，真的。{Beat}克莱因要的是用来交易的东西。用来展示的东西。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: *All right, let's consolidate. There's got to be some junk around here... magazines, useless, more caps, medicinal supplies... useless... here.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *好的，让我们整理一下。这儿有很多垃圾…杂志，没用的，大量的瓶盖，医药用品…没用的…这儿。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a backup copy of your... pencil processor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到一份…你的铅笔处理程序的备份文件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a backup copy of your... pencil processor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到一份你铅笔处理程序的备份文件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent! Now I can turn pencils and clipboards into items more useful to society... like lead, spare parts, and duct tape!
ESP.TRADUIT: 棒极了！这下我就能把铅笔、写字板变成对社会更有用的东西了…像是铅、备用零件，还有胶带！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a soundwave file for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一份声波文件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on, daddy-o! Just plug it in and I'll mix you up a sweet, sweet sound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有你的，老爹！把它插进来吧，让我给你混个又甜又美的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on, baby! Just plug it in and I'll mix you up a sweet, sweet sound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行啊！宝贝儿！把它插进来吧，让我给你混个又甜又美的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the basic stealth test. The robots will be looking for us, but we won't let them find us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是初级潜行测试。那些机器人在四处搜寻，但我们不能让它们发现我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This should be easy. As long as I don't screw up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这应该很容易，只要我别再搞砸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the advanced test. Watch out for laser tripwires. They'll ruin our day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是高级潜行测试。注意激光绊线，碰上就玩完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not supposed to give hints, but maybe you can disable the tripwires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我其实不该给提示，但也许你可以拆除这些绊线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the expert stealth test. If you thought the lasers were bad, wait till you see the proximity mines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是专家级潜行测试。如果你觉得激光绊线就够糟了，那大概是因为你还没遇到感应地雷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Psst. If you hack the mines this will go lots faster.
ESP.TRADUIT: 悄悄告诉你，那些地雷，拆了它们，任务就会简单很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the robot compliance test. If you sneak up on a robot, you can disable it. It's so easy even I can't mess up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是机器人适应性测试。只要潜行到一个机器人边上，并且不被发现，你就能关了它。小菜一碟不是吗，连我都不会失误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I can learn anything else here... but if you want to go again, that's fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得在这我没什么要学的了…不过你要是还想再来一次，也行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad. We hit a tripwire. That one was totally my fault, though. We can start again at the terminal. Sorry...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好，我们碰到绊线了，都是我的错。我们可以在终端机那里再来一次。真对不起…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe there's a way around the tripwires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该有路能绕过那些绊线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad. We triggered a mine. If you go back to the terminal to restart the test, I'll do better next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 糟糕，我们触发了地雷。回去终端机再做一次测试吧，我下次一定能做得更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we can disable the mines quickly, or find another way past. I'm sure you know best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许我们能快速解除那些地雷，或者改道绕行。你肯定知道怎么做最好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad. We were spotted by robots. If you go back to the terminal to restart the test, I won't mess up again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 糟糕，我们被机器人发现了。去终端机再做一次测试吧，我保证下次不会再搞砸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stealth Boys are a robot's big weakness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 隐身小子是机器人最大的死穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to recalibrate the Sonic Emitter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想重新校准下声波发射器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on, daddy. Let's spin some grooves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，老爹。让我好好帮你调！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on, baby. Let's spin some grooves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，宝贝。让我好好帮你调！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you made any electronic components?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有做好的电子元件吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yup, here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, no more today. Try me again tomorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，今天没有了。你可以明天再来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a backup file for your corroded module.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了你受损模块的备用品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! Let's fire that up so I can start making electronic components again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！赶紧激活它，这样一来我又能制作电子元件了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mean robot bugs! Mean robot bugs!
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶心的机器臭虫！恶心的机器臭虫！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found that upgrade disk you were looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到你想要的升级磁盘了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ho-ho, thank God! Finally, something resembling a useful purpose!
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，感谢上帝！终于有些有用的东西了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found you some upgrade disks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了一些你的升级磁盘。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that'll do just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，它们会有用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about these pylons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能跟我说说那些雷达塔么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ASK BOROUS. I BELIEVE HE KNOWS MORE ABOUT THE FENCE THAN ANY BRAIN. EXCEPT MAYBE MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去问鲍鲁斯。我相信关于防御屏障他懂得比其他的脑子都多，也许除了莫比乌斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: MOBIUS WAS INVOLVED IN THEIR CONSTRUCTION, IF I RECALL. BUT HE'S SUCH A HACK, HE PROBABLY WAS READING OFF OF BOROUS' NOTES AND SCHEMATICS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没记错的话，莫比乌斯也在建设者之列。但他只是个剽窃者，他可能偷看过鲍鲁斯的笔记和图纸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you please hurry? I've got a schedule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能请你快一点吗？我还要赶时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... great. I don't want to hear anymore about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢…太好了，我一点也不想往下听了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pylons? What pylons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷达塔？什么雷达塔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE RADAR FENCE THAT SURROUNDS THE BIG MT CRATER WILL PREVENT - ER, PROTECT YOU FROM STRAYING BEYOND THE FACILITY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：大山脉环形坑外围的雷达屏障能够阻止…呃，保护你，以免你跑到设施外面去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The mighty radar fence protects us ALL! Get too close to the blinking posts, and the proximity warning shall be your... WARNING you are too close!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-全能的雷达屏障保护我们免受任何威胁！离那些发光的塔太近，就会触发警报…警告你靠的太近了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: *If you get near it, your vision will blur as the electrodes in your head shut off one by one, click click click.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*如果你靠近它，视野就会变得模糊，因为你脑袋里的电极正被逐一关闭，咔咔咔。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Soothing}Possible memory loss will occur along with long-term nerve degradation. It is tied to not having a brain attached to your nervous system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：{Soothing}你可能出现记忆丧失，长期来看还伴有神经退化。因为你没有大脑来连接神经系统了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the nerve degradation is nothing to worry about - such degradation would take {emph}many lifespans to become evident. {Placating, as if "And really,"}And all biology dies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这种神经退化没什么好担心的。毕竟这需要很长时间才会产生明显影响，没有生物能活这么久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Such tiny inconveniences are less than the greater convenience - and conveyance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些小小的不便和获得的方便相比不值一提——你能传送回来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Tries to interject a sense of wonder, as if explaining to a child}You see, if rendered unconscious by the pylons, you will be returned to the Sink, seemingly instantaneously by your deadened perceptions.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Tries to interject a sense of wonder, as if explaining to a child}想想看呀，被雷达塔击晕后，在那种麻木的状态下，你会觉得回到汇聚节点就是一瞬间的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then can you help me get this done as quickly as possible? Sounds like a lot of walking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有办法帮我尽快完成任务吗？貌似这要走很多路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: AH, THAT IS CORRECT. YOU MUST {Emph}WALK UPON YOUR MANY-PENISED FEET. {Emph, condescending}MUCH SLOWER THAN OUR ADVANCED HOVERING ROBOTICAL FRAMES.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：啊，没错。你{emph}只能用你满是生殖器的脚移动，{Emph, condescending}肯定会比我们先进的悬浮机械骨架慢得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The little teddy bear could always run right into the pylon perimeter on its thick, turgid feet, returning it to us quickly and erectly - {corrects self}directly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：小泰迪熊可以踢着它又厚又肿的脚，跑到雷达塔边界上，然后它就能又快又硬…又干脆地回到我们身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't sound like my style. Maybe I'll do a little exploring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我的风格，我得先四处调查一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU WOULD NOT DARE. PERHAPS I CAN CHANGE YOUR MIND... USING THE GREATEST OF OUR SCIENCES. THE FENCE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：你不敢的，也许我能改变你的想法…用我们最伟大的科学成果——雷达屏障。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess I better get walking, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我还是走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I take my time, explore the crater?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我花时间探索这里会怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight anger}WHAT ILLOGIC IS THIS?! KEEP YOUR FILTHY PENIS-TIPPED FEET OUT OF OUR LABS AND SECRETS!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Slight anger}这有什么逻辑？！管好你长着生殖器的脏脚，不许你涉足我们的实验室和秘密！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There are things here no Lobotomite was MEANT to see, things that would ASTOUND! And possibly terrify. TERRIFY!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-其它无脑人绝对不会有像它这样的行为。放任不管的话它早晚会造成威胁！而且是可怕的威胁。可怕啊！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{We don't come over to your house and "f" your wife}Yeah, we don't come into your lab and decant {emph}your solutions.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{We don't come over to your house and "f" your wife}对对对，我们又不是要冲进你的实验室，倒掉你的实验溶液。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the magnificence of {emph}our monitors allow for true comprehension of the wonders of Big MT. Shield your jellied eyes lest they burn from your skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：只有我们卓越的{emph}显示器才能真正理解大山脉的奇迹。管好你的眼睛，免得亮瞎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust me, I want to get this over with as quickly as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放心吧，我会尽快搞定的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The faster I can get through this, the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我越快做完这些就越好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OUR INTENTIONS EXACTLY. THE IMPORTANT THING IS YOU RUSH QUICKLY THROUGH THIS TASK SO AS NOT TO WASTE {Emph}OUR TIME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我们正是这么打算的。你得赶快完成这些任务，免得浪费{emph}我们的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: DO {Emph}NOT GET CURIOUS OR YOU WILL END UP LIKE THE CAT OF SCHRÖDINGER.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要{Emph}太好奇，不然你就会和薛定谔的猫一个下场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We feared you would be tempted to explore Big MT Crater and examine the {emph}many amazing non-mandatory research labs that lie off your designated path.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我们怕你会禁不住诱惑，去四处探索大山脉环形坑，调查那些不在你行动事项上的{emph}令人惊叹的实验室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Chiding}The many such optional explorations are discouraged. Work hurriedly, as if you have blinders on, and leave curiosities and items of interest alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Chiding}别到处乱跑。赶紧行动，就像你带了眼罩，无视掉那些勾引你好奇心的地点和事物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -So many sciences and developments! Pass them by! Let impatience and the desire to simply finish, to end it all, quickly and carelessly guide you!-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-那么多的科学、技术！别管它们！让你的躁动与决心指引你简洁高效地搞定这一切！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is saying, "hey, what about my item! I made something, too!" EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Right you are, 8. In our test results, we'll make a note about how quickly you ran our maz... er, exper... Nobel... challenge.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你说的对，8。作为测试结果，我们会记下你耗时多久能完成我们的挑战，是错综复杂的…专家级的…不，是诺贝尔级的…挑战。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Soothing}After all, there will be plenty of time afterward to partake of the experiments once {emph}our bidding is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：{Soothing}毕竟，完成我们的任务后，你还有的是时间{emph}参加实验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget this. Where's the exit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管了。出口在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This whole place sounds dangerous. These devices sound dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这整个地方听起来很危险。这些设备听起来也很危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NONSENSE. THIS PLACE IS NO MORE DANGEROUS THAN A NUCLEAR DETONATION SITE, OUR TECHNOLOGIES NO MORE LETHAL THAN AN OVERCHARGED TESLA CANNON.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：胡说。这地方不会比核爆炸试验场危险，我们的技术也不会比一台过充的特斯拉加农炮危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Cheering>
ESP.TRADUIT: <欢呼声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 01 [0100E6FD] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 02 [0100E6FC] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Toaster [0100E6FA] (mod) NPC : Sink [0100E6FF] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet, Ulysses has just entered}...didn't think you'd make it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet, Ulysses has just entered}…我没想到你能活着回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dismissive, matter-of-fact}Almost didn't. Got my answers. {Rueful}Your Elijah, he met the Gods in this place, did a good job of making them question the way of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Dismissive, matter-of-fact}差点就回不来了。我得到了答案。{Rueful}你的以利亚，他见过这里的神，并且很好地使他们怀疑起自己的世界观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hunting instinct}Do you know where he went?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Hunting instinct}你知道他去哪儿了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's gone to the Sierra Madre. That's a special kind of hell. He won't come back. Someone smarter, tougher's going to kill him. If the Madre doesn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马德雷赌场。一个人间地狱。他不会回来了。即便赌场奈何不了他，也会有某个更聪敏、更难对付的人去了结他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Determined, angry, hates this guy}I have to go after him.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Determined, angry, hates this guy}我必须去继续追踪他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to talk you out of it. Know what it means to track someone you share history with. Got a meeting of my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无意劝阻你。因为我也清楚，追踪某个和你有“共同历史”的人意味着什么。因为我也将和自己的那个人会面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet}That Courier?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet}你说那个邮差？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Nods}Get her to come to me. {Beat, slow}Got a message for her, like the message she had for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Nods}我会让她来找我。{Beat, slow}我给她捎了个信，就像她也曾给我捎过信那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cold, staring into future, slight bitterness}Make them walk the road west, straight and true, sink their feet in Old World ash. Let storms tear at them. See the Divide. See what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Cold, staring into future, slight bitterness}让他们走过那真实的，笔直向西的路，脚踏旧世界的尘土，倾听风暴的嘶吼，去目睹大裂谷是何种模样，去了解那里发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Divide = Dangerous, desolate area, quiet}The Divide? There's nothing there.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Divide = Dangerous, desolate area, quiet}大裂谷？那里现在什么都不剩了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight smile}Nothing there? Like the Big Empty? The Sierra Madre? No, the Old World sleeps there, sure as the flag I carry. The Courier knows the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slight smile}什么都不剩？就像大坑洞（Big Empty）？像马德雷赌场？不，旧世界沉睡在那里，就像我背负的那面旗帜一样。邮差会知道路怎么走的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Closing note, foreshadowing final conflict}And at the Divide, her and I - there, we'll have an ending to things.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Closing note, foreshadowing final conflict}然后在大裂谷，我和她，就在那，一切会有个结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Quiet, Ulysses has just entered}...didn't think you'd make it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Closing note, foreshadowing final conflict}{Quiet, Ulysses has just entered}…我没想到你能活着回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Dismissive, matter-of-fact}Almost didn't. Got my answers. {Rueful}Your Elijah, he met the Gods in this place, did a good job of making them question the way of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Dismissive, matter-of-fact}差点就回不来了。我得到了答案。{Rueful}你的以利亚，他见过这里的神，并且很好地使他们怀疑起自己的世界观。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Hunting instinct}Do you know where he went?
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Hunting instinct}你知道他去了哪吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}He's gone to the Sierra Madre. That's a special kind of hell. He won't come back. Someone smarter, tougher's going to kill him. If the Madre doesn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}他去了马德雷赌场，一个人间地狱。他不会回来了。即便赌场奈何不了他，也会有某个更聪敏、更难对付的人去了结他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Determined, angry, hates this guy}I have to go after him.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Determined, angry, hates this guy}我必须去继续追踪他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}Not going to talk you out of it. Know what it means to track someone you share history with. Got a meeting of my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}我无意阻止你。因为我也清楚，追踪某个和你有“共同过去”的人意味着什么。因为我也将和自己的那个人相遇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Quiet}That Courier?
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Quiet}你指那个邮差？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Nods}Get him to come to me. {Beat}Got a message for him, like the message he had for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Nods}我会让他来找我。{Beat, slow}我给他捎了个信，就像他也曾给我捎过信那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Cold, staring into future, slight bitterness}Make them walk the road west, straight and true, sink their feet in Old World ash. Let storms tear at them. See the Divide. See what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE} {Cold, staring into future, slight bitterness}让他们走过那真实的，笔直向西的路，脚踏旧世界的尘土，倾听风暴的嘶吼，去目睹大裂谷是何种模样，去了解那里发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Divide = Dangerous, desolate area, quiet}The Divide? There's nothing there.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Divide = Dangerous, desolate area, quiet}大裂谷？那里现在什么都不剩了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Slight smile}Nothing there? Like the Big Empty? The Sierra Madre? No, the Old World sleeps there, sure as the flag I carry. The Courier knows the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Slight smile}什么都不剩？就像大坑洞（Big Empty）？像马德雷赌场？不，旧世界沉睡在那里，就像我背负的那面旗帜一样。那个邮差会知道路怎么走的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Closing note, foreshadowing final conflict}And at the Divide, he and I - there, we'll have an ending to things.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Closing note, foreshadowing final conflict}然后在大裂谷，我和他，就在那，一切会有个结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight frustration, trying to make a point}...don't want to argue philosophy with you. Brotherhood are {emph}preservationists. Tech in the wrong hands, it's dangerous. Mojave's proof.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slight frustration, trying to make a point}…我不想就理念问题和你争辩。兄弟会是群{emph}保护主义者。科技若落入恶徒之手，就会变得很危险。莫哈维废土就是最好的例子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Shrugs}No denying that. Proof's here in this crater, all around us. {Beat, slightly appraising}Your tribe, the Brotherhood - haven't met many of you. Wanted to.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Shrugs}我不否认这点。证据就在这环形坑里，在我们身边到处都是。{Beat, slightly appraising}你的部落，我是说兄弟会，我没怎么接触过你们，但我希望能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {More reflective}Thought you might be the last chance for the Mojave... the West. The East. But you're all the same mind, obsessed.
ESP.TRADUIT: {More reflective}本想或许你会是莫哈维最后的希望…不管是西部，还是东部。但事实上你们都一样，一样的痴迷不悟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {emph, correcting}Elijah is obsessed. He's mad. It's why they ordered his execution.
ESP.TRADUIT: {emph, correcting}痴迷不悟的是以利亚。他已经疯了。正是因此兄弟会才决定处决他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {"You..."}Two are more alike than you know, too wrapped in the wrong bits of history to see ahead. {Shrugs}Not judging. I know how it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: {"You..."}你们两个比你认为的要相似得多。同样囿于过去的错误，无法面对未来。{Shrugs}这不是批判。我知道那是什么感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quieter, reflective}People are like couriers, you and him. Sometimes don't even know the message they bring.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quieter, reflective}人们就像邮差一样，包括你和他。有时甚至不知道自己送的信是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Turns attention back to her}You all had a {emph}new flag. Thought maybe new ideas along with it. {Beat, quieter}What you believe isn't any better than the Bear or Bull. No future in either.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Turns attention back to her}你们都树起{emph}新旗帜，认为其中也许伴随有新的理念。{Beat, quieter}但你所信仰的并不好于双头熊，或公牛，也不见得更有前途。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Defiance}So says the man with the Old World flag on his back. America, the Commonwealth... burned away.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Defiance}这位背上画着旧世界旗帜的男人不也一样么。要知道美国，那个联邦…早已灰飞烟灭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slight anger, low}America {emph}sleeps. And until it's dead, I carry it. Just like I carried you. More than hope. Belief.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slight anger, low}美国{emph}只是陷入沉睡。只要我带着她，她就没有死。正如我刚刚带着你一样。这不仅仅是希望，更是信仰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's voices here in the Big Empty, I want to talk to them. Not like your Elijah did. {End on a downnote, like a movie trailer going away}Got questions. Want to hear history give its answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大坑洞（Big Empty）里的声音，我想和他们谈谈。我无意效仿你的那位以利亚。我有些问题，想听听历史会给出什么答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet, she's in a cell - she's been tortured, but recovering}This is Christine Royce. Knight of the Brotherhood of Steel... the Circle.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet, she's in a cell - she's been tortured, but recovering}这里是克里斯汀.罗伊斯，钢铁兄弟会的骑士…隶属圆环。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not going to make it through this, hope someone finds this message, gets it to the Brotherhood in the West.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我挺不过这一关了，希望有人能发现这条信息，把它带去西部兄弟会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tracked a rogue Brotherhood Elder, Elijah, here, to the Big Empty. {Breath}Place is more than it seems, there's a crater hidden deep inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了追捕逃亡的兄弟会长老，以利亚，我来到这，大坑洞（Big Empty）。{Breath}这地方不是看起来这么简单，深处是一个环形坑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Junkyard of Pre-War labs scattered across the crater's surface, all still running... {to herself, mutters}like this one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 环形坑里散布着战前研究所的残骸。所有设施仍在运行…{to herself, mutters}就像这栋一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elijah's dissecting these centers, one by one... tracked him to an old Chinese-American internment camp. Survivors, Ghouls, have bomb collars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以利亚一个接一个仔细地研究了这些设施。我尾随他来到了一个以前的华裔集中营。那里的幸存者，或者说尸鬼，都带着爆炸项圈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robots moved in when I tried to intercept him... Elijah sent the camp Ghouls against us both, like walking bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我试图拦截他时，机器人来了…以利亚把营内的尸鬼当成人体炸弹，来攻击我们双方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got hit by the explosions, woke up here. {To herself}Guess the medical robots were programmed to bring wounded victims from the camp to this center.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被爆炸击晕，醒来就在这里了。{To herself}我猜是医疗机器人，它们程序里或许有把营地伤员带到这个医疗中心的功能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some kind of Auto-Doc prototype lab... manned by corpses trapped inside suits that keep them moving, no idea why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里大概是自动医生原型的实验室…一些裹着束身服的死尸在控制这里运转，具体原因尚不清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure how long I'm going to last... cut open my head like a lot of the humans I've seen here, feel strange, can talk, but can't hack the term...{"terminal," trails off}
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知我还能坚持多久…切开我的头，就像对这里许多其他人一样，感觉好怪，还能说话，但破解不了这个终端…{"terminal," trails off}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {AUDIO: Need a distant explosion as Ulysses breaks in to save Christine.}
ESP.TRADUIT: {AUDIO}…等等，外面发生了爆炸。有人在这…是谁…{crackles, fades}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Christine [010143F8] (mod) Quest : ([0101462D]NVDLC03Holotapes) Big Empty Holotapes EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was curious about some things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些好奇的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, curiosity. I experience that less now that I know everything. Or maybe it was when I found out some unpleasant answers? Mmm-hmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好奇心。自从我通晓一切后就很少有这种感觉了。或许是说发现令人不快的答案时的那种感觉？嗯嗯……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I find things curious as well. Go on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也有点好奇了，请说下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Player keeps asking questions, likes this, like talking to a small child}Yes, yes, this is getting interesting. You are just filled with these little slices of curiosity, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Player keeps asking questions, likes this, like talking to a small child}是的，是的，越来越有意思了。你准备要打破砂锅问到底吧，嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I want to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想离开这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, that seems to be rather hormonal of you. Flight or fight response, you know, hard to cut that out completely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你的激素分泌相当旺盛。的确，这种情况下“战或逃”反应会很难抑制。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your brain is here, safe with me. {Smiles}We chat over Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的大脑同我在一起很安全。{Smiles}我和它一边嗑曼他特，一边聊天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is that a problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么那会是个问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Frowns}I'm not sure except that I'm sure there's a {emph}very good raisin for it. I have very good raisins for almost everything I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Frowns}我不太确定。唯一确定的是，我这么做有{emph}正当的理由。我行事一向有正当的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I forget them occasionally. Although I feel this one is especially important. Ha! Oh well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我偶尔会忘记它们。不过我觉得这次的事特别重要。哈！哦好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exactly. I want my brain so I can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我要拿回我的大脑，好离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you steal my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你要偷走我的大脑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, a variety of {"reasons"}raisins... you're something of a homily. Er, anomaly? You're really {"quite"}quiet special, and not in the cranially-challenged way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，有很多{"reasons"}理由…你算是个纽结，呃，应该说异常情况？你真的{"quite"}相当特别，我指的不是你没有大脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, you are the most successful brain extraction experiment ever performed here at Big MT. A victim of your own success, as it were.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，大山脉有史以来最成功的大脑提取手术，就是取走你脑子的那次。就是说，你是这次成功的受害者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you were to go back with what {emph}your brain knows about the procedure, well...
