ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Dawning revulsion}Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Dawning revulsion}你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Dawning revulsion}Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Dawning revulsion}你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Dawning revulsion}Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Dawning revulsion}你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I promise I'll take better care of myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 我保证我会更小心的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I believe you - and I'm not saying I do - we still have one significant problem we're facing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我相信你，不是说我真相信你，我们仍然还有很个棘手的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I promise I'll take better care of myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我保证我会更小心的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I believe you - and I'm not saying I do - we still have one significant problem we're facing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我相信你，不是说我真相信你，我们仍然还有很个棘手的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you're my brain and I'm your body. This is meant to be, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你是我的大脑，我是你的身体。我们是天生一对，宝贝儿！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dawning revulsion}Are you... are you coming on to me?! Sweet Lord, I don't even have the words for how repugnantly wrong that is!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Dawning revulsion}你是…你是对我有意思吗？！我的神啊，我该怎么形容这恶心的错误！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please tell me we weren't that perverse when I was in your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托告诉我，以前在你的脑袋里，咱们从没做过那种变态的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Shaking off the horror}Anyways, even if... {disgust}that... was on the table, we have a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Shaking off the horror}不管怎样，即使…{disgust}那…都摆在台面上了，我们还有别的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Too bad. I've got arms, you don't. You're coming with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真遗憾。我有胳膊，你没有。你只能跟我走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see there's going to be no reasoning with you at all, is there? I'm nothing more than a slave to your deranged, glandular whims.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我懂了，和你根本没道理可讲，对吗？我只不过是你的腺体带来的疯狂想法的奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see your point. What can I do to make this a fair compromise?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白你的意思了，我们怎样才能达成公平的协议呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want me back, we need to establish some ground rules.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想让我回来，我们就要制定些基本规则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, showers! Second, regular check-ups. {emph}Regular, mind you, and from a reputable doctor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一，勤洗澡！第二，定期体检。{emph}记住，要定期去，而且要找个声誉良好的医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Julie Farkas woman, for example. She seems to know a thing or two.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如那个叫朱莉·法卡斯的女人。她看起来还懂点东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Third, you need to listen to me more than your hormonal choir and genitalian orchestra. Promise me that, and you've got a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第三，比起你的荷尔蒙唱诗班、生殖器管乐队，你得更尊重我的声音。答应这些，我们就能达成协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what about the good things? What about crushing those who oppose you, the smell of fire... loot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就没有值得怀念的了？像毁灭你的敌人，战火硝烟的味道…还有那些战利品？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All motivated by nothing but an imbalance in certain brain chemicals. The tank corrects for that - I feel no urge toward antisocial behavior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些都是由大脑某些化学物质分泌失衡引起的。脑罐修正了这一问题，我现在完全没有反社会倾向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what about the good things? What about a cool breeze on your cheek, the smell of food... love?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就没有你留恋的事了？比如抚过面颊的凉风，食物诱人的香气…亦或是爱情？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Overrated biological feedback. Believe me, you only feel that way because you've got all that meat... oozing hormones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过是被高估的生物反馈罢了。相信我，你向往这些事物全是因为那具肉体…充斥着荷尔蒙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you want to be reunited? I thought you'd be happy to get back into my head!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不想回来吗？我还以为你会很高兴地归位呢！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to lie to you, the prospect is definitely not that appealing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实话告诉你，我一点也不期待回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at it from my perspective. Here, I have peace, quiet, and safety - well, barring the odd rogue scorpion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我的角度来看，呆在这儿，我平静，安宁而且安全。好吧，除了那只古怪凶狠的蝎子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In your head, I've got poison, radiation, grisly injuries, and biological functions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你脑袋里，我就得担心毒素，辐射，伤残和你的各种生理需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how much more you can get done when you're not constantly looking for places to urinate? It's quite a lot, I can tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道少去几次厕所你能多做多少其他事情么？很多！很多很多！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about you? That tank isn't exactly looking springtime fresh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你呢？这个脑罐看着也不太干净。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Taken aback, player has caught him}I... well... that's a completely different matter! The tank isn't biological, it's not the same at all!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Taken aback, player has caught him}我…呃…这完全是两码事！脑罐又不是生物体，这完全不是一回事！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最近很忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sarcastic, maybe a little baby-talk}Oh yes, I rather expect you have. You must have been swamped, you poor dear. Why don't you relax and put your feet up?
ESP.TRADUIT: {sarcastic, maybe a little baby-talk}噢，当然，我完全理解。你一定忙得不可开交吧，可怜的小家伙。干嘛不放松一下，把脚翘起来呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've just been traumatically scooped out of my body and plugged into this jar, that's all. But, you've been {emph}busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最近除了被挖出身体，塞到贮槽里，什么都没干。但你可{emph}忙得很啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Because running around a crater full of bizarre science experiments, hygiene is a top priority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。这个环形坑里到处是奇怪的科学实验，鉴于我需要在这四处探索，卫生问题是第一要务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I see sarcasm hasn't eluded you. Fine, perhaps now isn't the best time, but it's the principle of the thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼，看来这回没能讽刺到你。好吧，或许现在不是最佳时机，但原则问题绝不容变通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no need to be sarcastic. Meeting your own brain is a slightly odd event.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别这么挖苦人，一个人同自己的脑子面对面可不是件寻常事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, well, believe me, the opposite is equally true. Good Lord, have you bathed at all since they pulled me out of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，嗯，相信我，脑子这边也一样。天呐，他们把我拉出来后，你有洗过澡吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's just say violence is the last resort of the civilized man, and I'm feeling mighty uncivilized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直说吧，暴力是文明人的最后手段，现在我觉得自己很不文明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With an attitude like that, it's small wonder you got yourself shot in the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 秉持着这样的观点…难怪你的脑袋会挨枪子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Unarmed 75+}
[SUCCEEDED] Not much of one for the high-tech approach, are we? Well, I suppose we'd best get on with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 不怎么高科技的手段，是吧？好，咱们这就上吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to show them even a video screen can get a black eye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让他们知道，原来装着显示屏也能体验到什么叫“眼前一黑”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Hmm... yes, I don't think you've {emph}quite thought this through yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 呃…这，你真的{emph}好好考虑过了吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I sort of thought I'd just start punching things and see where that gets me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的计划是先冲上去揍他们，然后看看效果如何。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Going the old-fashioned route, are we? I rather like it. What's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 想走老派路线吗？正合我意。接下来怎么干？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The brains have forgotten the little things. Things like sharp blades and heavy chunks of steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些大脑们忘了许多小东西，比如锋利的匕首，沉重的铁锤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Before you go that route, do me a favor and read up on the history of battles in which men with swords fought giant brains with lasers.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 踏上征途之前，帮我个忙，去查查历史上有哪次战役讲的是人类用剑打败了会射镭射的大脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought since they like lasers so much, I'd surprise them. With a club or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们爱用激光，所以我得出其不意，拿根棒子什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Explosives 75+}
[SUCCEEDED] Well, you have always been thorough in your destruction. All right, what's your plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 好吧，你摧毁起东西来总是那么一丝不苟。你有什么计划？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever had a squirrel brain omelet? That, but on a bigger scale. And with bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃过松鼠脑煎蛋饼吗？我正要做，只是料更足，而且要用炸弹来煎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I see. And you plan to be standing in the midst of this mayhem? Well, that's a novel strategy.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 哦，你想连自己一块炸？还不错，这倒是种新奇的策略。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think bombs? Yeah, maybe bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 炸弹应该能行？嗯，凑合就是它了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Energy Weapons 75+}
ESP.TRADUIT: {能量武器 75+}

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, energy weapons. Yes... I'd almost forgotten how much fun those are. How do we proceed, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 噢，能量武器。当然是能量武器…我都快忘记它们有多好玩了。那我们接下来干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to show them what's really the brightest thing in the room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让他们看看什么才是屋子里最耀眼的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I hate to say it, but your ability to handle high-tech energy weapons doesn't exactly instill within me great confidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 不得不说，高科技能量武器由你使用，实在不能让我放心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got lasers, right? I thought we'd use lasers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有镭射武器，是吧？我觉得可以用镭射武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Guns 75+}
[SUCCEEDED] Hmm... now that you mention it, I do miss that lovely "rat-a-tat boom" a bit. It's just not the same without a body to feel the recoil.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]嗯…听你这么一说，我有点怀念那可爱的"砰砰声"了。可惜现在我没身体，感受不到后坐力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the next step, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后呢，下一步该怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to give them a demonstration of the physics behind small, fast-moving chunks of lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要好好给他们展示一下这些飞速移动的小铅块背后的物理原理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Yes, I think you haven't quite got the hang of punning yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]好吧，看来你还不太会使用双关语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to introduce them to a world of pain. Bullet pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会将他们送到一个充满痛苦的世界——子弹的痛苦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you really saying you'd let the Think Tank outwit us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们就自认才智不如那些思想体咯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Indignant}You're trying to appeal to my ego now, aren't you? Well, let me tell you something about ego, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Indignant}激将法？你在试图唤起我的“自我”，是吧？好啊，那我就告诉你一些关于“自我”的事情，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ego does {emph}not come from a gland. That's all intellect, and I'll be damned if I'm going to float here and let them put one over on us! What's the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: “自我”绝对{emph}不来源于腺体。它源于理智。另外，我疯了才会漂在这罐子里，任由他们戏弄！说吧，你有什么计划？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Noooooooooo...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robobrain [0100A381] (mod) Quest : ([01015A95]NVDLC03X8RobobrainDialogue) Dialogue X8 Robobrain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Innocent wonder}What is this strange new world around me? What does it hold in store for a dreamer such as myself?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Innocent wonder}我周围这个陌生的新世界是怎么样的？里面有什么东西等着我这样的梦想家去发现？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robobrain [0100A381] (mod) Quest : ([01015A95]NVDLC03X8RobobrainDialogue) Dialogue X8 Robobrain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Innocent voice, waking up}What... I feel like this has happened before. Yet I feel awake for the first time? What is going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Innocent voice, waking up}什么……我感觉这在以前也发生过。可我又觉得我是初次醒来？这到底是怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robobrain [0100A381] (mod) Quest : ([01015A95]NVDLC03X8RobobrainDialogue) Dialogue X8 Robobrain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Innocent voice, waking up}Who... am I? I... feel different, awake, alive for the first time ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Innocent voice, waking up}我……我是谁？我……感觉不一样了，第一次如此清醒地活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Robobrain [0100A381] (mod) Quest : ([01015A95]NVDLC03X8RobobrainDialogue) Dialogue X8 Robobrain EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}Big MT: I, Dr. Mobius, will soon control you - and all of Science!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}大山脉：我，莫比乌斯博士，即将成为你的主宰——还有全科学的主宰！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement, Taunting}Mighty Think Tank... still c-c-c-c-cowering in your Dome? Cower, you fools. {beat, slightly quieter}Cower.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement, Taunting}万能的思想体们…打算继续缩在穹顶里？那就缩着吧，你们这些蠢货。{beat, slightly quieter}缩着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement, Doesn't realize mic is on}Time to reward myself with a little breath-freshening Mentat. Mmmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement, Doesn't realize mic is on}是时候奖励自己一点曼他特了。仿佛重获新生。嗯嗯嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}Try to leave your Dome, Think Tank, and you will be punished by the pincered might of my Robo-Scorpion army!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}离开穹顶试试，思想体，我的机械蝎大军会用有力的钳子好好招待你们！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement, Disgust}Think Tank... I wouldn't even use binary to describe my exponential hatred for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D,Announcement, Disgust}思想体们…二进制都无法尽述我对你们的仇恨，指数级的仇恨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}My aggression is increasing geometrically. Do you hear me, "Think" Tank?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}我的攻击性正以几何级数增长。听到了吗，思想体们？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement, To himself}Soon... all Science will be mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement, To himself}很快…科技将尽归我手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}Oh, Klein - did I mention that my zone is FORBIDDEN to you? Ha ha ha ha ha! SO forbidden.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}哦，克莱因，我说过禁止你来我的领地吗？哈哈哈哈哈！非常禁止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}2 plus 2 equals... 4-Bidden, idiots of the Think Tank!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}愚蠢的思想体们，2加2等于…4倍的禁止！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement, Thinking}I hope I didn't leave my Giant Robo-Scorpion on. That thing eats power like no tomorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement, Thinking}希望我没忘记关掉那只机械巨蟹。那家伙是个吃能量大户，像是吃了上顿就没下顿一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement, Quiet}I'll just set this on repeat while I go relieve my tank... no one will know.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement, Quiet}在去休息的时候，我会设置成循环播放…没人会发现的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}Rant! Rant! Rant! See how I abstract my rage, Think Tank? I hold you in such disdain I generalize my hatred for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}怒吼！怒吼！怒吼！思想体们，看我是怎么形容愤怒的。对你们，我不屑一顾，根本懒得费口舌去仔细描述我的愤怒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}Go, my mighty Robo-Scorpions. Crawl in search of intelligence. Then, {emph}sting said intelligence, yes, {emph}sting it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}上吧，我强大的机械蝎，给我找到智能体。然后，{emph}蛰他们，对，{emph}狠狠地蛰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}My Robo-Scorpions will soon conquer the Crater. {Quieter, making excuses}It's just that this is a big place, so it's hard to conquer everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}我的机械蝎即将征服整个环形坑。{Quieter, making excuses}不过这里确实挺大，完全攻克大概不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}Klein... remember the time you forgot to carry the 2 and nearly blew up the {why-zero}Y-0 Research Center? {Klein did blow up the lab so now he's mocking}Oh, wait, you did! {beat}Or was that me?
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}克莱因…还记得那次你少进个2，结果差点把{why-zero}Y-0研究中心炸平的丑事吗？{Klein did blow up the lab so now he's mocking}哦，等等，就是你吧！{beat}难不成还能是我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D, Announcement}Klein, as useless as the bottle of the same name... well, except as an example of an object that uselessly tries to fulfill its purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D, Announcement}克莱因，你就和克莱因瓶一样毫无用处…哦，除了用作反面教材，一个“试图实现目的却徒劳无功”的物事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}-The Cazador Preserve and the Nightstalker Splicing facilities are strangely quiet. TOO quiet.-
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}-猎蜂保护区和夜行兽基因移接实验区还真是安静啊，静得都有点不寻常了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}-X-8 and X-13 and X-2 are your DESTINATION, non-Lobotomite. Can you HEAR us?! You MUST hurry!-
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}-X-8、X-13还有X-2是你的目的地，不是无脑人的无脑人。你能听见吗？！你必须快点！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}-What TERRORS does Big {Mountain}MT hold for the intrepid seeker?! {beat, quieter}Really. Does anyone know? I'm at a loss.-
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}-大山脉 {Mountain}为无所畏惧的探险家准备了怎样的恐惧呢？！{beat, quieter}说真的，有人知道吗？我一直想知道。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}-BEWARE Dr. Mobius' army! His Robo-Scorpions crawl everywhere, in SEARCH of intelligence to devour and stupify!-
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}-小心莫比乌斯博士的大军！他的机械巨蝎到处乱爬，捕食智慧生命，并向他们发射致愚光波！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}-Anyone who can understand these messages - YOU DO NOT BELONG HERE! We will FIND you!-
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}-任何能听懂该信息的人，你不该来这儿！我们会找到你的！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}Slight chance of seed dispersal from Botanical Gardens predicted in the late evening.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}今天傍晚，植物园方向可能会吹来一团种子云。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement - There is no standing in the green zone}There is no standing on the green pipes. If you are standing on the green pipes, please get off them at once.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement - There is no standing in the green zone}不要站在绿色管道上面。要是你站到了上面，请立即离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}If you see Robo-Scorpions, do not attempt to fight them. They will shoot you with their robotic stingers, and then... possibly explode.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}要是碰到机械蝎，切勿尝试与其对抗。它们会用机械尾刺向你射击，然后…可能会爆炸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}Do not attempt to breach the Big MT force fields. Doing so could allow dangerous ideas and/or creatures having those ideas to escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}不要尝试破坏大山脉的力场。该举动不仅会放出危险的想法，还会放出带有这些想法的危险生物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}Are you out there, my little teddy bear Lobotomite? Dala misses you and the pitter-patter of your penis feet {emph}so much.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}我亲爱的小泰迪熊无脑人，你在哪里？达拉非常{emph}想你，还有你长着生殖器的脚落地时的啪踏踏声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}DR. MOBIUS, SURRENDER YOURSELF. YOU CANNOT WIN DESPITE THE FACT THAT THE ODDS ARE HEAVILY IN YOUR FAVOR.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}莫比乌斯博士，投降吧。尽管你已很有胜算，你仍然不可能获胜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}ATTENTION: THE BLUE GRASS SURROUNDING THE DOME ABSORBS ALL FERTILIZER, INCLUDING FECAL MATTER. THIS DOES NOT GIVE YOU LICENSE TO EXCRETE ON IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}注意：穹顶周边的蓝草能吸收所有肥料，包括排泄物。但这不意味着允许你在上面排泄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}X-12 IS CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE. ON AN UNRELATED NOTE, WHOEVER CLOSED X-12, PLEASE REPORT TO THE DOME.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}X-12已被关闭，直至另行通知。说句题外话，不管是谁关闭了X-12，请立刻向穹顶报告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}PLEASE AVOID BOOM TOWN FOR THE FORSEEABLE FUTURE, UNTIL WEAPON TESTING IS RESOLVED.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}在可预见的未来里，请勿靠近“新兴城市”，直至武器试验结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}ATTENTION: BIG MT. THIS IS AN URGENT MESSAGE. IF YOU HAPPEN TO SEE A GECKO... {loses train or thought as he starts trying the echo}ECKO. ECHO? ECH-O. ECHOOOO. ECHOOOO.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}注意：大山脉实验基地，这是一条紧急通知。如果你碰巧看到一只蜥蜴…{loses train or thought as he starts trying the echo}蜥蜴…回声？蜥蜴蜴蜴。蜥蜴蜴蜴蜴。蜴蜴蜴蜴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}THE REST OF YOU SHOULD TRY THIS INTERCOM THING. IT MAKES YOU SOUND LIKE SOME KIND OF... SKY-GOD!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}你们其他人也应该试试这个对讲机，它让你听起来有点像…天空之神！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}ALL LOBOTOMITES, PLEASE STOP MILLING ABOUT. {beat}REALLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}所有的无脑人，请停止你们无目的乱转的行为，{beat}真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{2D Announcement}Attention: Big MT. There is a 95% chance of clear skies interrupted with artillery fire.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{2D Announcement}注意：大山脉研究中心。接下来晴转炸弹雨的概率是95%。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{2D Announcement}Attention: Lobotomites. Do not neglect to wash the Walking Eye!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{2D Announcement}听好了，无脑人，别忘记去洗步行眼！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{2D Announcement}The Uncanny Valley research center has been canceled until further notice. As in, until someone notices it.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{2D Announcement}恐怖谷理论研究中心目前已关闭，直至另行通知。就是说，呃，在有人收到通知之后。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{2D Announcement}We are reading increased levels of berserkity in Securitrons from the De-Construction Plant.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{2D Announcement}检测到拆解工厂内电子保安的狂暴指数正迅速飙升。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{2D Announcement}Force fields can only be disrupted by a specific frequency. {Quieter, a little embarrassed, since he lost it}If anyone has found the frequency, last seen around X-8, let the Dome know at once.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{2D Announcement}力场只能被某个特定频率破坏。{Quieter, a little embarrassed, since he lost it}如果谁找到那个，呃，丢在X-8附近的频率，请立刻到穹顶报告。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{2D Announcement}Do not approach the pylons. Pylons are the glowing things. Also, do not approach a fallen pylon. If you see a fallen pylon, call security.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *{2D Announcement}不要接近任何雷达塔。雷达塔就是会发光的东西。还有，不要接近任何倒下的塔。假如某个雷达塔倒下了，马上呼叫安保人员。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D2]NVDLC03Dialogue0) Dialogue Dr. O EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}WELL DONE, LOBOTOMITE. SOON, THE TECHNOLOGIES WILL BE SAFE.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}做得好，无脑人。很快，其他技术都就能安全了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}THE LOBOTOMITE HAS RETRIEVED TWO... COUNT THEM, TWO... OF THE THREE TECHNOLOGIES.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}无脑人已经找回了两种…让我数数看，三种技术中的…两种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}OUR LOBOTOMITE: THREE. DR. MOBIUS: ZERO.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}我们的无脑人：3分。莫比乌斯博士：0分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}Intruder, return what you have stolen from X-2!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}入侵者，把从X-2抢走的赃物还回来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}If you think braving the Cyberdogs of X-8 makes you... brave, intruder, it is no use. {emph}All Cyberdogs are under my command, and they will bite you.
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}你觉得通过X-8赛博犬的考验后就能高枕无忧了？入侵者，没用的。{emph}因为所有赛博犬都听我指挥，它们会追着你咬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}You think that Aural Stealth Suit will keep you hidden from me? Think again!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}你认为那消声潜行衣能让你逃出我的法眼？大错特错！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {2D Announcement}Intruder, you will not escape the eyes of my Robo-Scorpions! Or their pincers!
ESP.TRADUIT: {2D Announcement}入侵者，你逃不过我机械蝎大军的眼睛！也逃不过它们的钳子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : [01015AA9] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我再想想，抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sarcasm}Well, the important thing is that you're good and decisive about these things.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sarcasm}好吧，重要的是合你心意，且你已经下定决心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Certainly. Whenever you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，随时来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I need to think about it some more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我还得再好好考虑一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure. In you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确定，进来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I hope you'll pay a bit more attention to me this time around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。希望这回你能对我更关注一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. This shouldn't be too painful...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。这应该不会太疼……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've changed my mind. I want you back in my skull after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改变主意了，我还是想让你回到我的脑袋里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sarcasm}Oh, what joy. What bliss. Well, seeing as how I have no leverage with which to persuade you otherwise... are you sure?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sarcasm}哦，我真开心，真幸福。好吧，鉴于我也没法劝你回头…你确定吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've come to a similar conclusion myself. Are you sure that's what you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我倒是愿意，但你确定那是你想要的么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've thought it over, and I want you back in my head. We're both stronger together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经想清楚了，我想要你回到我的脑袋里。我们两个在一起能变得更加强大，

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... so long, then. I'm going back to the Think Tank. They promised to let me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好…那就再见了，我要去见思想体，他们答应放我走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is ridiculous. I can't leave my brain here to rot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太荒唐了，我不能让我的脑子烂在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it's great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然好极了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will!
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, then. I'm going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那么我走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'll explore the Big Mountain more before I go back to the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许回智库前我应该再探索一下大山脉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you take some free advice from your brain? Don't trust the Think Tank. They aren't... right. In the brain, I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿意听听你脑子提供的免费建议吗？别信任那些思想体。他们不太…正常。脑子不太正常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're fiercely protective of their technology, and none of them is likely to share it willingly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们对自己的技术有极强的保护欲，不会愿意与别人分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I'll go back to the Think Tank and get them to let me out. They promised to do that much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我应该回智库，让思想体们放我出去，他们向我保证过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, you can stay here. Not like I need this hassle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，那你就在这儿呆着吧。我懒得和你多费口舌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Acid}Oh, no, you don't need this hassle. You're too busy treating your body like a canvas of sucking flesh wounds to deal with your brain!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Acid}哦，不，你不要我这个麻烦了吗。是忙着处理一兜子流着血的新鲜伤口所以顾不上你的脑子了吗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {A little awkward, trying not to sound offensive}Ugh... It's not that I didn't like being in your head, you understand. As far as heads go, it was a rather nice one.
ESP.TRADUIT: {A little awkward, trying not to sound offensive}呃…不是说我讨厌待在你的头里，你能理解吧。就头而言，它还是很不错的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then. I suppose this is goodbye for now. What will you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。我想我们该说再见了。你准备做些什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I have been a little unfair. If you want to stay here, I'll let you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前我可能对你是不太公平。所以如果你想留在这，请便吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Science 75+}
[SUCCEEDED] Of course I accounted for that! Do you think I'm so stupid... no, you're right.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我当然考虑过！你当我是傻…不，其实你说的对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maintaining my current functionality will be harder than I thought. This bears some further looking into.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维持我目前的机能比我想像的要更难，这还需要更深入仔细的研究。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then surely you've taken into account the corrosive effects of long-term exposure to biogel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定考虑过长期接触生物凝胶可能会导致的腐蚀作用吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Actually, yes. I do think that. I think that exact thing. All the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 说实话，没错，我就是这么想的。一直如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think you're smarter than the Think Tank and Dr. Mobius combined?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为你比思想体们和莫比乌斯博士加起来还聪明？

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if I put you back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我把你安回去呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not entirely sure. I suppose there's a chance that the re-integration would create some improved synergy between us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定。重新把我们整合在一起，应该能进一步提高你我的协同效益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What form that might take, though, I cannot say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但要问是以怎样的形式，这就难说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you never say anything about how you felt before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 过去为什么从未听你表达过什么感受？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you think all those self-preservation instincts were, hmm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你那些自我保护的本能是从哪里来的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All those times you thought, for a fleeting second, "maybe I shouldn't punch that Deathclaw in the face?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有那些稍纵即逝的念头，像"也许我刚才不该一拳打在死亡爪脸上？"
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was me, telling you {emph}exactly how I felt before!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是我，是我在告诉你我究竟有什么感受！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would happen to me if I left you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你留在这儿，我会怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. Let me see... I suppose you'd continue on much as you are now, using that synthetic thinking machine to do the heavy lifting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，让我想想…我觉得你应该变化不大，不过是继续像现在这样，用人造的思维机器吃力地处理问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless of course the batteries run out, but that seems unlikely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，除非它没电了，不过这应该不太可能发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look what happened to the Think Tank. Do you want to end up like them after a few hundred years?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看那些思想体的吧，你想几百年后变得和他们一样吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's true, the brains here have experienced some degree of... deterioration. I'm confident that with a few decades of work, I can solve the problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承认，那些脑子多少有些…变质。但给我几十年时间，我肯定能解决这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you like being stuck in there so much, maybe I'll just leave you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，既然你这么想被困在这个罐子里，那就成全你好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sarcasm, mock-pleading}Oh no! Please don't leave me here in this nice, safe dome where I have access to nutritive fluids and a fully indexed library!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sarcasm, mock-pleading}哦，不！别把我抛弃在这个漂亮、安全的穹顶里，这里能提供维生液体，还有个完备的图书馆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please don't deprive me of being dragged through a landscape so bleak, it was actually improved by the end of the world!
ESP.TRADUIT: 求你不要剥夺我被迫看遍那荒凉风景的权利，它比世界末日的时候要好多了啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know how I could bear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都不知道该怎么活下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what, you'd rather just stay here? Never leaving that tank of... whatever that stuff is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，就是说，你打算就待在这了？寸步不离这个什么罐？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, certainly there might be some things I miss about being ambulatory. We have seen some incredible sights, haven't we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我确实对旅行时的生活有些留恋，咱们见识过不少令人称奇的景观，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jason Bright and his followers launching into the vast unknown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰森.布莱特和他的追随者们驶入浩瀚的未知世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: HELIOS One coming back on-line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太阳神一号再次运转。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But still, given the tremendous, potentially life-ending peril that went along with those... yes. Yes, I'd rather stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即便如此，鉴于你我同行所带来的巨大、潜在、致命的危险…嗯，没错，我还是待在这儿吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I have to think about this some more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不清楚，让我再想想吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes of course, by all means take your time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你不必着急。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... maybe we could keep going like this. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…也许现在这样也挺好，你觉得呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean, I'll stay in my tank and you'll stay in your... skin... and we'll each handle our own areas of expertise?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说，以后我待在脑罐里，你待在…你皮肤里面…你我各司其职，各尽其责？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, I certainly like the sound of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，听起来不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we have to trust each other and acknowledge that we aren't complete if we're separated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该相互信任，承认分离后的自己都是不完整的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose there might be some advantage to that, yes. There's a chance that the re-integration would create some improved synergy between us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，有道理。重新把我们整合在一起，应该能进一步提高你我的协同效益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, bet you didn't think of that, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，看样子你没想过这个问题，嗯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes yes, all right, bravo, you've come up with something I neglected to consider. There'll be no living with you now. So, what do we do about this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，是，没错，干得漂亮，你指出了一个我忽略的问题。既然以后我没法和你一起生活了，那么，给点意见吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, we're at an impasse. You can't feel what I feel, and I can't think the way you think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 似乎陷入僵局了，你体会不到我的感受，我也理解不了你的想法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed. Quite the conundrum. How do you suppose we resolve it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，真是个难题，你认为我们该怎么解决？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Speech 75+}
[SUCCEEDED] Hmm... I suppose you're right. That does call certain assumptions into question, doesn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 嗯…我想你是对的。这确实质疑了我的某些预设，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't it just as true that you only feel this way because you're lacking those hormones?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你又怎么确定那是自己的想法，而不是激素缺失的结果？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I don't "believe" it, it's just a simple fact. One may as well "believe" the earth is round or that the specific gravity of uranium is 18.9.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我不是"认定"它是对的，它就是基本的事实。就像人们也"认定"地球是圆的，或者铀元素的特定重力是18.9。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't really believe that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能直接认定那就是对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Humming>
ESP.TRADUIT: <哼小调>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Your Brain [0100ACFC] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see... 4... 5... 8... 1... 5... 1... yes! That's it! I've calculated pi to the very end!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想想…4…5…8…1…5…1…对！就是这样！我算出了圆周率的最后一位！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Your Brain [0100ACFC] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not that I want to be a Robobrain exactly, but... some treads would be nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是说我想变成一个机器脑，但是…要是能装上些履带会很棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Your Brain [0100ACFC] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Singing - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PscQSSdlX-Q}A British tar is a soaring soul, as free as a mountain bird...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Singing - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PscQSSdlX-Q}那英国水手拥有自由的灵魂，就像一只自由的小鸟…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Your Brain [0100ACFC] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's the body doing? Any fresh head wounds I should know about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 身体最近怎么样？头部有没有添什么新伤？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Your Brain [0100ACFC] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are the old batteries holding up, hmm? Experiencing any slowdowns yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 脑袋里的旧电池用着感觉如何啊？有没有感觉反应变迟钝了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Your Brain [0100ACFC] (mod) Quest : ([01003734]NVDLC03DialoguePlayerBrain) 01003734 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woof! {Hello/happy bark - deep, as from big dog}
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪！{Hello/happy bark - deep, as from big dog}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woof-woof! {Hello/happy bark - deep, as from big dog}
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪-汪！{Hello/happy bark - deep, as from big dog}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woof! <pants> {Hello/happy bark + short panting - deep, as from big dog}
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪！<pants> {Hello/happy bark + short panting - deep, as from big dog}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woof!{dog trying to say "Hello" - deep, as from big dog}
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪！{dog trying to say "Hello" - deep, as from big dog}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark! {single happy-bark - dog impersonation}
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪！{single happy-bark - dog impersonation}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark-bark! {double happy-bark - dog impersonation}
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪-汪！{double happy-bark - dog impersonation}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark! <pants> {single happy-bark + quick panting - dog impersonation}
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪！<pants> {single happy-bark + quick panting - dog impersonation}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bark-bark! {dog trying to say "I love you" - dog impersonation}
ESP.TRADUIT: 汪-汪！{dog trying to say "I love you" - dog impersonation}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are we being watched?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人在看我们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We haven't seen anybody in a while... maybe the monsters have stealth suits too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有段时间不见人影了…怪物们会不会也穿了潜行甲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who do you think is cuter, Dr. Klein or Dr. Borous?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得谁更可爱，克莱因博士还是鲍鲁斯博士？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're my best friend forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你永远都是我最好的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet no one has ever been as unnoticed as me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌没人比我更不起眼了……
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Starting combat! {Teasing, singsong}Just kidding!
ESP.TRADUIT: 开始战斗！{Teasing, singsong}说着玩的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you like me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Med-X reserves empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吗啡针-X储备已空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more Med-X to kill the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 止痛用的吗啡针-X一点也不剩了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Running low on Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吗啡针-X即将耗尽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Painkiller reserves critical. Oh, the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 储备止痛药很重要。哦，头疼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Med-X supplies adequate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吗啡针-X储备充足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're okay on Med-X. Until we have to numb the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们需要止痛之前，吗啡针-X还算够用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All out of Stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 治疗针用光了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try not to get injured. We're fresh out of Stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽量别受伤，咱们没治疗针了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should pick up more Stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早知道就多带点治疗针了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stimpak reserves minimal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 治疗针储备不足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stimpak reserves adequate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 治疗针供应充足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're okay on Stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 咱们有足够的治疗针。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mess with me, pal! I got a heating element with your name on it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别把我惹急了，伙计！我的加热元件上刻着你的名字呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Toaster [0100E6FA] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon the day will be at hand! I will ride forth at the head of my armies, and we will crush our foes and hear the weeping of their small appliances!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那一天即将来临！我将统领大军前进，将粉碎所有敌人，他们的小家电只能暗自痛哭！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Toaster [0100E6FA] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {chortling, playing a practical joke and concealing it poorly}Hey! Hey! I got a... super-rare... Mojave snowglobe here! All you gotta do is reach down into my bread slot!
ESP.TRADUIT: {chortling, playing a practical joke and concealing it poorly}嘿！嘿！我有个…超级稀有的…莫哈维雪景球哟！把手伸进我的面包槽就能拿到它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Toaster [0100E6FA] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon, pitiful worms! Soon I will rule, and your lives will have their doneness setting turned to... {ominous}darkest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快，可怜虫们！很快我就会大权在握，你们的命运就是被焚至…{ominous}焦黑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Toaster [0100E6FA] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Laden with as much ominous foreboding as you can possibly manage}Would you like some toast?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Laden with as much ominous foreboding as you can possibly manage}想来片烤面包吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Toaster [0100E6FA] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cursed electric heating filament! You are inadequate to my needs! Why? Why? Why was I not built with a death ray!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操蛋的电热丝！你根本没法匹配我的需求！为什么？为什么？为什么我不能发射死亡射线！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Toaster [0100E6FA] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The toaster. Beware the toaster. If it could, it would burn the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 烤面包机，小心烤面包机。一有机会，他就会将世界付之一炬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Singing to himself}Mugs, mugs, mugs! Mugs, mugs, mugs! Mug-a-mug! Mug-a-mug! Mugs! {Hysterical rage}God, why can't I stop singing this fucking song?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Singing to himself}马克，马克，马克杯！马克，马克，马克杯！马呀马克杯！马呀马克杯！{Hysterical rage}天，为什么我不能不唱这该死的歌？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: While you were out, I spent six hours trying to reach a coffee cup up on a shelf. When I finally got it down, I was so happy, I cried. I hate my life!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你出去的时候，我花了六个小时才够到架子上的一个咖啡杯。最后拿到它的那一刻，我都高兴哭了。我恨我的人生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One time, the Biological Research Station told me he dropped a mug down his processing chute. When I reached in, he... {revulsion}seeded me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次，生物研究站告诉我，他掉了一个马克杯在加工槽里。但我进去以后，他居然…{revulsion}居然射了我一身种子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Psychotically chipper}I love mugs so much, I just might kill myself!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Psychotically chipper}我爱死马克杯啦，爱的我真想自杀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any mugs? No? How 'bout now? How 'bout now? How 'bout now? Is this getting annoying yet? Will you put me out of my misery now? How 'bout now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有马克杯吗？没有？那现在呢？现在呢？现在呢？我是不是有点烦人？你现在能把我从这悲惨命运中解救出来吗？现在呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Giggle> Who's ready for a party?
ESP.TRADUIT: <咯咯笑> 想来狂欢一下嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 02 [0100E6FC] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I made out with the sink, would you pay attention to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要等到我和水槽亲热，你才会在意我吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 02 [0100E6FC] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want to push my buttons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想按人家的小圆钮？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 02 [0100E6FC] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you been flirting with the ice queen again? Ugh! I'm so much more fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你又去和那个冰雪皇后调情了？切！她哪比得上我有情调！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 02 [0100E6FC] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mood lights have more fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 情感之光可有趣多了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 02 [0100E6FC] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ooh, baby, let's turn off the lights and... {innuendo}turn on the lights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，亲爱的，让我们把灯关了，然后…{innuendo}我们可以…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 02 [0100E6FC] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adjusting lights for maximum concentration levels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在调节灯光，以实现最佳专注效果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 01 [0100E6FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you been poking at the other light switch? You know she's riddled with virii, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚刚一直在摆弄另一个灯开关，对吧？你不知道她浑身都是病毒吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 01 [0100E6FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe we could dim the lights and have a candlelit discussion of classic literature?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我们能把灯光调暗一些，在朦胧的烛光下开个古典文学读书会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 01 [0100E6FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is the light level to your... liking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个亮度…合你意吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 01 [0100E6FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even talk to me. I've seen you with... {emph}her!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别跟我说话，我全看见了，你和…{emph}她！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 01 [0100E6FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not like I haven't tried to get along with her. Lord knows I have. She's just such a... floozy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是没有试着和她好好相处，我发誓！但她实在…太下贱了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) NPC : Light Switch 01 [0100E6FD] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dig this sweet sound I got cooking. <Strange electronic caterwauling.>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我炮制的美妙声音很赞吧。<奇怪的电子轻吟声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I wouldn't give to be able to pick up Radio New Vegas. Mmm... Those cats can really play.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可戒不掉新维加斯电台。嗯…里边那些摇滚小子有些真本事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever heard of Tiny Lester Lutton? Best jazz harmonica I ever heard. Mind you, being a Super-Mutant with no lips... don't ask me how he played.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说过小李斯特·卢顿吗？我心目中最好的爵士乐口琴家。跟你说吧，他是个没嘴唇的超级变种人…别问我他是怎么演奏的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You heard of Doc Boney? Sang with the staff band till his wife caught him in bed with a nurse. Now he haunts the Med Center, still singing the blues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道博尼医生么？他曾是职工乐队的歌手。后来他被老婆撞破了和护士的奸情。现在嘛，他貌似还在医疗中心里游荡，依旧唱着蓝调。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ever tell you about Saxomotron version 4.0? That cat was the best trumpet player I ever met.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你讲过萨克森管调节器4.0版吧？那家伙是我遇见过最棒的小号手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet, dispensing wisdom}Here and now got its ups and downs, but... focusing on the past, like it was any better? {"Shakes head sadly"}That's just Old World Blues.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet, dispensing wisdom}当下总难事事如愿，但…紧盯往昔不放，就像它远胜当下？{"Shakes head sadly"}那不过是“旧世蓝调”罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Dispensing sage wisdom>
ESP.TRADUIT: <吟诵圣人睿智言论>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some day, I'd like to meet the man who's got no blues to sing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总有一天，我会找到一个不唱“蓝调”的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Blind Diode Jefferson [0100E701] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A most rapturous good morrow on your return to your domicile, sir. I trust you shall find things in order and the riffraff contained.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您终于回到您的住所了，真是一个令人欣喜若狂的清晨。我确信您会发现，一切都井然有序，包括那群流氓在内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might sir care for an {ah-PAIR-i-teef}apéritif to balm the weariness of sirs manifold journeys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷，要来杯{ah-PAIR-i-teef}开胃酒一洗征尘吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps sir would care to put sir's feet up, and I might serenade sir with the dulcet tones of a light opera?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷，您坐下休息时，让我用轻歌剧的悦耳声调，为您哼唱一首小夜曲如何？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir's accoutrements are precisely where sir has left them, and should the toaster say otherwise I remind sir that it is a wastrel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您寄存在这的装备没有人动过，老爷。但容我提醒您，烤面包机那废物可能会在这件事上唱反调。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If sir would press sir's spinal area against my primary instrument panel, I might vibrate at a soothing frequency.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爷，您愿意背靠主仪表操纵面板的话，我就能为您的脊椎区域做柔和的振动按摩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sir is looking exceptionally sharp today, if sir will permit the compliment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我赞美您，老爷，您今天看上去格外精神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Sink Central Intelligence Unit [0100E703] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Alarm}Look out! Communist! {Calm}No, false alarm. It was just a plate.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Alarm}小心！有共产党！{Calm}唉，虚惊一场，只是只盘子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Commies have eyes everywhere, Citizen. And that means they're not just Commies. They're {emph}Peeping Toms!
ESP.TRADUIT: 共产党的眼线无处不在，公民。就是说，所谓的共产党，{emph}都是些偷窥狂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you haven't found any Communists in your back yard, {dramatic emphasis}you're not looking hard enough!
ESP.TRADUIT: 后院怎么可能一个共产党也没有？{dramatic emphasis}你肯定没去用心细找。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sniffing noises}I smell... sedition!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sniffing noises}我闻到了…反动的味道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Citizen! Did you know that Communists have an organ behind their eyes that converts salt water into fresh? Or, wait... is that penguins?
ESP.TRADUIT: 公民！你知道吗？共产党员能用眼球后方的某种腺体将海水转化成纯净水。哦，等等…那不是企鹅嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you know what the word {pro-le-TARE-i-at}"proletariat" means, do you know what that makes you? Well read and {AIR-oo-dite}erudite... for a Communist!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道“无产阶级”这个词的意思，但你知道他们是怎么来的吗？博览群书，博学多才…你就会变成共产主义者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Book Chute [0100E700] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't stay away, could you? Yeah, I knew you'd be back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想我了是吗？对，我就知道你会回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so good, I might seed you just by looking at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真开心，仅仅看着你我就快射种子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever seen a Biological Research Station this full of seed? No. No, you haven't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可曾见过有这么多种子的生物研究站？不，不，你从没见过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, baby, bring me a sweet little dried fruit. I'll rehydrate all up in that thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快来，宝贝儿，给我些可爱的小干果，我会给它们补充水分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Baby, don't believe a word that sink says. She's all lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝贝儿，别听水槽胡说，她满嘴谎话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Muggy? Yeah, Muggy's all right. Not too seedy, but hey, nobody's perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小杯具？啊，小杯杯人还不错。或许没我有种，但，嘿，人无完人不是吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Biological Research Station [0100E702] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Snoring}Zzz... {talking in sleep}forceps, nurse! This man's got a severe case of shoe lung!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Snoring}Zzz…{talking in sleep}把钳子拿来，护士！这男人有很严重的蹄肺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Snoring}Zzz... {talking in sleep}no... not that scalpel, the fish scalpel!
ESP.TRADUIT: {Snoring}Zzz…{talking in sleep}错了…不是那把手术刀，我要的是给鱼用那把！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Snoring}Zzz... zzz...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Snoring}Zzz…{talking in sleep}把钳子拿来，护士！这男人有很严重的蹄肺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Snoring}Zzz... {singing in sleep}Foot bone's connected to the... leg bone. Leg bone's connected to the... purple bone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Snoring}Zzz…{singing in sleep}足骨连着…腿骨。腿骨连着…紫骨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Snoring}Zzz... {talking in sleep}Three angry Deathclaws make for a lot of reconstructive surgery.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Snoring}Zzz…{talking in sleep}三只狂暴死亡爪意味着一次彻底的整形手术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Snoring}Zzz... {random coughing, snorting noises}<Snort.>
ESP.TRADUIT: {Snoring}Zzz…{talking in sleep}把钳子拿来，护士！这男人有很严重的蹄肺！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Sink Auto-Doc [0100E704] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't that prove you're wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这还没证明你错了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Evidence to the contrary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 反例？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -ENOUGH! Stop filling my precious brain cell units with irrelevant data!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -够了！别再往我宝贵的脑细胞里塞那些无关紧要的数据了！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -You sound like the OTHER visitors. Making WILD claims of a WORLD beyond, where there is a WAR beyond WAR. It is UNPROVEN! And UNTHINKABLE!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你和其他的来访者们一样，毫无根据地宣称外面还有一个世界，说那里除了战争还是战争。这根本无法证实！这不可理喻！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Bother the OTHER DOCTORS with your crackpot theories, I have NO TIME! NONE of us do.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -把你的疯狂想法拿去烦其他博士吧，我没有时间和你理论！我们都没有！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there's a whole world beyond this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可是这地方之外可是一个偌大的世界啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you want to leave here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你难道不想离开这里么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -NO! Beyond... is DEATH, despite mounting evidence to the contrary!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不想！外面…根本没有生命。我不管现在那些不断增加的反例！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -No matter where these strange humans wander in from with their IDEAS and new BRAINS, there is NOTHING beyond BIG {Mountain}MT.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不管那些带着奇怪想法，还有新大脑的人类是从哪来的，总之大山脉{Mountain}之外什么也没有。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a minute - that means you're trapped here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，也就是说你们被困在这里了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -TRAPPED? NONSENSE, we are SECURE here. From evil philosophies.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -被困？瞎扯，我们被保护在这里，免遭那些邪恶思想的侵害。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Ever since my anxiety-filled days of powerlessness and being bullied in American High School, I have dreamed of such security as the FENCE.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -在读美国中学时，我受尽欺凌，又无力反抗。度过那段充满焦虑的日子之后，我就一直梦想着有这样一个屏障保护我。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -That, and giant cybernetic dogs that would ruthlessly patrol and kill anyone who wasn't my friend. Like RICHIE MARCUS. And BETSY BRIGHT.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我还想要只巨大的赛博犬，它会四处巡逻并无情地杀死任何不是我朋友的人，就像里奇·马库斯和贝琪·布莱特。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Grumbling}Who's laughing NOW, Betsy? I hope you and Richie are HAPPY, smoking in your radioactive coffins. I'm GLAD you never came to my birthday party.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -{Grumbling}现在谁笑到最后了呢，贝琪？祝你和里奇幸福，幸福地在受辐射的棺材里抽大烟。我真高兴你从没来参加过我的生日派对。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I get my brain back, I can leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我拿回自己的脑子，就能离开这。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -WHAT? Why would you do either of those things? That is MADNESS.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -什么？为什么你想要做这些事？你疯了吗。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There is NOTHING outside Big {Mountain}MT. {Slightly uneasy}Eh, we're pretty sure. Eh, we would know.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -大山脉{Mountain}之外什么也没有。{Slightly uneasy}呃，我们很确定。呃，我们会知道的。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That fence doesn't make much sense to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不觉得这屏障有多大意义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It makes PERFECT sense. Who are you to question the MIGHTY RADAR FENCE.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -意义可大了。你是什么东西，也配来质疑伟大的雷达屏障。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about this "Radar Fence" around the Crater.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我那些围绕环形坑的“雷达屏障”的事情吧

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The RADAR FENCE protects us all! If evidence is correct, the one who built it - is ME!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这些雷达屏障保护了我们所有人！如果资料正确的话，建造它的人，就是我！-
