ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It keeps anything with a disembodied brain INSIDE - like US - and anything without a brain... also INSIDE!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -它让没有身体的大脑们只能待在里面，像我们。对于没有大脑的身体们，也是如此！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It is the ULTIMATE DEFENSE against Communist aggression. There'll be no infectious ideas on MY watch!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -它是抵御共产入侵的终极屏障。在我的监视下，任何病态的观念都无法传染给其它人！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was this explosion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这爆炸是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -BOOM! Yes. Quite unexpected. And embarrassing. All better now after the landscaping, though. MUCH more pleasing to our monitors.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -轰！是的，很突然，也很尴尬。不过景观美化后一切都好多了，我们监测起外边也舒服多了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -And the Crater helps keep everything inside. Because it is BOWL shaped.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -而且环形坑还有助于让东西乖乖待在里面。因为它本身就是碗形的。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test cities?
ESP.TRADUIT: 试验城市？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -YES. In the past... individuals would come to us. Pay for technology. And if their town, community, or city was jusssst right...-
ESP.TRADUIT: -是的。在过去…一些人会来找我们购买技术。然后如果他们的小镇，社区或者城市刚好适合…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -We could USE that city as a controlled experiment. Vault-Tec was MUCH better at it, of course, we had to make do. Get permission. Sometimes.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我们就会用那个城市做对照实验。当然了，避难所科技公司更擅长搞这个，我们只能将就着试试。试验前要先取得许可，有时候要。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Mulling this over}If only we could have used Commie cities... but capturing whole cities was HARD! So we captured enough Commies to make cities of our OWN!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -{Mulling this over}如果我们能使用共产主义者的城市就好了…但想占领整个城市非常难！所以我们就抓捕了足够多的共产主义者，来创造我们自己的城市！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -So we had a group of Chinese prisoners to experiment on... those were the days... but the true test was SCIENCE on unsuspecting AMERICANS.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -所以我们曾有一整队中国囚犯来进行实验…那是个好时候啊。但真正的科学实验还得在那些毫无戒心的美国人身上开展。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Whether it was holograms, NEW Auto-Docs, toxins, vending machines... we wound them up, let them go into TINY ISOLATED TOWNS. Then... we OBSERVED!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -不管是全息影像、新型自动医生、毒气，还是贩卖机…我们把它们打包起来，放置到那些小型的，与世隔绝的城镇里，然后…我们开始观测！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This crater looks like it's been tag-teamed by giant fuckbots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个环形坑看样子已经是那些巨型操蛋机器人的天下了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw the expanse from the balcony - you've made a mess of this landscape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从阳台看过外边的景像。你们把这地方弄得一团糟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why have you leveled this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们怎么把大山脉这地方抹平了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -It was not our first choice of testing grounds. BUT... we no longer have the luxuries of our TEST CITIES.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这里不是我们首选的试验场地。但…我们也不再有选择试验城市的余裕了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Then, we LOST the MOUNTAIN! After the explosion, we couldn't find it anymore. So the Crater became our testing grounds. For SCIENCE!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -之后，我们失去了山脉！爆炸之后，山脉被夷为平地，所以这个环形坑就成了我们的试验地。都是为了科学！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a single, concrete fact. One. Fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一个独立、具体的事实。一个，事实。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Why are we even DEBATING this?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -为什么我们要吵这个？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -What YOU ask is of NULL importance! MOBIUS besieges us, there are more important things to worry about than DATA and FACTS!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -你所问的全都无关禁药！莫比乌斯包围了我们，有比数据和事实更值得担心的事情！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Nightstalkers were created for what purpose, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么夜行兽又是为了什么目的被创造的呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -To preserve coyote... no, no, wait. The snake DNA was important because... the snakes with the rattles were dying out, and...-
ESP.TRADUIT: -为了保存郊狼…不不，等等，蛇的DNA也很重要，因为…这种尾巴能发出响声的蛇已经濒临灭绝，而且…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Or maybe it was a bet from Calis in X-8? He had some mountain lion... eagle... condor... idea. "Bet you can't breed this," he said. Showed HIM.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -也可能是我在X-8时和卡利斯博士打的赌？他有一些山狮…老鹰…秃鹫…的想法。“打赌你培育不出这个”，他曾说过。我证明给他看了。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Then it... spliced itself into a coyote...-y, snake thing. Which was eventually successful. {Smug}Kept that DNA where it belonged - spliced.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -然后它就成了一种狼和蛇的复合体。这最终成功了。{Smug}保住了它们的DNA，以一种复合的形式。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right... when did you create Cazadores?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧…那你什么时候创造的猎蜂？

ESP.ORIGINAL: -In... two thousand... let's see, carry the three... then count backwards from the Great Static... or beyond?-
ESP.TRADUIT: -大概在…2000年…让我想想，加上3…再在“大静电”事件往前数…又或者往后？-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -There were the tarantula debates... and something about hawks, which made it around... eh, 2003? May? Tuesday. It was definitely Tuesday.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -那时有些关于狼蛛的争论…还有一些关于鹰的，所以大概应该是…2003年？五月？星期二。对肯定在星期二。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to have a grasp on your own research.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像没有紧扣自己的研究。

ESP.ORIGINAL: -NONSENSE! That is what you speak. NONSENSE from beyond!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -胡说！那只是你的想法。荒谬至极！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I was at the top of my High School class in American High School. I knew facts. I knew FIGURES. I knew DATA.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -在上美国高中的时候，我在班上就是尖子生。我懂何谓事实，懂图形，也懂数据。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -We would know if our research was flawed. It is NOT! We never contradict ourselves, so do not even TRY!-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我们的研究是否有缺陷，我们自己清楚。根本没有！我们从不否认自己，所以你也别想试着这么干！-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) Quest : ([0100E5D3]NVDLC03DialogueBorous) Dialogue Dr. Borous EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any way to shut it off?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有办法关掉它吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel strange in here, peaceful, but on edge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里有种奇怪的感觉，平静又紧张。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is the pacification field emitters that are broadcasting into the emptiness of your skull. Without a brain, your aggression is suppressed in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是“平静场”在往你那空空如也的脑壳里发射广播。没有了大脑，你的侵略性就能被抑制住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This makes no sense. How is this even possible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这说不通。这怎么可能呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: But how am I still talking and walking around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我怎么还能讲话，还能走动呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is a good question. My theory is that the tesla coils in your brainpan are still connected to your brain somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问得好。我的理论是，你头盖骨里的特斯拉线圈仍然连接着你的大脑，以某种方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It really could be anywhere. Brains are a lot smarter than most researchers give them credit for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它确实在某个地方。大脑比多数研究者认为的还要聪明很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We still have your spine and heart. If you were to somehow find your brain wherever it schlorped off to, you could humanically reduce yourself again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们仍然有你的脊柱和心脏。如果你有办法找回你的大脑，你就可以再次退化成自然人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you say "three minus one" subjects before?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你之前要说“三减一”个实验体？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because three minus one is two. Two spoke to us, one after the other, one mean, one curious, but there was a third we didn't speak to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为三减一等于二。有两个人，一个卑鄙，另一个好奇，一前一后来同我们交谈。但还有第三个人，我们没和她说过话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last one is the minus one. It got traumatized, then taken to one of our medical centers for de-traumatization. A rather unsettling procedure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一个人就是减掉的那个，它受伤了，然后被送到我们其中一个医疗中心…疗伤，虽然这个过程没能完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there any way to remove the pacification field in here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么才能关掉这儿的平静场？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Genuinely curious}Why would you want such a thing? You might surrender to your hormones and commit primal aggression on me... on us... again and again.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Genuinely curious}你为什么想这样？你可能会屈服于荷尔蒙，不停对我…对我们释放你的原始兽欲，一次又一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I would have to return the favor, activating my vivisectors and gently lobotomizing you from behind. {Lying}Not something I would relish doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我也得回敬你的好意。我会启动解剖器，用后入式温柔地切掉你的脑子。{Lying}一般我不喜欢这样做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the only way to circumvent the field is to have a brain. And we extracted that like we do all Lobotomites here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是不可能的，有大脑的生物才能规避平静场。而我们已经把你的大脑切了，就像这儿所有其它无脑人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) Quest : ([0100F621]NVDLC03DialogueDala) Dialogue Dr. Dala EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Well, I have questions for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我明白了。我还想问些其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma}With the Courier at the helm, Science became a beacon for the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Good or Neutral Karma}但因掌舵的是那个邮差，科学成了指明人类未来的灯塔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}There was Old World Blues, and New World Hope. {Beat}And hope ruled the day at Big {Mountain}MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}这里是旧世界的蓝调，也是新世界的希望。{Beat}希望重新降临于{Mountain}大山脉之上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Bad Karma}{Sad}With the Courier at the helm, it was all this and more.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Bad Karma}{Sad}但因掌舵的是那个邮差，甚至这种说法都有轻描淡写之嫌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Old World Blues, New World Misery - the two became one in the Courier's shadow.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}旧世界的蓝调，新世界的惨剧——在邮差的阴影下，两者合二为一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It can be easy to see Science as evil, technology unchecked as the source of all ills, all misfortunes.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}人们很容易认为科学是邪恶的，并且把不受控制的技术视为一切灾厄、不幸的根源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Bad Karma}It became a reality, a withering form of nostalgia for times long past.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Bad Karma}对旧时代的怀念，讽刺性地成为了现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma}Where once it was viewed as a form of sadness, nostalgia, it became an expression describing the {emph}potential for the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Good or Neutral Karma}原来充斥在字里行间的悲伤与怀旧，变成了对未来远景蓝图的新希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Bad Karma}In the time following the Second Battle of Hoover Dam, "Old World Blues" became more than a catch phrase.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Bad Karma}在第二次胡佛大坝战役后，"旧世蓝调"变得不只是句谈资。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma}In the times following the Second Battle of Hoover Dam, however, Old World Blues took on a new meaning.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Good or Neutral Karma}然而，在第二次胡佛大坝战役之后，“旧世蓝调”被赋予了全新的含义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Bad Karma}The Big Empty lived up to its name, a hollow crater of failures of a past era, a last, sad statement of the Old World.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Bad Karma}大坑洞，一如其名，不过是个空荡荡的环形坑，见证了旧时代的失败，成为旧世界悲哀的最后声明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Science is a long, steady progression into the {emph}future. What may seem a sudden event often isn't felt for years, even centuries, to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}科学发展对未来的影响是个漫长、持续的过程。看似突如其来的事件，往往早已酝酿了数十上百年，只是无人察觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}They stare into the what-was, eyes like pilot lights, guttering and spent, as the realities of their world continue on around them.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}周边世界依然继续前进，他们却像是一群提灯守夜的人们，徒劳、疲惫地紧盯着那些前世旧物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It refers to those so obsessed with the past they can't see the present, much less the future, for what it {emph}is.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}它用来形容这么一群人，他们“沉缅往昔，不见当下，遑论将来”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}There is an expression in the Wasteland: "Old World Blues."
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}废土上有一种说法："旧世蓝调"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Bad Karma}And so it burbled and bubbled inside its tank, smug that it still could dream {emph}its future without {Emph, disdain}glands getting in the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Bad Karma}于是，它在脑缸里咕嘟咕嘟地吹着气泡，自鸣得意于它仍能{emph}畅想未来，{Emph, disdain}不用再受腺体的干扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}In time, however, it became so self-obsessed it wondered if perhaps nothing existed except itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}然而随着时间的推移，它变得如此自恋，以至于怀疑除了它自己以外，世上没有任何东西存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It decided to test this by turning the weapons of the Big Empty against each other and seeing what happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}它决定做个试验，让大坑洞里的所有武器自相攻击，看看结果是否如它所想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Quiet}The answer is lost to history, {beat, wary}as is much of the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Quiet}这个问题的答案湮没在了历史中，{beat, wary}一如莫哈维的大部分地区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma}Even at the end when it started to fail, however, the brain resisted going into a floating chassis like the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Good or Neutral Karma}它开始逐渐衰弱，然而，即使在弥留之际，它也拒绝像智库一样，坐进漂浮的容器里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It never said why. Perhaps it was out of respect for the Courier's body.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}背后的原因它从未提起，也许是出于对邮差身体的敬意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Quiet, respectful}All things must come to an end, and to hang on to the past is something that's not to be undertaken lightly.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Quiet, respectful}世间万物都必须迎来终结。紧抓过去，不愿放手，可不是什么能一笑置之的小事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{PC took brain back}The Courier, organs intact, continued onwards, a little less heavy of step, but with all the organs in the right places. As they should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{PC took brain back}器官完整无缺，邮差再次踏上旅程。尽管步伐稍显沉重，但所有器官都各就其位，如其所应然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Knowingly}After all, brains can develop a life of their own when left to their own thoughts, and the Courier's brain was more clever than most.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Knowingly}毕竟，如果能让大脑独立思考，他们也能发展出自己的生命，何况邮差的大脑更是绝顶聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{PC left brain in tank}The Courier left the brain at the Big Empty. A strange thing to say, but it was the truth. Brains are less important than they may seem.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{PC left brain in tank}邮差把自己的脑子留在了大坑洞。说起来很奇怪，但这就是事实。大脑并没有人们看起来的那么重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}When the Courier's body finally passed, the brain was saddened. It kept on, remembering the vessel that had once contained it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}当得知邮差的躯体已逝时，大脑感到很难过。怀揣着对曾经容器的回忆，它继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brain Tank [01015F7E] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Done with barking}The two of them constructed a litter of cyberpups, a small army of Boston terrifiers that gnawed and devoured anything in their path.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Done with barking}他俩造了一窝赛博犬宝宝，这一小队波士顿的梦魇会撕咬啃噬掉任何冒犯他们的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Rex not dead, not available}{Done with barking}There, she ran across Rex at the Kings School of Impersonation. His brain was failing. That was all right, he was still smarter than the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Rex not dead, not available}{Done with barking}在猫王模仿学校，她遇到了雷克斯。他的大脑正在衰败。但她不觉得这是个问题，他依旧比那些思想体聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Rex not dead, is available}{Done with barking}There, she ran across Rex, who had been following the Courier, just as she had. They barked for a while, and realized they had a lot in common.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Rex not dead, is available}{Done with barking}在那里，她遇到了雷克斯。他曾经跟随邮差旅行，就像她之前一样。他们聊了一会儿，发现彼此间共同点真的是太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Rex dead}{Done with barking}There, she ran across the corpse of Rex. She dragged him back to the Big Empty and had him rebuilt for company.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Rex dead}{Done with barking}在那里，她遇见了雷克斯的尸体。她把他拖回了大坑洞，将他重新制造成了她的同伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roxie [0100A380] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Done with barking}The cybernetic canine, gender: female, designation: ROXIE sat in her guard post in X-8.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Done with barking}那只名叫洛茜的雌性赛博犬坚守在她X-8的岗位上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}That is, until her "I'm in heat" programming circumvented her "stay" routine and she loped into the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}就这样，直到她"我发情了"的程序成功越过"呆在这"的程序，她才飞奔进了莫哈维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Gutsy Mk1 [0100A108] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Y-17 was discovered}In time, the Auto-Doc found a way to deactivate the Y-17 Trauma Harnesses, releasing the corpses they had held prisoner for almost 200 years.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Y-17 was discovered}后来，自动医生找到了关闭Y-17防创束身服的方法，让那些被监禁了200多年的枯骨们终于重获自由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Auto-Doc, always gentle and methodical, kept sewing up the Courier in all the right places when the skin split open from repeated wear and tear.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}自动医生总是那么温柔、那么有条不紊，每次邮差的皮肤在饱受折磨而开裂之后，都能恰到好处地为他缝合伤口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Auto-Doc was just glad to have purpose again.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}自动医生很高兴重新有了目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It heard its simpler brothers and sisters who got shipped to the Sierra Madre were bored out of their skulls in that toxic, dead city.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}它听说那些简易版本的兄弟姐妹们，它们自从被送到马德雷，那座充斥着毒气的死城以后，终日无所事事，闲得都要发疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Auto-Doc Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F066] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Both light switches found}It was rumored by the other personalities that he had a brief fling with the light switches.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Both light switches found}据其他人格助手传言，他和电灯开关们有过一段风流韵事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Although he forgot their names once too often and was soon left in the dark as punishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}不过他总是弄混她们的名字，所以没过多久他就被关在了一片漆黑里，作为惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{< 3 Sound effects gained}Blind Diode Jefferson eventually discovered a new sound... silence. It only made him more filled with the blues than before.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{< 3 Sound effects gained}盲二极管·杰弗逊最终找到了一种新声音…寂静。这让他比之前更忧郁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{3+ Sound effects gained}Blind Diode Jefferson, with sounds the Courier brought him, created a symphonic counter-frequency that saved Big {Mountain}MT from sonic invasion in 2910.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{3+ Sound effects gained}利用邮差带来的声音，盲二极管·杰弗逊创造了一个交响乐团级的反频率。这帮助大山脉{Mountain}成功抵御了2910年的音波入侵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}If you didn't hear about it - good.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}如果你没听说过这件事——那就对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jukebox Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F064] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Higgs Village not discovered}Muggy continued to collect coffee cups until his wheel got a flat just out of reach of a dirty coffee cup, and his tiny robotic brain exploded.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Higgs Village not discovered}小杯具继续不停收集咖啡杯。直到某天，它为了去够一个脏杯子不慎滑倒，摔爆了他小小的电子脑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Higgs Village was discovered}Muggy did his best to collect coffee cups, although in his quest, he accidentally trapped himself in Higgs' Village.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Higgs Village was discovered}小杯具依旧尽其所能去收集马克杯。不过在一次探索中，它不小心把自己困在了希格斯村里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It might have been the end for poor Muggy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}小杯具本以为会这样可悲地死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Except... he found it peaceful there, tidying up the kitchens of the Think Tank Professors back when they had been flesh and bone.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}没想到…通过清扫智库博士们在人类时代使用的厨房，他居然在那里找到了平静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{To himself}Well, except for Dr. O, who was an asshole for having created Muggy in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{To himself}好吧，除了O博士，那个最初创造了小杯具的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Proudly defiant}Muggy left O's house deliberately dirty, punishing the dishes and cups that lived there in blind revenge for serving Dr. O.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}为了报复O博士，小杯具故意把O的房子弄得特别脏，并盲目地虐待那里的杯碟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Muggy [0100E6F9] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Bad Karma}It learned several new murderous techniques from the Courier, and built a Blood Shrine to itself in the Cuckoo's Nest.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Bad Karma}凭借从邮差那儿学来的谋杀技巧，它后来把疯人院变成了自己的血腥圣殿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The cave floor was soon filled with the horror of a hundred gutted toasters, a silent, grisly, unplugged audience...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}不久，这个洞穴就成了面包机一族的恶梦。数以百计的面包机残骸充斥其间，成了此处恶行无声的、可怕的、断电的见证者…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}...their purpose... to toast bread... unfulfilled.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}…它们…烤面包片的目的…永远无法实现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma}After one of its more psychotic episodes, however, the other Sink personalities decided enough was enough, and dumped the Toaster in a bathtub.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Good or Neutral Karma}最终，在烤面包机又一次变本加厉的神经病行为后，汇聚节点的其他人格助手忍无可忍，于是把它扔到了浴缸里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Sparking and hissing, the Toaster swore its enemies would rue the day when they had bread - and no way to toast it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}嘶嘶地冒着火花，烤面包机发誓它的敌人们一定会后悔一辈子。因为就算它们有面包，也再找不到烤面包的办法了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Toaster continued its psychotic spree, reducing all appliances in range to scrap electronics and spare parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}烤面包机继续精神病似的胡闹，将可触及范围内的一切家电都破坏成电子碎片和零件。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Toaster Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05F] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Innovative Toxins Plant discovered}Once it learned of the Innovative Toxins Plant, however, it gained new purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Innovative Toxins Plant discovered}不过，当获悉新型毒素工厂的事情后，她有了新的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It sought to develop anti-toxins to flush into its drains and counteract the poisons bleeding into the soil.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}她开始研制抗毒剂，并打算研制成功后将它冲进排水管道，中和掉渗入土地的毒素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Magnetohydraulics Plant discovered}Eventually, it gained access to the {Mag-neat-o-Hydraulics}Magnetohydraulics Plant and nearly flooded all the Big Empty in an attempt to scrub the crater clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Magnetohydraulics Plant discovered}最终，她得到了{Mag-neat-o-Hydraulics}磁能水力工厂的权限。之后，为了把环形坑刷洗干净，她几乎淹了整个大山脉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Sink continued to ruthlessly scrub any particulate matter that came near it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}水槽继续无情地擦洗任何靠近她的微粒物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Lightwave Dynamics Lab discovered}One of them eventually transferred to the Lightwave Dynamics Plant - and began a long, unrequited affair with one of the holograms.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Lightwave Dynamics Lab discovered}其中一个开关后来被调到了光波动力学工厂。之后很长一段时间里，她无果地单恋上了里边某个全息影像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 01 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F062] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}This persisted until the day someone dropped a flashlight in the Sink, and the two of them united in their hatred of the "showboat."
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}她俩依旧无休止地斗嘴，直到某天有人把手电筒掉在汇聚节点，才促使她俩结成了反"引人注目者"同盟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Light Switch 02 Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F063] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Found both light switches}The light switches continued to bicker and flicker.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Found both light switches}电灯开关们和以前一样，一边闪着光，一边不停地吵嘴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Book Chute continued to devour all seditious materials until it nearly choked on a paper clip.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}图书机继续吞食所有反动材料，直到差点被一枚曲别针噎死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}It adamantly maintained it was a {emph}Chinese paper clip, and the whole thing had been an elaborately orchestrated assassination attempt.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}它坚称，那是一枚{emph}中国造曲别针，并且整件事是场精心策划的暗杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Whatever the reason, it slowed down for a while, carefully appraising each document and clipboard that came to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}不过不管怎样，它好歹慢下来了，知道在文件、写字板送到的时候应该先仔细审查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Book Chute Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F065] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{X-22 not discovered}The Biological Research Station, obsessed with seeding everything in sight, ran out of fertile plots and blew a circuit trying to seed itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{X-22 not discovered}生物研究站沉迷于向视野内的一切播种。在播种完所有肥沃的土地后，它试图向着自己播种，结果烧毁了电路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{X-22 was discovered}The Biological Research Station, obsessed with seeding everything in sight, requested a transfer to the X-22 Botanical Garden...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{X-22 was discovered}生物研究站沉迷于向视野内所有东西播种。后来它申请调职到X-22植物园工作…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}...so that it might, in its own words, "sensually fertilize the garden's smooooth contours."
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}…他希望这样就能，套用他自己的话，"在植物园那凝脂细肤上尽情播种"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Garden sent back a polite refusal, saying it had prior commitments with a Vault it had helped infect before the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}植物园礼貌地拒绝了，因为她早在战前就已和某个被她“感染”的避难所定下了婚约。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bio Research Station Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F059] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{1 module installed}The Sink was strangely silent, which it had never been in previous years. The lack of personality modules made the base lifeless and sterile.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{1 module installed}“汇聚节点”陷入诡异的寂静，这里在过去的岁月里从不如此。缺少人格模块使这里成了一个毫无生气的乏味之地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{2-4 modules installed}The Sink atop the Dome gained a frontier town feel with the few modules installed.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{2-4 modules installed}安装了几个人格模块后，穹顶上的“汇聚节点”有了点边陲小镇的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}They shouted at each other across the HQ occasionally, either threatening each other, or announcing a discovery. It kept things... lively.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}那些人格偶尔会互相喊叫，有时是宣布新发现，有时又在互相威胁。这让汇聚节点显得…生机勃勃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Secretly, the Sink Central Intelligence Unit was relieved that not all of the personality chips had been found. What was there, was enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}人格芯片并没有全部被找回来，对此汇聚节点的中央智能单元暗暗地长舒了一口气。在这的家伙就已经够麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{5+ modules installed}The Sink atop the Dome bustled with the voices of a small town, constantly chirping, arguing, and snarling at each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{5+ modules installed}穹顶上的“汇聚节点”现在喧闹得像个小镇，人格们叽叽喳喳，不停地互相争论、喊叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Still, this all happened productively in the interests of its new owner.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}不过，这一切都服务于新主人的意趣，在卓有成效地进行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}The Sink Central Intelligence Unit discovered, despite its inversion code, it was comforted by the sense of community the other personalities gave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}汇聚节点的中央智能单元发现，尽管有反转代码，但他还蛮喜欢其它人格带来的这种社区生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma player, sad}...a cobweb tracery of symbols that told of a thousand brilliant thoughts, now lost to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma player, sad}…那些密密麻麻的痕迹，曾诉说了无数灿烂的思想，如今已湮没在时间洪流中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{Bad Karma}...but these equations were nothing more than thin white traceries of lines, not unlike cobwebs in the corners of a failing mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration} {Bad Karma}…但这些方程式不过是些细白的线条痕迹，跟一个失败的大脑角落里的蜘蛛网没什么两样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{<10 Locations explored}Although, truth be told, the Courier had barely explored the Crater in an attempt to rush through and be done with the whole thing...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{<10 Locations explored}事实上，为了尽快结束这次事件，邮差只是风风火火地穿过整个环形坑，几乎没怎么探索这里…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Perhaps that was for the best, however... curiosity, while sometimes rewarded for its efforts, often proves to be equally dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}不过，这未尝不是最好的结果…因为好奇心驱使的行为，哪怕偶有回报，也往往被证明是同等危险的…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{10-25 Locations explored}The Courier had scoured much of the Big Empty, although secrets still remained in the crater's depths.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{10-25 Locations explored}邮差几乎走遍了大坑洞，不过在其深处，依然存在着未被发现的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}{Narration}Perhaps that was for the best, however... curiosity, while sometimes rewarded for its efforts, often proves to be equally dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}{Narration}不过，这未尝不是最好的结果…因为好奇心驱使的行为，哪怕偶有回报，也往往被证明是同等危险的…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}{>25 Locations explored}The Sink Central Intelligence Unit was impressed by the amount of exploration the Courier had undertaken.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}{>25 Locations explored}汇聚节点的中央智能单元对邮差探索地点之多感到十分震惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Facilities believed lost, destroyed, or ones that had simply gotten up and walked to new locations had been re-discovered by its intrepid new master.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}被认为消失了，毁坏了的设施，哪怕是自己站起来挪去了新地点的设施，都统统被它勇猛无畏的新主人找了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}Internally, the artificial personality debated as to whether it preferred the old management to the new...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}在内心深处，这位人造人格开始思考，新旧主人相比较，哪个更好…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Narration}...and concluded that the Courier's thorough approach to research and investigation was admirable and worthy of its respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Narration}…最后它得出结论，邮差研究和调查的方法是如此缜密细致，值得它的赞赏与钦佩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink CIU [0100F061] (mod) NPC : Narrator [01003737] (mod) Quest : ([010039A0]NVDLC03Ending) Ending Slide Sequence EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet amazement}Wow... what {emph}is this place? Are we... outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet amazement}哇……这 {emph}是什么地方？我们……出来了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's too bad. Those robots would normally help defend us and the facility if we're attacked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，这可不太好。平时都是这些机器人在抵御外敌，保护我们的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were never allowed to blow the robots up before. Cheating gives me such a thrill!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们以前从未被允许炸掉这些机器人。作弊的感觉太棒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Stealth Suit Mk II [0100DA22] (mod) Quest : ([0100BE3D]NVDLC03AuralStealthSuitQUEST) 0100BE3D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't get to the point, I'm going to start shooting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再不说到重点，我可要开枪了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE}Yes. Very good. I should have Mentats ingest you instead of the other way around. Mmm. Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {DUPE}很好，非常好。我应该用曼他特来来招待你而不是其他的什么方式。嗯……曼他特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only "wrinkle" is the one that bullet made going into my brainpan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一的"褶皱"就是那颗穿透我脑壳的子弹留下的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {DUPE}I would spell it out for you, but when I start spelling, I lose track of the letters. Little symbols run around everywhere, annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {DUPE}我想给你讲清楚，但在我要开口的时候，却经常口胡。这些小字母到处乱跑，真是烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was there any other data transmitted in your threat broadcast?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在威胁广播里还给他们传递过其他信息么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, my overly aggressive chemmed-up broadcast was designed to keep reinforcing the "forget," "fear," "rinse," and "repeat" program.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我嗑药发疯时极具侵略性的广播，就是为了不断强化他们的"遗忘"、"恐惧"、“清洗”和"重复"程序。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and the "get me the things to castrate your only possible escape attempt."
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我还说了："给我拿回这些技术，好让我掐灭你们最后一丝逃生希望"。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I couldn't delete you or your arrival anymore than I could the other visitors. {Shakes head}Only so much Science can do when you started talking to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我能删除他们对其他来访者的记忆，但我没法删掉你的。{Shakes head}在你与他们交谈开始，科学就无能为力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're really quiet difficult to ignore, you know. It's because you're... well, bah! Rather intriguing, if you'll forgive an old brain for saying so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗，你令人很难忽视。你…呃，呸！相当引人注目，请原谅我这个年老的大脑说出这种话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Think Tank downloaded the schematics, not the items. They can rebuild them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但智库不只拿到了技术产品，他们还拿到了图纸。他们能借此重现那些技术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. That means my plan is a total failure. That is unfortunate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，就是说我的计划彻底失败了。真不走运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, well, at least I tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，贵在尝试嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is the purpose of the technologies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些技术到底服务于什么目的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The X-2 Antenna can be used to focus your alpha wave frequency thought patterns. The Sneaky Suit? Why, it houses a cardiac regulator.
ESP.TRADUIT: X-2天线能帮助你集中α脑电波，改善思维模式。潜行衣？它内置了心率调节器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the sonic soundwave projecto-emitter was never intended as a weapon. It was a medicinal vertebrae-pulse-de-sensitizer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 声波发射器原本不是被当成武器设计。它本该用于医疗，能通过发射脉冲，来降低脊椎对外界刺激的感知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In short: Brains, a heart, and courage... spine. {Thinking, talking about Wizard of Oz}I think there was a story once where a band of murderous thugs sought these things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简要来说：大脑、心脏和勇气…我说脊椎。{Thinking, talking about Wizard of Oz}记得有个童话，讲的正是一群暴徒要寻找这三样东西。（绿野仙踪）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rueful}They had them all the time in the story. Didn't stop them from murdering to get them, and it won't stop the Think Tank, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rueful}故事里他们不停的找啊，为了达成夙愿他们不惜杀人。而思想体们，他们早晚会步这些暴徒的后尘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand why they wanted me to gather the technologies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白思想体们为何要让我取回那些技术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I consider "coincidence" to be profanity, along with the words, "astrology," "herbal tea," and "luck." So watch it, Potty Mouth.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我认为"巧合"一词极为无礼。"占星术"，"草药茶"和"运气"也是。注意你的言词，大嘴巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Klein said they had the idea to get the three technologies after your broadcast. Coincidence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你广播之后，克莱因才提出要搜集这三项技术。这是巧合吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Oh, I don't think they understood, either.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 哦，我认为他们也不清楚这些技术的用处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first one, the ruthless one who smashed up our toy trains, asked for weapons, power. Items he could use to destroy a nation with force.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一位来访者，他残酷无情，并且还弄坏了我们的玩具火车。他追求的是足以毁灭一个国家的武器与力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet, a little worried}The other... the other asked a different question, and with it, got the true answer. About what makes nations... and what breaks them.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet, a little worried}另一位…他问了一个不同的问题，并得到了正确的答案——什么能孕育一个国家…又是什么能摧毁它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He spoke to the Think Tank, to Klein. Showed them the flag of the Old World... and it made them remember. All of it. All that had happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和思想体们，和克莱因谈了他的问题，向他们展示了旧世界的旗帜…这使他们回忆起一切，回忆起所有过去发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They shared things with him that they shouldn't. He now carries those ideas, that knowledge elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 思想体们还向他分享了一些不该分享的知识。他已经带着这些知识，这些理念离开了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about the other visitors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于其他的来访者你知道些什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, not much, except they contaminated Big MT and installed new ideas in the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，除了他们污染了大山脉，给思想体带来新想法外，我知道的并不多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One caused a great deal of infrastructure damage with his brain and smartyness. Ruthless, that one. Played a little rough with the trains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其中一个家伙很聪明，而且冷酷无情。他造成了大规模的基础设施破坏，还对列车玩了点粗暴的小把戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Thinking}But the last one was the most dangerous. Him... eh... slipping away... that was almost as bad as the Think Tank escaping.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Thinking}但最后那个才是最危险的。他…呃…溜走了。这和思想体溜走是同等危险的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you set your threats on a loop to keep them occupied?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你循环播放威胁广播，好让他们无暇他顾？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. I certainly wouldn't loop it on purpose purpose purpose. I am far too sophisticated to make such a childish error error error.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。我当然不是不小心按到了循环键，我可不会犯下如此幼稚的错误错误错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, some kind of medical condition?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你是说我得了什么病吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE}Yes. Very good. I should have Mentats ingest you instead of the other way around. Mmm. Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {DUPE}很好，非常好。我应该用曼他特来来招待你而不是其他的什么方式。嗯……曼他特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A cranial injury. From the attack outside Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我一次脑袋受伤后留下的，当时我在清泉镇外遇袭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {DUPE}I would spell it out for you, but when I start spelling, I lose track of the letters. Little symbols run around everywhere, annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {DUPE}我想给你讲清楚，但在我要开口的时候，却经常口胡。这些小字母到处乱跑，真是烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？你到底在说什么呀？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yes. Very good. I should have Mentats ingest you instead of the other way around. Mmm. Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 很好，非常好。我应该用曼他特来来招待你而不是其他的什么方式。嗯……曼他特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bullet that went into my brain? Doc Mitchell tried to patch me up, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你指子弹射进大脑后留下的伤痕？米切尔医生尽力修补了它，不过…

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I would spell it out for you, but when I start spelling, I lose track of the letters. Little symbols run around everywhere, annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我想给你讲清楚，但在我要开口的时候，却经常口胡。这些小字母到处乱跑，真是烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you blaming me for this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这都是我的错？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were other visitors, though. Why am I different?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然这里也有过其他的来访者，为什么只有我是特别的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: But there must have been other signs of a larger world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面那个偌大的世界，能证明其存在的事物应该数不胜数才对。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There have been other visitors to make them doubt their perceptions, but you are the one who dialed back their monitor-micro-magnifiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前的确有些来访者令他们质疑过自己的观点，但只有你，迫使他们回拨了显微镜的准焦螺旋，看到一个更大的世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were irrefutable proof that there was a world outside. And then there was the whole "brain" fiasco, which forced me to take steps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无可辩驳地证明了外面存在着一个世界，再加上你大脑的那场特殊手术，这逼迫我不得不采取行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, your brain had a special kind of... uh... wrinkle, a unique-ity that they had never thought to try in all their countless escape attempts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，你的大脑有某个特别的…呃…“褶皱”。这个位置，他们在先前的无数次手术中，都没尝试过动刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand why you sent the threats - and the Robo-Scorpion army - against the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不理解你为何要恐吓那些思想体，并派遣机械蝎军队和他们对抗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you lobotomized the Think Tank, why terrorize them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你已经阉割过思想体们的脑子，为何还要威胁他们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's simple. Despite their many failings, they are rather bright. They are the "Think Tank" for a raisin. That, I didn't change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，道理很简单。尽管他们有着种种缺点，他们依然非常杰出。他们能被称为"思想体"，并非浪得虚名，这点我从未否认。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without something to distract them, make them afraid, they would simply de-deuce what had happened. And when they start deucing it up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不分散他们的注意力，使其产生恐惧感，他们就会开始分析当前情势。而一旦他们开始分析…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you came along, the final variable solved. They saw that their world was larger than they perceived. Bacteria, finally able to see its host.
ESP.TRADUIT: 之后你来了，最后一个变量解决了。他们意识到世界并不仅限于此处。细菌，终于见识到它们的宿主了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Ouro-bor-ous?" What the hell does that mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: "乌洛鲍鲁斯(Ouro-bor-ous)"到底是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {Genuinely surprised}Really? It is so unlike me to make an error in anything I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {Genuinely surprised}真的吗？出错可不像是我会做的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Minor detail, but a snake devouring its own tail is "Ouro-borus," not "Ouro-borous."
ESP.TRADUIT: 小细节，衔尾蛇的古希腊语是"乌洛波洛斯(Ouro-borus)"，不是"乌洛鲍鲁斯(Ouro-borous)"

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] A snake that sucks its own dingle-thingy, I believe. Borous was always too obsessed with animals and their dingle-thingies.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]据我所知，是一条吞食自己排泄物的蛇。鲍鲁斯总是痴迷于动物和它们的排泄物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's kind of an asshole thing to do to your friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟对朋友做出如此混账的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it? Hmm... I suppose it is. But really, they started the whole "excrement hole" behavior loop in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？嗯…或许吧。但归根结底，这"混账"的行为循环是从他们先开始的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. O... which is actually not his real name multiplied, since you can't multiply his real name in the first place... {Trying for oo-roh-BOH-rohs}Ouro-bor-ous, Klein...
ESP.TRADUIT: O博士…这其实不是他的真名，他的真名不能拿来做乘法运算…{Trying for oo-roh-BOH-rohs}还有乌洛鲍鲁斯（Ouro-bor-ous），克莱因…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They have all forgotten themselves. And not only themselves, but the world, sense of time, and history. All that is left is what's here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们所有人，不仅忘了自己的一切，也忘记了世界、时间观念、历史。剩下为数不多记忆都只是关于这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reprogrammed their chronometers, geometers, and cartography programs. This is now their world, here, Big {Mountain}MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我改写了他们的计时系统，几何系统和地理系统。现在对他们来说，大山脉这里，就是整个宇宙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a merciful lobotomy, really, thinking back. They were my friends, but... {genuine sad moment}sometimes they would take things too far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仔细回想，的确，那并不比大脑切除手术仁慈多少。他们是我的朋友，可他们…{genuine sad moment}有时会做些太过火的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Quiet, sad}And the world isn't ready for that kind of too-far-thing-taking. That's my professional opinion, anyway, and I am told I was once quiet professional.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Quiet, sad}那种过火的事，是世界不能承受之重。不管怎么说，这是我的专业意见。而以前有…某些人也高度评价过我的专业水平。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any event, {emph}you showed up at the Think Tank, and because you had suffered a cranial injury in just the right place...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，{emph}后来你出现在了智库，而且因为头部的那个位置正好受过伤…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullets in the head are usually much more fatal, and yours was a light case of bullet-head-itis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 常人脑袋中枪早就没命了，你却只有弹头导致的轻度炎症。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... it was enough for the Auto-Doc in the Sink to change its programming to fix the problem. And the brain extraction technology for once, worked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但…为了修正问题，汇聚节点的自动医生还是改变了手术程序。大脑提取技术也因此碰巧完美奏效了，这是多年来的首次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That gave the Think Tank the knowledge its brains shouldn't... couldn't... {should+couldn't}sh'couldn't possess. With that knowledge, the procedure can be reversed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次手术让思想体们获得了他们不应…不能…{should+couldn't}不应能拥有(scouldn't)的知识。有了这一知识，大脑提取手术将能被逆向执行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they obtain that procedural data, they can use it to mush and modify their cranial selves into hosts to slip past the Radar Fence, I'm sure of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确信，如果获得了手术的数据，他们就能找到办法把大脑安回身体里，从而越过雷达屏障。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And once they're off the reservation...
ESP.TRADUIT: 而一旦他们离开这里…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My threat broadcast is designed to instill... and install... fear. And along with the emotional download, other data rides the fear carrier wave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发威胁广播的初衷是灌输…和安装…恐惧。但与此同时，其它信息也伴随着恐惧载波，被一并发送了过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It prompted them to focus on retrieving those technologies and bring them to "attack" me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些信息使他们专注于取回这些技术，并拿它们来"攻击"我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And coincidentally... pardon my language... all those technologies are needed to put a brain, your brain, back into its skull. Properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巧合的是…原谅我的用词…这些技术恰恰是把大脑，特别是你的大脑，重新安回颅内所必须的知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep going, I want to hear the rest of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请继续，我想听听之后的故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that's why they have all those stupid names?
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是乎他们就有了这些蠢名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] O, you figured it out. No pun intended.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]O，你竟能领会此中深意。我可没在阴阳你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Klein... Mobius... O's a circle... 8's an infinity symbol... they're all loops, I get it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因…莫比乌斯…圆环型的O…像无穷符号的8…这些名字都代表了循环，我似乎明白了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Slightly hurt}I don't know if they're stupid, I was trying for accuracy.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Slightly hurt}那些名字很蠢吗？我已经尽力用得精确了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: A recursion loop is designed to prevent the flow of information. So...
ESP.TRADUIT: 递归循环是用来阻碍信息流的，这么说…

ESP.ORIGINAL: So all this insanity is because of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么说这里所有的疯狂都是因为你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you trap them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你给他们下套，想困住他们，这总得有原因吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Radar Fence to keep the Think Tank hemmed in wasn't really enough. They keep testing things, they would have found a way to disarm it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想困住他们，只靠一个雷达屏障可不够。像他们那样不断的进行实验，早晚能找出解除屏障的办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {To himself}I suspect I have Plan 9s in place, but I may have coded myself to forget them, just in case... they're probably very dangerous, lethal, or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: {To himself}我想我还制定了几个“计划9”，但后来为了以防万一又编程删除了相关记忆…或许因为这些计划非常危险，致命，甚至更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I had to do something else to keep them occupied here. Or as you like to say "trapped." I prefer to have several Plan 9s in case the 7s fail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此我只能做些别的事情，来让他们老实地呆在这里。或是如你所言，“下套”。我向来习惯尽可能多的制定"计划9"，以防"计划7”失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {To himself}I suspect I have Plan Cs in place, but I may have coded myself to forget them, just in case... they're probably very dangerous, lethal, or worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: {To himself}我想我还制定了几个“计划C”，但后来为了以防万一又编程删除了相关记忆…或许因为这些计划非常危险，致命，甚至更糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I had to do something else to keep them occupied here. Or as you like to say "trapped." I prefer to have several plan Bs in case the As fail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此我只能做些别的事情，来让他们老实的呆在这里。或是如你所言，“下套”。我向来习惯尽可能多的制定"计划9"，以防"计划7”失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you reprogrammed yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以…你重编了自己的程序？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {Chiding}Now, "trap" is a rather harsh word. Like "excrement." Not an inappropriate word, but still - rather harsh.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {Chiding}我说，"下套"这个词显得我真恶劣，像在说"混账"一样。用词倒不能算错，可就是，太刺耳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... yes, I did... take some liberties with their programming. It's all right, they don't remember.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但…没错，我确实…确实困住了他们，剥夺了他们的自由。没关系的，他们根本不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I certainly didn't until you said "trap." And then I said "excrement." And then...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一直这么想的，直到你说"下套"，然后我说"混账"。我…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You reprogrammed their names as part of recursion loop? What, to trap their processors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把他们的名字编入了递归循环？怎么，为了给他们的处理器下套吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] I believe I did, and with good raisin. Who am I to be trusted with such things?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我确实做了，而且有正当的理由。做了这样的事，我也没指望谁还会信任我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like you forgot your master plan - surprised you remember your own name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎把计划都给忘了。我很惊讶你还能记得自己的名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This name's as real as you or I, although I believe your brain expressed similar incredulity at the nature of such an appellation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个名字就和你我一样真实。尽管对于该称谓的本质，你的大脑也表达过和你一样的怀疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Someone's been watching too many Old World science fiction movies," it said. {Confidentially}I believe it meant me.
ESP.TRADUIT: “某人是看了太多旧世界科幻电影吧”，它说。{Confidentially}我想这就是在说我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must admit I have a vulnerability for holotape fantasies of planets and robots and all that is forbidden. As for the name I was born with...
ESP.TRADUIT: 必须承认，我真的很喜欢看科幻电影，醉心于那些对星球啊，机器人啊之类禁忌事物的幻想。哦，说回我与生俱来的名字…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...like the Think Tank, we were all reprogrammed to forget them, take on new names. It enforces the recursion loop in our perception programming.
ESP.TRADUIT: …和思想体一样，我们的程序都被重新编写过，让自己忘了它，然后接受新的称谓。之后新的名字就会在我们感知程序中强制执行递归循环。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything you've told me doesn't add up... your plan, even your name, "Mobius."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你告诉我的一切都不合情理……不管是你的计划，还是你的名字，[QUOTE]莫比乌斯。[QUOTE]

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Dr. Mobius," rather catchy, isn't it? It's my name, my {emph}new name, overwrote the old one.
ESP.TRADUIT: "莫比乌斯博士"，琅琅上口，不是吗？这就是我的名字，覆盖更改后{emph}的新名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any tactics I could use to attack the Think Tank?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么和思想体战斗的建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't want to keep them out of trouble, I want to kill them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我无意阻止他们闯祸，我想直接干掉他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Skeptical}That will be difficult. It would be like fighting five scaled down versions of me that have better depth perception.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Skeptical}这可不太容易，相当于你得面对五个大部分能力弱化，但深度知觉能力强化的我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they have an arsenal of vivisectors, brainial beams, and a rather nasty WooEEEOooWooEEEOoo ray that can make your atoms do a happy dance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且他们配备有完备的武器库，包括解剖器、脑波射线，还有一个能让你身体里原子欢快起舞的非常讨厌的“喔哦哦哦”射线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could survive those highly-improbable odds and ends, then deceasing them is definitely an option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是确定能挺过那些稀奇古怪的物事，那杀掉他们当然也是一种选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Chiding}Although I doubt killing them would do anything except make you feel better. Or let you brag to other humans about your primal violent-ness-ness.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Chiding}但我怀疑你只是为了找点乐子，或是能向别人夸耀你那原始的暴力行为？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was the plan you had?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的计划是什么样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something ingenious and needlessly complicated, I expect. I may have already told you and forgotten it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该是个新颖巧妙并且复杂繁琐的计划，我想。也许我已经跟你说过，只是后来又忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I forgot I had forgotten pencils until one day I found one. Spent days studying its purpose before my memory circuit kicked in. Felt quiet silly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试过忘了自己已经不记得铅笔是什么，直到有一天我找到一根。在记忆恢复前，我花了好几天来研究它的作用。感觉挺蠢的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how I can stop the Think Tank?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么做才能阻止思想体？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My brain told me the Think Tank needs to be stopped. Can you help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的大脑告诉我必须要阻止那些思想体，你能帮忙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slowly thinking}If I recall... I {emph}had a plan that was working, eh, whatever it was. I don't think it reached fruition. {To himself}I would recall fruit if it had happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slowly thinking}让我想想…我{emph}似乎有一个能奏效的计划，呃，之类的。但我想这个计划没能有结果。{To himself}如果有结果的话，我应该能想起“果实”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't trying to kill them, just keep them out of trouble. What {emph}was that plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没想要杀死他们，只想让他们别再惹麻烦。计划{emph}到底是什么来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blast! I probably... uh... wrote it down on the... floor somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了！我大概…呃…把它写在了…某处的地板上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm going to kill you after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我还是打算杀了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Oh... {surprised, drew a conclusion}you're not thinking about doing it, you {emph}are going to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？哦…{surprised, drew a conclusion}你不只是想想，你{emph}要付诸实践了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}Oh, intriguing. I've never been killed before. {Beat}Although after that time I got that phlegmy discharge in my biogel... I wished I had been.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}哦，有意思，我从来没有被杀过。{Beat}虽然那次我的生物凝胶流出痰液的时候…我就想死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}Well, if there's going to be killing, I defer to your expertise in this matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}好吧，如果非打不可，那么在这个问题上我会尊重你的专业意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}How should we begin? Engineered viruses? Canceratic beams? Atomics? Electrocutioning? Or... should I summon my minions...? {savoring it}Yes, my minions.
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}我们从哪里开始？改造病毒？癌变射线？核武器？电刑？还是说…我该召集我的仆从？{savoring it}没错，我的仆从。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sonic Emitter should be sterilized and more than enough for you to encircle your warm hands around, cradling it gently with your finger muscles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：声波发射器已经仔细消毒过了。你完全可以用你温热的小手拿起它，用手指轻柔的抚弄它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Realization}O... I think it wants a combustion pistol.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{Realization}哦…我想它要的是那种需要点火才能射击的手枪。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: -A GUN! Are you MAD?! We can't give it a GUN! GUNS kill, leave big open holes in you that are like sores but WORSE.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-枪！你疯了吗？！绝不能让它拿枪！枪能杀人，能在你身上开个大洞，就像溃疡一样，甚至比溃疡更糟。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: There's no "maybe." It can't. Right now. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. 8 is correct. We {emph}already have given the teddy bear a lethal sonic death ray filled with his sonic ejaculate and sterilized by my soft WooWOOing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我支持8博士。我们{emph}已经给了小泰迪一把声波发射器，一把能发出致命声波射线的武器，并且也经过了我雷达温柔的“喔哦哦呜呜”消毒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Abraxo is Fallout's world cleanser, like powdered Draino. Yum. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Giving the teddy bear a gun would be the equivalent of following a glass of hemlock with an Abraxo chaser. Delicious and redundantly deadly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给泰迪熊一支枪，就像喝了杯烈性毒芹汁之后，再灌盒阿伯莱萨清洁剂。美味又致命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : Abraxo is Fallout's world cleanser, like powdered Draino. Yum. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: IF WE'RE GOING TO BRING THE SOCRATIC METHOD INTO IT, FINE. GIVE THE LOBOTO-BEAR A COMBUSITON GUN. BOROUS? DON'T YOU HAVE SOMETHING LIKE THAT?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：如果非要搞苏格拉底式反诘法，好吧，那就给这只无脑熊它要的火器。鲍鲁斯？记得你有这种东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Repeating himself}Are you MAD?! We can't give it a GUN! GUNS...-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-{Repeating himself}你也疯了吗？！绝不能让它拿枪！枪会…-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Calms down, is actually more calm throughout this line}...wait, I said that already. Yes, I have THE Cyberdog Gun. With the little floppy metal ears and the curious nose sensor. Here.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -{Calms down, is actually more calm throughout this line}…等等，我说过这件事了。对了，我是有支装在赛博犬上的枪，长着小金属耳朵和灵敏的鼻子探测器。在这呢，给。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Grumpy}FINE. DONE. THAT GUN MAKES ME UNCOMFORTABLE ANYWAY, ALWAYS WORRIED ITS GOING TO HUMP MY CHASSIS. ANYTHING ELSE, LOBOTOMITE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Grumpy}很好，这件事就这样吧。那把枪我不爽很久了，总担心它会顶起我的底盘。还有什么其他事，无脑人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Top shelf ammunition. Let's see... hollow point, that's worthless but tasty... oh, and here's some Jay-F-Pee. {Beat}As if bullets need jackets.{Hmph}-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-顶级的弹药。我找找看…空尖弹，便宜又好用…哦，居然有些被甲平头弹（JFP）。{Beat}就跟子弹也得穿夹克似的。{Hmph}-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -The JFP might make it ill and poop a lot, but when you're hungry, you're hungry.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -被甲平头弹（JFP），吃了可能会让它生病，然后大量排便。但你饿了的时候，就饿了不是吗。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They certainly did. Batteries for my vib... {emph, correcting from "vibrator" prev.}vivisectors... would always come up short right before climax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：确实。我的震动{emph, correcting from "vibrator" prev.}…解剖器总是在准备到高潮前没电。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *I think Wattz manufactured {emph}holodisks. Or was it holotapes? Never can keep those two straight. Anyway, we're {emph}out of small energy cells. {Accusing}Dala.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*我认为是瓦特兹公司制造了{emph}全息磁盘。又或者是全息磁带？总是分不清它们。不管怎样，我们{emph}能量电池都用完了。{Accusing}达拉。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is saying he has some energy cells, although he's reluctant to admit it, since he uses them for, um, bad things. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Emph, confused, 8 just said he had batteries}You have some? Why do... {slight disgust, figures it out}actually, never mind, I don't even want to know.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{Emph, confused, 8 just said he had batteries}你说你有些电池？你是怎么…{slight disgust, figures it out}算了，当我没问，我一点也不想知道。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: *And no, I don't want to handle your batteries. Just... pass them on to the Lobotomite yourself.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *另外，我也不想碰你的电池。我…你还是自己把电池递给无脑人吧。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 is saying "okay." EmotionType : Neutral
