ESP.ORIGINAL: *{Whispers, confused}Are you... echoing what he said, or... are you asking for real?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{Whispers, confused}你…是在附和他，还是说…你真真的在询问？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's asking, yes. Dr. Klein, there are {emph}many other personalities. If you recall, you hurled them off the Sink balcony after your argument with Mobius.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：是的，他是在询问。克莱因博士，还有{emph}另外一些人格芯片。不知你是否还记得，某次和莫比乌斯博士争吵后，你把它们从汇聚节点的阳台上全扔了出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT IS {Emph}NOT AN ARGUMENT IF ONE IS CLEARLY RIGHT AND THE OTHER IS CLEARLY WRONG!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：如果其中{emph}一个人完全正确，另一个人却错的离谱，你就不该将其称为争吵！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I REMEMBER NOW. YES, LOBOTOMITE, THERE ARE OTHER CHIPS. IF YOU WANT, FIND THEM. I BELIEVE THEY ARE STORED ON HOLOTAPES IN MANY OF OUR FACILITIES.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我想起来了。没错，无脑人，还有其他的芯片，你想要就去找吧。它们都存储在全息磁带里，你能在各个不同的研究设施里找到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: BUT YOU SHOULD STAY OUT OF THOSE - {Emph}NO EXPLORING AND DISCOVERING THINGS. THE SINK CENTRAL "INTELLIGENCE" SHOULD BE ENOUGH FOR YOUR... HEH... {Hmph}NEEDS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我奉劝你远离那些，{emph}无关探索和发现的东西。汇聚节点的主"智能"单元应该足以满足你的…哼…{Hmph}需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather have a good old-fashioned gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿要把传统意义上的好枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] WHAT DID IT SAY? SPIT "LEAD?" WHAT, LIKE PENCILS?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 克莱因：它说什么？能射出"铅块"的东西？比如说铅笔？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This sonic gun looks like an energy projectile. Got anything that spits lead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这声波枪看上去是射能量束的。有没有什么能射铅块的武器给我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {DUPE}NO. WHAT ELSE CAN WE DENY YOU?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 克莱因：{DUPE}不。给你的还不够吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I just go back upstairs and to the main circular console?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我只要回楼上，找那个圆形的主控台就行了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. SIMPLY... SPEAK TO IT. WITH VERBAL WORDS TRANSMITTING IN AN OPEN AIR MEDIUM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：没错。只要…对它说话就行。让语音信息在空气介质中传输。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: THERE IS NO MORE WE CAN DO TO AID YOU AND OUR PATIENCE LEVELS ARE DEPLETED. NOW GO. REST IN THE SINK IF YOU MUST. BUT LEAVE US TO OUR RESEARCH.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经没有什么可以帮你了。我们的耐心水平也已耗尽。赶紧走吧，有需要可以在汇聚节点休息。别再来打扰我们研究了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just one of these chips, huh? Guess they're rare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就一块芯片，哈？它一定非常稀罕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] ARE THERE OTHER CHIPS?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 克莱因：还有别的人格芯片吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This chip looks like it was mass-produced. Are there other chips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这块芯片看起来是量产的，还有其他的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] RARE? I GUESS. MIGHT BE MORE SOMEWHERE, I FORGET. {Realizing this makes him sound uninformed}I MEAN... SUCH KNOWLEDGE IS ENCRYPTED DEEP IN MY DATABANKS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 克莱因：罕见吗？也许吧。可能还有别的芯片，只是我忘了。{Realizing this makes him sound uninformed}我是说…这些知识在我的数据库中被深度加密了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, having a store available would be helpful... it has a store connection right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，有个商店能用总是有帮助的…它连接了一个商店，是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So just plug it into the circular map-thing in the Sink upstairs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以把芯片插进楼上汇聚节点那圆形地图一样的机器里就行了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. YOU MAY NEED TO WIGGLE IT IN A BIT, BUT DON'T FORCE IT. WE CAN'T RE-CODE THEM IF YOU BREAK IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：没错。可能要你稍微拧一下，但别用太大劲。弄坏了，我们也没法重编一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: THERE IS NO MORE WE CAN DO TO AID YOU AND OUR PATIENCE LEVELS ARE DEPLETED. NOW GO. REST IN THE SINK IF YOU MUST. BUT LEAVE US TO OUR RESEARCH.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经没有什么可以帮你了。我们的耐心水平也已耗尽。赶紧走吧，有需要可以在汇聚节点休息。别再来打扰我们研究了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Uh, if you're done, can we move again? My biogel's starting to {cramp + coagulate}crampagulate.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*呃，没别的事的话，我们能动了吗？我的生物凝胶都要开始{cramp + coagulate}扭成一团了。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: OF COURSE. GO MAN YOUR SCIENCE STATIONS. GO! {Beat, to himself}I AM SURROUNDED BY CHILDREN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：不然怎样。回你的研究岗位上去。快去！{Beat, to himself}没一个懂事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just spit it out before you bore me to death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在烦死我之前，你最好能说出点什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm listening, let's hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在听，你说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh... these have been sterilized, too, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃…这些也消过毒了，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So these will work in the Sonic Emitter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这些会作用于声波发射器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice. This should be enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这应该够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use some more... energy... stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些…能…用来充能的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] HMMM. YES, I BELIEVE WATTZ ELECTRONICS TENDED TO MAKE THE BATTERY SHELF LIFE ON THE LOW END.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 克莱因：嗯，好吧。我觉得瓦特兹电子公司故意把电池寿命做得越来越低。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Energy Cells have a high expenditure rate. Some extra reserve cells could offset that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能量电池的消耗率很高。准备些额外的备用电池可以抵消该影响。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] NO. WHAT ELSE CAN WE DENY YOU?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]克莱因：不。我们拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this gun all? Uh, can't have enough guns, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这把枪？呃，可以再多给些，真的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] FINE. BOROUS, MORE AMMO. THE GOOD STUFF.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 克莱因：好吧，鲍鲁斯，要更多的弹药，高质量的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um, this gun looks really hungry. I'd like to make sure it gets fed lots of bullets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这把枪看起来饿坏了。我得用更多的弹药才能喂饱它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {DUPE}NO. WHAT ELSE CAN WE DENY YOU?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 克莱因：{DUPE}不。给你的还不够吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give a shit what you have to say. Tell me why you hauled me here. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的我他妈的一点也不关心。你们把我拖到这里到底想干嘛，快说！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Curious, slow}THAT RESPONSE SEEMED DEMANDING, AS IF CUTTING TO THE CASE. {Corrects}UH... CHASE. HOW SURGICAL. {Thinking}REMINDS ME OF...
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Curious, slow}它似乎是在表达某种强烈的要求，想要直奔{Corrects}…主题。像外科手术般精确，{Thinking}让我想起了…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein

ESP.ORIGINAL: These technologies seem more useful... medically, somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 某种程度上说，这些技术似乎更具…医学价值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {Thinking}HEAL YOU? WHAT, PUT YOU BACK TOGETHER LIKE SOME GIANT HARD-BOILED YUMYUM DEVILED EGG?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {Thinking}治好你？怎么做，把你的身体部分都放回去，像只巨型恶魔美味芥末蛋？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : (YumYum is a specific brand of deviled egg in Fallout.) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The cardiac, spinal, and brainwave aspects of this tech... couldn't they heal me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这里有心率，脊椎和脑波方面的技术…有了它们难道还不能治好我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Dismissive}WHATEVER. THE ONLY MEDICINE MOBIUS WILL NEED IS A RESUSCITATOR AFTER WE... YOU... BREAK IN THERE.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Dismissive}怎么想随你。在我们…在你…突入禁区以后，莫比乌斯唯一需要的医疗品就只有呼吸机了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's actually not the conclusion I would have drawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是我会得出的结论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {Thinking}BIOLOGICAL? PFF. RIDICULOUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {Thinking}生物学？天马行空，无稽之谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't these items seem more... biologically-focused than that, though?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但比起那些，这些技术看起来不是更具…生物学意义吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Slight frustration}WHATEVER. I'M AFTER RESULTS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Slight frustration}不管了，我只追求结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then there's no time to waste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别浪费时间了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I go after him, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到他，然后呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: THE DOOR SHOULD BE UN-SEALED. {Moment of triumph}NOW, INSTEAD OF BEING SUBJECTED TO THREATS, WE CAN NOW SEND AN EQUALLY THREATENING MESSAGE TO MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大门应该已经打开了。{Moment of triumph}如今，我们不用再受制于莫比乌斯的威胁。相反，我们可以给他发送对等的恐吓信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AND THAT MESSAGE IS SCIENCE! {Beat}DELIVER THIS MESSAGE, AND BIG {Mountain}MT SHALL BE FREED FROM MOBIUS' REIGN OF TERROR!
ESP.TRADUIT: 而那信息就是科学！{Beat}传达了这条信息，大山脉{Mountain}就能摆脱莫比乌斯的恐怖统治，重获自由！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slightly quieter}UM, YOU CAN GO NOW. THAT'S YOUR CUE.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slightly quieter}呃，你可以走了。该你出场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: LET ME CHECK SOMETHING... OF COURSE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看…就是它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I HAVE IT. THE OVERRIDE SEQUENCE TO OPEN THE FORBIDDEN ZONE DOOR IS HIDDEN IN THE SCHEMATICS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了。开启禁区大门的覆写序列就藏在这些图纸之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WELL, NOT HIDDEN, IT'S ACTUALLY RIGHT THERE, BEHIND THE PROGRAMMING EQUIVALENT OF COFFEE STAINS...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，没被藏起来。实际上它就在这儿，在这段咖啡渍似的程序后面…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT'S EMBEDDED IN WHAT SEEMS TO BE RECURSIVE CODE... IT'S BADLY COMMENTED, THERE AND THERE... OH, AND NULL POINTERS. VERY SLOPPY, MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它被嵌套在像是一段递归代码里…这里和这里，都注解得好糟糕…哦，竟然还有空指针。莫比乌斯，你还真是马虎啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU SEE, USING THE ANTENNA TO BOOST THE EMITTER'S SONIC FREQUENCY, AND THE STEALTH SUIT TO BYPASS THE FORBIDDEN ZONE LOCK... YES, THAT COULD WORK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，使用天线来加强声波发射器的频率，使用潜行甲来解开禁区的锁…没错，这应该可行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WAS THAT MY PLAN? IT MUST HAVE BEEN. SOMETIMES I TRULY SURPRISE MYSELF. THE DOOR IS OPEN... AND NOW, MOBIUS WILL GET HIS.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的计划吗？理所当然是的。有时候我真的会让我自己都惊叹。禁区的大门即将打开…马上，莫比乌斯就会得到他应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I MEAN, TECHNICALLY, THESE ITEMS COULD ALL BE USED TO PUT YOU BACK TOGETHER ONCE YOU HAD YOUR BRAIN.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，从技术上讲，在你取回你的大脑后，这几件物品也能用来把你的器官拼回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Low, sinister}BUT FOR NOW, THEY CAN BE USED IN THE NAME OF AGGRESSION.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Low, sinister}但此时此刻，它们显然更适用于进攻和战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you remember what other biological effects the other items had?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还记得其他物品有什么生物学功能么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I'm waiting for you to draw a conclusion.
ESP.TRADUIT: …我在等你下结论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'M THINKING. THIS IS ALL VERY COMPLICATED.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在思考。它太复杂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the suit's a cardiac regulator, and the sonic frequency is a spinal vibrator?
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行甲原本是个心率调节器，而声波发射器是脊椎颤振器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'VE GOT IT. THE CARDIAC REGULATOR IN THE SUIT, THE ANTENNA FOR BRAINWAVES, AND THE SONIC FREQUENCY FOR THE VERTEBRAL NERVES...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我懂了，潜行装甲是为了里面的心率调节器，天线可以用于脑电波，声波发射器的频率可以用于脊椎神经…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: These devices all seem very scientific. Very.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些设备看起来都很科学，非常的科学。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] YES, THAT'S WHAT I BELIEVE I SAID.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 是的，我想这就是我说过的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, the antenna focuses brainwave patterns, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，这个天线可以集中脑电波的形态，对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] PLEASE LET ME THINK. THIS MAKES MY BRAIN HURT.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 容我再想想，伤脑筋啊…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll let you think it over, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你想清楚再给我回复。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The antenna looks like it could break things beyond repair. Maybe it could break in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这根天线看起来破坏力很强，应该能打烂禁区的大门？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] SO YOU'RE SAYING... IT'S THE X-2 {Emph}ARRAY, NOT THE ANTENNA I SHOULD BE EXAMINING? THAT WAS... MOST LIKELY MY PLAN, YES.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你是说…我该检查的是X-2的{emph}阵列，而不是那根天线？这…跟我设想的一样，没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The antenna, any chance it was damaged, or broke the X-2 array once removed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那根天线，有没有可能它坏了，或者在被摘走后弄坏了X-2的天线阵列？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Slight frustration}YES, YES, THE ANTENNA CAN DO DAMAGE...
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Slight frustration}对，对，天线能用来搞破坏…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...AND IT {Emph}DID DO DAMAGE, ONCE YOU REMOVED IT FROM X-2. WAS THAT MY PLAN? IT MUST HAVE BEEN.
ESP.TRADUIT: …它也确实造成了破坏，一旦你从X-2拔了它。那是我的计划吗？应该是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think the X-13 sneaky suit can slip in and get to Mobius?
ESP.TRADUIT: X-13潜行甲能自己溜进禁区，找到莫比乌斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I SUPPOSE IT COULD. IF IT COULD BE QUIET FOR MORE THAN A FEW MOMENTS, ALWAYS TALKING, TOUCHING THINGS...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 也许可以，但前提是那个叽叽喳喳，情感过剩的家伙能把嘴闭上那么几小时…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...HMMM. IT DOES HAVE AN INTERFACE DISRUPTOR WEAVE AGAINST ELECTRONICS. LIKE THE FORBIDDEN ZONE DOOR.
ESP.TRADUIT: …嗯，它内置的交互干扰器确实能对付电子设备，比如禁区的大门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would the suit's dampening abilities allow me to sneak into the Forbidden Zone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行装的消声功能可以帮助我潜入禁区？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Slight frustration}NO, THAT'S TOO EASY. AND IT WOULDN'T WORK BY ITSELF. IT'S... SLIGHTLY CO-DEPENDENT.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Slight frustration}不，没那么简单。而且它不能自己动的，它需要…依附在人身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe the new frequency for the Sonic Emitter can blast open the Forbidden Zone door lock, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许声波发射器的新频率能爆开禁区的门锁，或者…？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {Thinking}ITS RANGE IS LIMITED, AND IT WOULD NEED A BOOSTER OF SOME SORT, A... CARRIER, BUT...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {Thinking}它的范围有限，还需要一个加压放大器之类的东西，某种…载体，但是…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe the frequency in the Sonic Emitter's a sonic key of sorts? Like an electronic lockpick?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能声波发射器里的频率会是个声波密钥？类似电子开锁器？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Slight frustration}IF THAT WAS THE CASE, I'D USE AN ATOMIC KEY ON THE DOOR AND BE DONE WITH IT.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Slight frustration}这要行得通的话，我早就做了把原子钥匙，然后早早把这事了结了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to advance my boot into your voice module if you don't give me some solid data.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你如果提取不出什么可靠数据，看我不踢爆了你的发声模块。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you have me get them if you don't know how they would help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你都不知道这是干什么的，干嘛还让我去回收它们？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you even know what these technologies do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你连它们干什么用的都不知道？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Defensive}I KNOW HOW THESE TECHNOLOGIES WORK. {Beat}OF COURSE I KNOW.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Defensive}我知道它们的用途。{Beat}我当然知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Frustrated}IF YOU REMEMBER, WE DESCRIBED THEM IN CLEARLY ABSTRACT CONTRADICTORY STATEMENTS BEFORE. WHY WOULD WE DO THAT IF WE WEREN'T CERTAIN ON...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Frustrated}你应该记得，之前我们清晰明了地描述过它们，它们的作用非此即彼。这说明我们不可能不知道它们…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Uncertain}...ON HOW TO USE THEM, YES. SO LET ME... HMM, A BIT, I... I'LL FIGURE IT OUT.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Uncertain}…怎么使用，对。所以让我…嗯，一小会儿，我…我马上就能搞清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Yes..." what?
ESP.TRADUIT: "对…"什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: NO... I MEAN YES. JUST NEED TO ANALYZE THESE TECHNOLOGIES FOR A MOMENT. THEY ARE EXTREMELY ADVANCED, YOU KNOW.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不对…我是说，对。我只是需要些时间去分析这些技术。你也知道，它们非常先进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么不对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your answer isn't filling me with confidence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的回答没什么说服力啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, glad that you received the schematics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，很高兴你得到了图纸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do these technologies have the information you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些技术里有你要的信息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So genius, what now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么大天才，接下来呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. HMMM. AH, YES. YESSS... YES... AH. HMMM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，嗯嗯，啊，对，对…没错…啊，嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would Mobius want my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么莫比乌斯想要我的大脑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY DOES HE SEEK OUR DESTRUCTION? WHY DID HE BUILD ROBOT SCORPIONS WITH INTELLIGENCE-DRAINING STINGERS?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他想消灭我们？为什么他要造出带有“降智”尾刺的机械蝎？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: IT IS BECAUSE HE HASN'T CLEANED HIS BIOGEL IN... A LONG TIME. CLEARLY, HE'S GOT SOME SORT OF PSYCHOLOGICAL CORROSION. HE'S MAD.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是因为他一直没有清理他的生物凝胶…一直没有。显然，他的精神被腐蚀了。他疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said before that Mobius might have my brain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你之前说…拿走我的脑子的可能是莫比乌斯博士？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. IN ALL PROBABLE LIKELIHOODS, YES. POSSIBLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。在所有的可能中，这个的可能性要大些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Slow suspicious}THAT IT MAY HAVE GONE TO MOBIUS IS MERELY AN INKLING. I DON'T KNOW WHY, BUT IT MAY BE SOMETHING INVOLVING THE SURGERY CODE.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Slow suspicious}我只是隐约觉得应该是莫比乌斯干的。具体为什么我也不清楚，但貌似和手术代码有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ACTUALLY, I DON'T KNOW. {Blaming brain}ALL I KNOW IS IT MISPLACED ITSELF. OR IT FLOATED OFF. THEY GET INTO ROBOTS SOMETIMES AND GO ON A TEAR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实，我不知道你的大脑去哪了。{Blaming brain}我只知道它不见了，可能是被水冲走了。它们有时也会钻进机器人里，然后跑去鬼混。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions about this "brain extraction" you all performed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道一些关于你做的"大脑提取"手术的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: WELL, {Emph}WE DIDN'T ACTUALLY DO IT. WE TRIED TO CLEAN UP AFTER, AS ALWAYS, BUT USUALLY THE AUTO-DOC RUNS ON REMOTE. BUT WE PROGRAMMED IT. OR, MOBIUS DID.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，{emph}事实上不是我们做的手术。我们只是惯例事后去做个清理。通常是由远程控制的自动医生主刀。但自动医生的程序是我们写的，或者说是莫比乌斯写的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: STILL, THIS NEW WRINKLE WITH THE TESLA COILS IN YOUR SKULL WAS UNEXPECTED. {Huffy, correcting}I MEAN WE PREDICTED WE'D HAVE A BREAK-THROUGH {emph}EVENTUALLY, BUT...
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，我们也没想到，在你颅骨的这个“褶皱”里，会多出新的特斯拉线圈。{Huffy, correcting}啊我的意思是，我们本来预期最后会有新的发现。{emph}但是…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: DALA KNOWS MORE. SHE SUPERVISED YOUR SPINE-PEEL. AND THE HEART CIRCUMCISION. THEN DUMPED THEM BOTH INTO THE TANKS IN THE SINK ABOVE. QUITE SANITARY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉比我更了解情况。她是进行剥离你脊椎操作的负责人(教母)，还有心脏移除(割礼)。最后又把它们放到贮槽里。整个过程都非常的卫生(圣洁)。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {To himself}SURE TOOK HER TIME. SHE ALWAYS TAKES LONGER THAN PROJECTED WITH LOBOTOMITE SURGERIES, NOT SURE WHY.
ESP.TRADUIT: {To himself}这当然费了她不少功夫。但话说回来，每到做大脑提取手术的时候，她总得比平时花更长的时间，莫名其妙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scare them? How?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐吓他们？要怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, tell them I'm still alive, we had a nice chat, and we agree on a few things. That's true... isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，像是告诉他们我还活着，我们进行了一次很愉快的交谈，甚至还在某些事上达成了一致。毕竟事实如此嘛，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, you could kill me and lie about it. {Thinks it over}Either way, it would be interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，你也可以杀了我，然后向他们撒谎，说我还活着。{Thinks it over}不管你选哪种方式，都一定会很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you are partial to lying and deception... well, you could tell them a ludicrous lie. The more over-the-top, the better, that's my experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你如果打算撒谎骗他们…好吧，那就编造一个尽可能荒谬的谎言。越荒唐越好，这是我的经验之谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're more than a little gullible. {Warning}Better make it convincing, though, or it'll be the dissection table and vivisectors for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们其实还挺容易上当的。{Warning}不过还是编的像话些，如果他们识破了你的谎言，你就得等着上解剖台了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Puffs up a bit}And if you speak of me, please try and make me look good. I am Dr. Mobius, after all, not some lab assistant teacher's aide.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Puffs up a bit}另外，你要是谈到我，请尽量把我说得好些。毕竟，我可是莫比乌斯博士，不是什么给实验室助理打下手的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to make the effort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尽力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, there's many things they have forgotten, sitting in their bowls. Friendship. The thrill of discovery. Love. Masturbation. The usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉，脑子泡在缸里，他们忘记了太多东西，像友谊、对新发现的喜悦、爱、自慰、日常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much like {emph}your brain, I am certain there is something you can spark within each of them. Memories, hormones...
ESP.TRADUIT: 和{emph}你的大脑一样，我相信一定有什么东西，能重新点燃他们的这些情感。比如说回忆、荷尔蒙…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...a wise man once said, the eyes do more than see. Make them see, if you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: …某位智者曾说过，眼睛不仅仅是用来看的。让他们看到这点吧，如果你能做到的话。（艾萨克·阿西莫夫同名科幻小说）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, if not, you can always make them succumb to fear... it certainly worked for me. For a time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，如果不这样，你也可以让他们屈服于恐惧…一度，我认为这是最有效的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you came along, and bravery and/or desperation trumped that little idea. Back to the drawing board, I suppose. Or is this the end? Hard to tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到你来了，他们的勇气和绝望压倒了恐惧。于是一切仿佛又重回开始，又抑或这将是终结？我也说不清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any suggestions for how to make them change their minds?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么办法能让他们改变主意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd really, really like to kill them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我真的，真的很想杀了他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmmm. Well, if you're determined to go down that road, so be it. They will undoubtedly switch off the pacification field when you return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，好吧。既然你意已决，那就随你好了。你回去的时候，他们肯定不会再打开平静场了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I could do to stop them that doesn't require violence?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么方法可以兵不血刃地阻止他们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well... you {emph}could try and appeal to their humanity. {Dubious}That's a tired cliché. And really, when they were humans, they weren't very good humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个…你{emph}可以试着唤醒他们的人性。{Dubious}这都是些陈词滥调了。而且说真的，即使在他们还是人类的时候，他们也不算是什么好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100C1CF] (ID) Quest : ([01003733]NVDLC03DialogueMobius) Dialogue Dr. Mobius EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't let you dissect the Mojave. Or let you leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能放任你们去解剖莫哈维。不能放你们出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES, YOU CAN. YOU DON'T REALLY HAVE AN ALTERNATIVE THAT I CAN SEE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：噢，你当然能。这件事上你根本没有别的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'M NOT GOING TO HARM IT, I'M GOING TO DISSECT IT UNTIL ITS DEAD. {Suspicious}WHY THE SUDDEN {Means "interjection," on purpose}INTERSECTION, DALA.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我们不会伤害它，只是在它完蛋前详尽地解剖一番。{Suspicious}为什么突然 {Means [QUOTE]interjection,[QUOTE] on purpose}打断我，达拉？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Um... it's personal. But... I would hate if its dying screams revealed any odious personal habits I... or any of us might have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：呃…只是个人看法。但是…我怕它垂死的尖叫会暴露我…或者我们某些人的怪诞习惯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cannot stand a breathing, a sweet breathing organism, breathing in, and out, to suddenly not breathe. We must keep it alive. For study. Slow study.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：我不能接受一个能呼吸的，贴心的，鲜活的小有机体忽然不再吸气，吐气了。我们得让它活着，好进行研究，慢慢地研究。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: DALA, THESE... VOCALIZED PAUSES ARE... UNLIKE YOU. WHAT DO YOU CARE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：达拉，你怎么…支支吾吾的…这可不像你。你到底想说什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Klein, um - are you sure we've calculated all the combat probabilities here? I mean, the Lobotomite confronted {emph}Mobius...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*克莱因，唔。你肯定我们计算到了这场战斗的所有可能性？要知道，这只无脑人可是从{emph}莫比乌斯那儿活着回来了…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Plus, you know, we haven't had a C-O-M-B-A-T drill in forever. I don't think we could form a tactical attack triangle if we {emph}wanted to.*
ESP.TRADUIT: *还有，你也清楚，我们从没做过任何作-战训练。我不觉得开打后，我们能顺利组成那个战术进攻阵型。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *Klein, uh... you know, this Lobotomite, it's a great sounding board. You respect Idea-ology, right? This one's... well, it's... got good ideas.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*克莱因，呃…你知道的，这只无脑人…向它咨询总能获得很棒的回应。你一向推崇理念学，不是吗？它…呃，它…总有很好的理念。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: RELEASING THE W-O-M-B-A-T WAS NOT MY PLAN, O, SO GET OFF MY VOICE BOX.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我没考虑过让这只树-袋-熊活着。O，所以你离我的音箱远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Angry}SILENCE, DR. {Emph}O. THIS IS A THINK TANK DECISION. SAVE YOUR OBJECTIONS UNTIL {Emph}AFTER I HAVE DECIDED OUR COURSE OF ACTION.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Angry}安静，{emph}O博士。这是智库的决定。在我决定了行动方案后，不要再有异议了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You know what, Klein? Stick a straw in your tank and suck yourself. Long and deep.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*你知道吗，克莱因？拿根吸管伸进罐子里吸自己脑浆吧你。插得越长越深越好。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: *And you know what, I don't like the way you say my name. Never did. It's "O," as in "O, look what I stepped in." I'm proud of it - all right?*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*还有知道吗，我不喜欢你叫我名字的方式，一点都不喜欢。应该念"O"，就像在说“哦，看我发现了什么。”我为我的名字骄傲，好吗？*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: *And my name is {emph}Zero - yeah, a big fat zero, with a {emph}slash through it.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*还有，我的名字是{emph}零——没错，又大又圆，带着{emph}斜杠的零。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Genuinely impressed}THE SLASH... AS A DESIGNATOR OF... WHY, THAT IS BRILLIANT. BUT HOW DID YOU...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Genuinely impressed}用斜线…作为标识符…太妙了。但你是怎么…？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *The Lobotomite taught me that. Taught me a name is more than... um... that I should take pride in... things. Like... names... and...*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*那只无脑人教会了我这些，教会了我名字不仅仅是…唔…还是我应该为之自豪的东西，比如说…名字…和…*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: *You know what, forget it, Klein. I hate you. {Beat}And your theory of brainial beam oscillation? The Chinese had it {emph}first, you copycat!*
ESP.TRADUIT: *你知道吗，别管这些了，克莱因，我讨厌你。{Beat}还有你那有关脑波振荡的理论，那是中国人{emph}先搞出来的，你个无耻的剽窃者！*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sputtering, furious}HOW DARE YOU! BRAINIAL BEAM OSCILLATION WAS SOLELY MY DISCOVERY! I EXPRESSLY TOLD YOU THAT AND DELETED ALL EVIDENCE TO THE CONTRARY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Sputtering, furious}放肆！脑波振荡理论完全是我的发现！而且我之前早就告诉过你，还删除了所有不利证据！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: *{"Shutting up"}Silencing opinionators.*
ESP.TRADUIT: O：*{“Shutting up”}我闭嘴不代表我没意见。*
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006873] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 suggests a plan of action. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：8，怎么连你也?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY ARE YOU ACTING LIKE THIS? YOU'VE NEVER REFUSED TO COMMIT NECESSARY... SURGERY BEFORE. {Menacing}AND THIS LOBOTOMITE NEEDS ITS SURGERY.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么会这样？你从未拒绝…进行必要的手术。{Menacing}现在这只无脑人就需要进行手术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : [01006874] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein Comment (NAM2) : AUDIO: Dr. 8 blanks out. EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Huh?}WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU? {Trying to figure it out}YOU SOUND... BRAIN-SCRUBBED, BLINDLY AGREEING WITH THE LOBOTOMITE. {Suspicious}WHAT...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：{Huh?}你到底是哪不对劲？{Trying to figure it out}你听起来像是…被洗脑了一样，对那无脑人言听计从的。{Suspicious}发生什么了…？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A NOBLE SPEECH, {Disdain}BUT... THERE IS NO ROOM IN MY VOCABULATORS FOR "FRIEND" AND "LOBOTOMITE" IN THE SAME SENTENCE. THE VERY CONCEPT - REVOLTING.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：真是精彩的辩论，{Disdain}可惜…我的词汇表不允许"朋友" 和"无脑人"出现在一起，这叫人反胃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Thinking}PERHAPS YOU ARE IRRADIATED WITH CAMARADERIE RADIATION. WE HAVE CHEMS FOR THAT, WE CAN SAVE YOU FROM YOUR EMOTIONAL... ADDICTION.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Thinking}我猜你们都感染了“同志情谊”的辐射。没关系，我们有药，专治这种情感上的…瘾症。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Quiet, sad - actually leveling out}I, for one, cannot bear to let this continue.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-{Quiet, sad - actually leveling out}我，就我个人而言，我绝对不能容忍这种事情继续下去。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: -I don't see what is to be gained by throwing another body into our labs... especially one that has done us a service, gone where we feared to go.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -我看不出继续把又一个活物扔进实验室对我们有什么好处…更何况它还曾帮助过我们，前往我们惧怕的地方。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -This Lobotomite doesn't deserve our knives. It deserves our respect. We should care for it. Feed it. Nurture it - give it the life Gabe never had.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这只无脑人不应该被解剖，它值得我们尊敬。我们应该照顾它，喂养它，培育它——给它加布没能有的生活。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -{Matter-of-fact}If I may, I feel as if I must be the voice of reason here.-
ESP.TRADUIT: 鲍鲁斯：-{Matter-of-fact}恕我冒昧，但这里此刻需要我理性的声音。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: -This Lobotomite is much like us, regarding even animals and pets as nothing more than avenues to promote Science! There is good here.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -这只无脑人和我们很像，明白动物、宠物之流只不过是科学进步的踏脚石！这点很好。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: -Instead of ending its life on the table, we should prolong its suffering, in the name of Science. Like good old Gabe, the FINEST of lab specimens.-
ESP.TRADUIT: -比起在手术台上结束它的生命，我们更应该延长它的痛苦，为了科学。就像亲爱的老加布，是最好的实验样本。-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006875] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Klein, please. Let's see what its insides look like. {Beat, to herself, a little excited}Finally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：克莱因博士，拜托了。让我们看看它的内部结构吧，{Beat, to herself, a little excited}让我如愿以偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Klein, I must... {intentional misuse of word}intersect. Please... do not harm the Lobotomite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 达拉：克莱因博士，我必须…{intentional misuse of word}打断一下。请…请不要伤害这只无脑人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [01006872] (ID) NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY AM I EVEN LISTENING TO YOU FOOLS? THE DETERMINATORS ARE GREATER THAN THE HESITATORS. SO HESITATORS, BE QUIET.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我干嘛要听你们这些蠢货的话？坚定之人胜于犹豫之人。所以犹豫者们，都把嘴闭上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY AM I EVEN LISTENING TO YOU FOOLS? ENOUGH OF THIS MUTINOUS CHORUS! IF THERE'S A WORD I HATE, IT'S "MUTINY."
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：我干嘛要听你们这些蠢货的话？想合起伙来造我的反是吧！要问什么词令我最厌恶，那一定是“背叛”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {To himself}AND THE WORD "JISM," WHICH NEVER MADE ANY SENSE TO ME. IT'S RIDICULOUS, PUTTING "J" AND "SM" TOGETHER LIKE THAT. NONSENSE!
ESP.TRADUIT: {To himself}"精液"(jism)也是，对我来说没有任何意义。荒谬的东西，把"J"和"SM"像这样组合起来，愚蠢之极！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I COUNT AS FIVE. LIKE THE MIGHTY HUMAN HAND I ONCE HAD, WITH ITS FIVE PENISES CLENCHED IN A FIST.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一个就能顶五个。就像曾经我那有力的人类大手，它的五根生殖器紧握在一个拳头里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE ARE BIGGER, SMARTER, AND FLOATIER THAN YOU, LOBOTOMITE. WE DON'T WISH TO FIGHT YOU, SO SURRENDER YOUR BRAIN. NOW.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因：无脑人，我们比你更强大，更智慧，更能飘浮。但我们无意与你战斗，所以，把脑子交出来，快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mobius and I talked it over, reached an understanding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和莫比乌斯谈过了，而且我们达成了某些共识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU ARE LYING. NO, YOU ARE NOT. YOUR HEARTBEAT, PERSPIRATION... ALL EXCESSIVELY CONFIDENT AND SURE OF YOURSELF.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在撒谎。不，你没有。你的心跳，渗出的汗…证明你现在过于自信，且得意自满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WHY WOULD YOU REASON WITH THAT MANIAC? HE'LL DESTROY US ALL!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么能和那个疯子讲道理？他会害死我们所有人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think I killed Mobius?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为我杀了莫比乌斯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: YES. WAIT. YOU DID, DIDN'T YOU?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。等等，你是杀了他吧，难道你没有？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may have noticed the pacification field is down. Guess what happens now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大概已经注意到平静场罢工了，猜猜看接下来会发生什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard one of the previous visitors to the Dome spoke to you, asked you some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说前不久有位来访者来穹顶拜访过你，还问了些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: HMM? OH YES, THE LAST VISITOR... WELL, THE ONE JUST BEFORE YOU. {Thinking back}HAD AN INTERESTING NAME FROM SOME LANGUAGE THAT'S ALMOST UNPOSSIBLE TO SPEAK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦，是的，上一个拜访者…想起来了，在你之前那个。{Thinking back}}他的名字很有趣，取自某种已经几乎没人能说的语言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Starts getting confused}WHAT DID WE SPEAK ABOUT...? MELANCHOLY FELLOW, HAD QUESTIONS ABOUT... HISTORY? BUT...
ESP.TRADUIT: {Starts getting confused}我们聊了什么来着…？那个忧郁的家伙问我有关…历史的问题？但…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: OUR CONVERSATION GOT INTERRUPTED... TWICE, I BELIEVE? ONCE WHEN THE TRAINS GOT DERAILED, AND THEN A SECOND TIME...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的谈话被打断了…两次，大概吧？第一次是在列车脱轨时，然后第二次…
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...ODDLY ENOUGH, NOW THAT I'M ACCESSING MY DATABANKS, I DON'T RECALL WHAT THE SECOND TIME WAS. MOBIUS' INCESSANT TRANSMISSIONS KEEP DISTRACTING ME.
ESP.TRADUIT: …真奇怪，我的数据库竟然检索不到第二次的记录，一定是因为莫比乌斯不停发送的信息干扰了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: ALSO, WE DIDN'T BRAIN-SCRUB THE VISITOR. HE MAY HAVE LEFT WITH SOME KNOWLEDGE HE SHOULDN'T'VE. I BELIEVE. MAYBE.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，我们没有擦除他的记忆，因此他可能带走了一些不该带走的知识。我猜…大概。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: OH WELL, I'M SURE IT'S OF NO CONSEQUENCE. I DON'T MAKE MANY MISTAKES IN CALCULATION OR PERCEPTION, SO PROBABILITY FAVORS ME.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧，我肯定这无关紧要。我的演算与推测极少出错，因此，一定是因为这对我有利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can bring the Mojave, this world to you. You'll be safe, and you'll still be able to experiment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以把莫哈维废土，这个世界带到你们面前。这样你不但安全，还能继续进行实验。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can still do that... here, quietly, for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你仍可以做实验…不过得为了我，在这里，安安静静的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: FOR YOU? AND FOR SCIENCE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了你？也为了科学？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I HAVE A STRANGE SENSATION... THAT I WOULD LIKE THAT. HOW... ODD.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有种奇怪的感觉…觉得自己会喜欢这样的关系，这…真古怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: VERY WELL... PARTNER. THE THINK TANK IS AT YOUR SERVICE. AS LONG AS YOU DO NOT DESTROY US.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好…伙伴，我们会和你合作。思想体随时乐意效劳，只要你不消灭我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you willing to risk it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意冒这个险吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] THAT SOUNDS LIKE SOMETHING MOBIUS WOULD SAY.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 这种说话的口气确实是莫比乌斯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}HOW DARE YOU BREACH THE THINK TANK? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT HERE?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}你竟敢入侵智库？你来这儿想干嘛？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You FOOLS had best listen. Or MOBIUS will bring his army here, to sting you STUPID.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们这些蠢蛋最好乖乖听话，不然莫比乌斯会派他的大军到这儿，把你们全蛰成傻子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {DUPE: Irritated}MOBIUS DOES NOT FORM ALLIANCES. HE WAS A TERRIBLE LAB PARTNER, AND HE WOULD MAKE A WORSE ALLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {DUPE: Irritated}莫比乌斯不会和人结盟。他是个糟糕透顶的实验室搭档，更是一个糟糕的盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: He offers a deal - stay here, stay put, and he'll let you live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有个提议，你们乖乖待在这里，他就放你们一条生路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: THAT'S NO DEAL AT ALL! THERE'S A WHOLE WORLD BEYOND THE CRATER... FILLED WITH IDEAS AND POSSIBILITIES!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这件事上我们绝不会妥协！一个全新的世界就在这环形坑之外…一整个充满各种理念和可能性的世界！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WE COULD HAVE ESCAPED, SEEN IT ALL FOR OURSELVES. TESTED IT, PRODDED AT IT. MADE IT SQUIRM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以逃出去，亲眼目睹它的全貌，亲手测试它，刺激它，让它蠕动起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Do you think I killed Mobius? No, he lives.
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 你以为我杀了莫比乌斯？不，他还活着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: YOU MUST HAVE KILLED HIM. HE WOULDN'T HAVE JUST LET YOU WALK IN, TAKE YOUR BRAIN... WOULD HE?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定已经杀了他。他不会就这样放你进去，拿回你的脑子…他会么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Suspicious}NO... SOMETHING IS WRONG. YOUR PERSPIRATION... HEARTBEAT... ALL TELL A DIFFERENT STORY, I THINK.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Suspicious}不…有什么不对劲。你的汗液…心跳…都在表明事情是另一个样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Science provided a way, Klein.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科学提供的是途径，克莱因。（不是目的）

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] YOU SPEAK THE TRUTH. AND THE DECIBEL VARIATION IN YOUR VOICE... IT IS MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你所言不虚。而且这种说话时的分贝变化…的确是莫比乌斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: HOW DARE YOU BREACH THE THINK TANK? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT HERE?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢入侵智库？你来这儿想干嘛？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing is unpossible for SCIENCE! Mesons, lasers, atoms, brainwaves... all are at MY command!
ESP.TRADUIT: 科学无所不能！介子，镭射，原子，脑波…尽在我的掌控！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Irritated}"A WAY" IS CORRECT. AS IS, "AWAY." WHICH IS WHERE {Emph}YOUR BODY IS GOING ONCE WE'RE DONE PEELING YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Irritated}"一种途径(a way)"用的很好，就像在说"分离(away)"。等我们剥掉你的皮，你就真的“分离”了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's plenty of medical ways to pull off that... stunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 许多医疗技术都能完成这一…绝技(stunt)。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE}YOU SPEAK THE TRUTH. AND THE DECIBEL VARIATION IN YOUR VOICE... IT IS MOBIUS.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] {DUPE} 你所言不虚。而且这种说话时的分贝变化…的确是莫比乌斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {DUPE}HOW DARE YOU BREACH THE THINK TANK? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT HERE?!
ESP.TRADUIT: {DUPE}你竟敢入侵智库？你来这儿想干嘛？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: COUNTLESS brain extraction surgeries exist... but only one IMPLANTATION one - from MOBIUS!
ESP.TRADUIT: 大脑提取成功的手术数不胜数…但植入成功的却只有一例 – 来自莫比乌斯的案例！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Irritated}"STUNT" IS CORRECT. AS IS, "SHUNT." WHICH YOU WILL BE INTIMATELY FAMILIAR WITH AS WE'RE DISSECTING YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Irritated}"stunt"这词恰如其分，就像在说"分解(shunt)"，因为我们马上就要解剖你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mobius and I... we... formed an alliance. Sort of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫比乌斯和我…我们…结盟了，之类的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] THAT IS THE MOST INSANE THING I'VE EVER HEARD. THERE IS NO WAY MOBIUS WOULD... CONDESCEND TO STEP INSIDE YOU.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]这是我听过的最疯狂的事情，莫比乌斯他绝不会屈尊纡贵，寄居在你的体内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hesitating}BESIDES, THERE IS NO WAY SUCH A THING COULD BE ACCOMPLISHED. IT'S UNPOSSIBLE.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Hesitating}另外，迄今没有任何一种技术能实现这件事，这不可能办到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> You think I am the Lobotomite...? No, for my skull houses the BRAIN OF MOBIUS!
ESP.TRADUIT: <撒谎> 你以为我还是原来那只无脑人吗…？你错了，现在这颅骨里装的可是莫比乌斯的脑子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] {Irritated}MOBIUS DOES NOT FORM ALLIANCES. HE WAS A TERRIBLE LAB PARTNER, AND HE WOULD MAKE A WORSE ALLY.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] {Irritated}莫比乌斯不会和人结盟。他是个糟糕透顶的实验室搭档，也会是个糟糕的盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0100D628] (ID) Quest : ([01003256]NVDLC03DialogueKlein) Dialogue Dr. Klein EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm okay. Talk to you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没事了，下次再聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back any time you want a drink. Or to get... {queasy}clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感到口渴，或者…{queasy}想清洁一下，请随时回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sink Voice (NOT USED IN GAME) [0100F05C] (mod) Quest : ([0100E6F2]NVDLC03DialogueHQBuddies) Dialogue for HQ Buddies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 在X-8测试终端上开启住宅区赛博犬安保测试

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search Gabe's digging spots in the X-8 Residential Test Facility for the audio sample of Gabriel's Bark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在X-8住宅区测试设施，加布刨的洞中，寻找音频样本“加布的吠叫”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve the three student records from the desk terminals in the X-8 Institutional Facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在X-8学校区测试设施的桌面终端上，回收三份学生记录

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enter the X-8 Residential Test Facility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入X-8住宅区测试设施

ESP.ORIGINAL: X-2: Strange Transmissions!
ESP.TRADUIT: X-2：奇特信号！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Climb up to the satellite dish and retrieve the X-2 Antenna.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爬上卫星锅，回收X-2天线

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to the X-2 Transmitter Antenna Array.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到达X-2发射机天线阵列

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old World Blues
ESP.TRADUIT: 旧世蓝调

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Think Tank and let Dr. Klein know you've completed your tasks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 返回智库向克莱因博士汇报你完成了任务

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to the Forbidden Zone Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入禁区穹顶

ESP.ORIGINAL: Confront Dr. Mobius at the Forbidden Zone Dome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在禁区穹顶与莫比乌斯博士当面对质

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve your brain from the Forbidden Zone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在禁区中找回你的脑子

ESP.ORIGINAL: Confront Dr. Klein at the Think Tank and end your imprisonment at Big MT.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在智库与克莱因博士当面对质，并结束你在大山脉的监禁

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Dr. Klein and the other members of the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死克莱因博士和其他思想体

ESP.ORIGINAL: Satisfy Dr. Mobius' curiosity about what it's like to be killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 满足莫比乌斯博士的好奇心，让他知道被杀死是什么感觉

ESP.ORIGINAL: Disable or destroy the Giant Robo-Scorpion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关闭或摧毁机械巨蝎

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the Think Tank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开智库

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Use the Sink Auto-Doc to retrieve your original heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)使用"汇聚节点"的自动医生装回你原来的心脏

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Use the Sink Auto-Doc to retrieve your original spine.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)使用"汇聚节点"的自动医生装回你原来的脊椎

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Retrieve the Sink Auto-Doc's personality holotape from Y-17 to restore the Auto-Doc's functionality.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)在Y-17找到"汇聚节点"自动医生的人格磁带，使其重新运作

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to the Big Empty
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到大坑洞

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find out where the hell you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 弄清楚你这是在哪儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak to your... captors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和...绑架你来这的人对话

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the X-2 antenna brain array thing, the sonic-soundwave-projecto-emitter spine thing... and the sneaky heart suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿到X-2天线大脑阵列啥的，声波发射器脊椎啥的，还有潜行心脏服

ESP.ORIGINAL: Correction: They have the sonic... projecto... emitter gun. They need a new frequency for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修正：他们手上有声波发射器…一条能射的枪了，需要的是发射器的新频率

ESP.ORIGINAL: Correction: So get the X-2 antenna brain array thing... the new frequency for the Sonic Emitter, and the sneaky heart suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修正：所以要拿的是X-2天线大脑阵列啥的，声波发射器的新频率，还有潜行心脏服

ESP.ORIGINAL: Correction: Wait, there's another optional Sonic Emitter frequency that disables Force Fields that's not the frequency they need...? Ugh, forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 修正：等等，声波发射器还有个能关闭力场的频率，但这又不是他们需要的那个频率？呃，随便了

ESP.ORIGINAL: Closing out these entry logs, clearing the utility partition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关闭登入日志，清除功能分区

ESP.ORIGINAL: Midnight Science-Fiction Feature!
ESP.TRADUIT: 午夜科幻剧场！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the midnight showing at the Mojave Drive-in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查莫哈维露天影院的午夜剧场

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reinforced Spine
ESP.TRADUIT: 增强脊椎

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your spine has been augmented with advanced technologies: Your torso can no longer be crippled and your Strength (STR) and Damage Threshold (DT) have been increased (+1).
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脊椎被先进技术所强化：你的躯干再也不会残废了，你的力量和DT全都+1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cardiac Arrest
ESP.TRADUIT: 心脏停搏

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your heart has been augmented with advanced technologies: You cannot be poisoned, and filters in your heart will also regulate bleeding and healing, allowing all healing items (chems) to function at a higher level (+25%). Robots are now confused by you and 50% less likely to score a critical hit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先进技术增强了你的心脏：你再也不会中毒了。心脏中的过滤器能控制出血和疗愈，各种治疗药品能发挥更好的作用（+25%）。机器人现在对你很疑惑，能减少其50%的暴击几率。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big-Brained
ESP.TRADUIT: 大-脑

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your brain has been augmented with advanced technologies: Your head can no longer be crippled and is resistant to chem addiction (25% resistance) and shock from bodily damage (5% Damage Resistance).
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脑子被先进技术所增强：你的头部再也不会残废，药物成瘾抗性提高25%，DR增加5%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reinforced Spine
ESP.TRADUIT: 增强脊椎

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your spine is back in your body, but some advance technologies remain: Your torso can now be crippled again, but your Strength (STR) and Damage Threshold (DT) bonuses have doubled! (+2)
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脊椎又回来了，但一些先进技术留了下来：虽然你的躯干现在会残废，但你的力量和DT全都+2。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cardiac Arrest
ESP.TRADUIT: 心脏停搏

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your heart is back in your body, but some advanced technologies remain: You are less resistant to poison (50%) and robots are only somewhat confused by you (25% less likely to score a critical hit) now. But on the bright side, healing items (chems) are even more effective!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的心脏又回来啦！但一些先进技术留了下来：你现在的抗毒能力只有以前的50%，机器人对你也只是有点疑惑而已（让暴击几率减少25%）。但是往好的方面想，治疗药品比以前更有效了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big Brained
ESP.TRADUIT: 大脑

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your brain is back in your body, but some of the advanced technologies remain: Your head still cannot be crippled, but you are only 10% more resistant to addiction now. Surprisingly your damage threshold has improved by 10% (minimum +1 DT).
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脑子又回来了，但一些先进技术留了下来：你的头还是残废不了，但抗瘾几率只增加10%。令人惊奇的是，你的DT提高了10%（最少1DT）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heart-full
ESP.TRADUIT: 心脏-完整

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your body once again pumps with blood and passion. Your Barter and Speech skills have increased by 5. And your ability to shoot an enemy's heart has increased (+10% VATS to the torso).
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的身体再一次充满了血液和激情。你的口才和交易各加5，射击敌人心脏的能力也提高了（VATS下对躯干的命中率+10%）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brain-full
ESP.TRADUIT: 大脑-完整

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your brain is back in your body! And it's smarter now! You now gain experience at an increased rate (+10%) You gain one additional skill per level. Your Intelligence is higher (+1 INT) and your Science skill has been raised by 10.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的大脑又回来啦！而且它更聪明了！ 你能获得更多的经验值（+10%），你每升一级能获得额外获得1点技能点。 你的智力有所提高（智力+1），科学技能也上升了（科学+10）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spine-full
ESP.TRADUIT: 脊椎-完整

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's good to have your own spine again. You're more agile now (+1 AGL), a bit sneakier (+5 Sneak Skill) and you've gain more confidence in your posture and movement (+1 CHA).
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脊椎又回来啦！你现在更敏捷了（敏捷+1），潜行进步了一点（潜行+5），对自己的姿势和移动也更自信了（魅力+1）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Claustrophobia
ESP.TRADUIT: 幽闭恐惧

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have a fear of enclosed spaces (probably because of the mutants that live there). You gain +1 to S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes when outside, but suffer -1 when indoors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你患上了幽闭恐惧症（可能是害怕里面的变异生物吧）。你在室外时属性点全部+1，但你在室内时属性点全部-1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Skilled
ESP.TRADUIT: 训练有素

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're skilled, but not experienced. You gain +5 points to every skill, but you suffer -10% from experience gained from now on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你技艺精湛，但经验不足。你的每项技能+5，但以后获得的经验值-10%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Logan's Loophole
ESP.TRADUIT: 永葆青春

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one's going to put you out to pasture 'cause you're going to stay young (and level 30) forever! You'll never again become addicted to chems, and they'll last twice as long... but after 30 you can kiss experience, perks, and skill points goodbye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了执法者5号罗根的疏忽，再也没有人让你去退休了，因为你青春永驻（永远保持在30级）！你再也不会因嗑药而上瘾，而且药物持续时间是以前的两倍！但是，你不得不向30级以后的经验、能力、技能点说再见了！（致敬电影Logan‘s Run，逃离地下天堂）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hoarder
ESP.TRADUIT: 囤积者

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gain +25 lbs. to your carrying capacity, but suffer a -1 to all attributes any time the weight you're carrying drops below 160 lbs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能多负载25磅的东西！但当你背着的东西少于160磅时，你的所有属性-1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hot Blooded
ESP.TRADUIT: 热血沸腾

ESP.ORIGINAL: When your health drops below 50% you gain +10% more damage, but you also suffer -2 to your Agility and Perception attributes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你生命值下降到50%以下，你的攻击力提高10%，但与此同时，你的感知和敏捷-2。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Early Bird
ESP.TRADUIT: 早起鸟儿

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey early risers! Enjoy a +2 to each of your S.P.E.C.I.A.L. attributes from 6 am to 12 pm, but suffer a -1 from 6 pm to 6 am when you're not at your best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，早起的鸟儿有虫吃！你在早上6点到晚上12点期间属性点全都+2。在晚上6点到早上6点期间属性点全部-2。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stealth Suit Mk II
ESP.TRADUIT: 潜行服Mk II

ESP.ORIGINAL: The latest software patch for the Stealth Suit Mk II. V1.1: Damping Sensors (+10 Sneak) V1.2: Aural Subnet (+1 PER) V1.3: Synced Fitment (+1 AGL) V1.4: Impulse Accelerator (Increased sneak speed)
ESP.TRADUIT: 已打最新固件补丁的潜行服Mk II效果如下 V1.1: 阻尼传感器 (潜行+10) V1.2: 听觉子网 (感知+1) V1.3: 配件已同步 (敏捷+1) V1.4: 脉冲加速器 (加快潜行速度)

ESP.ORIGINAL: DNAvenger
ESP.TRADUIT: DNA复仇者

ESP.ORIGINAL: Studying the abominations created at the Big MT has granted you a damage bonus (+10% per rank up to three ranks) against Cazadores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过研究大山脉里的恶心怪物，你对猎蜂的伤害增加（共3级，每级提高10%）。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robot Compliance
ESP.TRADUIT: 机械原理

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Robot Compliance perk, sneaking up on a hostile robot undetected and activating it will put that robot into a permanent shutdown state.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你拥有“机械原理”能力时，在不被发现的前提下，你可以偷偷摸到机器人的背后，把机器人永远地关掉！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deactivate
ESP.TRADUIT: 关闭

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant GRX
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体GRX

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gain a non-addictive subdermal Turbo (chem) injector. This perk may be taken twice, with the second rank increasing the effect from 2 to 3 seconds and the uses per day from 5 to 10. [Activated in the Pip-Boy inventory.]
ESP.TRADUIT: 你获得了一个不会上瘾的增压剂注射器（药物）。这个perk能升2级，第2级能把效果从2秒提高为3秒，把每天的使用次数从5次提升到10次 [已在哔哔小子物品栏启用]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Them's Good Eatin'
ESP.TRADUIT: 血肠狂人

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any living creature you kill has a 50% chance to have the potent healing items Thin Red Paste or Blood Sausage when looted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见人吃人，见鬼吃鬼！你杀死任何生物时，有50%几率会掉落治疗品稀血酱或血肠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heartless
ESP.TRADUIT: 无心脏

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your heart has been replaced with advanced technologies: You cannot be poisoned, and filters in your heart will also regulate bleeding and healing, allowing all healing items (chems) to function at a higher level. Robots are now confused by you and 50% less likely to score a critical hit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的心脏被替换成了更高科技的产物：你再也不会中毒了。并且心脏中的过滤器能控制出血和疗愈，各种治疗品、化学药物能更好地发挥作用。机器人现在对你很困惑，对你造成暴击的几率减少50%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brainless
ESP.TRADUIT: 无大脑

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your brain has been replaced with advanced technologies: Your head can no longer be crippled and is resistant to chem addiction (+25% resistance) and shock from bodily damage (+5% Damage Threshold, minimum +1).
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的大脑被替换成了更高科技的产物：你的头再也不会残疾了，你的抗瘾能力+25%，DT也增加5%（最低+1）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spineless
ESP.TRADUIT: 无脊椎

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your spine has been replaced with advanced technologies: Your torso can no longer be crippled and your Strength (STR) and Damage Threshold (DT) have been increased (+1).
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脊椎被替换成了更高科技的产物：你的躯干再也不会残疾了，而且你的力量和DT全都+1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant Y-7
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体Y-7

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant Y-7 is an enzyme booster that increases the Health (HP) gained from foods and recovers additional Action Points (AP) per food item consumed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体Y-7是一种酶加速器，它能提高从食物中回复的HP值，并在每次摄入食物时获得额外AP点数

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mile in Their Shoes
ESP.TRADUIT: 换位思考

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have come to understand Nightstalkers. Consuming Nightstalker Squeezin's now grants bonuses to Perception (+1 PER), Poison Resistance (+5), and stealth (+5 Sneak) in addition to the normal benefits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对夜行兽十分了解。当服用夜行兽的提取物时，能够额外让敏捷+1，毒抗+5，潜行+5。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DNAgent
ESP.TRADUIT: DNA特工

ESP.ORIGINAL: Studying schematics on the abominations created at the Big MT has granted you a damage bonus (+10%) against Nightstalkers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过研究大山脉里创造畸形怪物的图纸，你对夜行兽的伤害+10%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant C-13
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体C-13

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant C-13 was originally designed as a defense turret subroutine to help eliminate Cazadores should they escape from their containment, but it's been repurposed for testing on human subjects. (+10% damage to Cazadores)
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体C-13原本是一个防御炮塔的子程序，用于帮助消灭逃逸的猎蜂。但它正被重新尝试用于人体。 （对猎蜂的伤害+10%）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant Y-3
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体Y-3

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant Y-3 places an internal filtration system in the digestive tract that strips any liquid consumed of all radioactive particles before being processed by the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体Y-3在消化系统中内置了一个过滤系统。它能在身体吸收前，将摄入液体所含的辐射粒子剥离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant M-5
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体M-5

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can be made... better... faster... stronger... Actually, just faster. The M-5 implant increases your crouched movement speed by 20% for greater efficiency as a test subject.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会变得……更高……更快……更强……事实上，只是更快啦。植入体M-5可以使你的潜行的移动速度增加20%，让你作为实验体更有效率。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Atomic!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Atomic! perk, you are 25% faster and stronger whenever you're basking in the warm glow of radiation. Outside irradiated areas, your Action Points (AP) regenerate faster and faster the higher your level of radiation sickness becomes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拥有“原子！”能力，当你受到辐射时，你的速度和力量增强25%。当你没有受到辐射时，你的辐射病等级越高，行动点数（AP）回复得越快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Torso
ESP.TRADUIT: 躯干

ESP.TRADUIT: 右腿

ESP.TRADUIT: 无敌的全息影像

ESP.TRADUIT: 身体

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mouth Monitor
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘴部监视器

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brain
ESP.TRADUIT: 大脑

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eye Monitors
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼部监视器

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chassis
ESP.TRADUIT: 机箱

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weapon
ESP.TRADUIT: 武器

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eye Monitors
ESP.TRADUIT: 眼部监视器

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have the caps for that procedure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的瓶盖还买不起那个玩意儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant Interface
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体界面

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test failed. A robot was destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试失败。一只机器人被摧毁了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Auto-Doc's Psychiatric Evaluation will allow you to re-define the Traits you selected when you created your character. You may only do this once - are you sure you want to proceed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动医生的精神鉴定功能，可以让你重新决定创建角色时选择的特性。你只能这么做一次，确定继续吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Psychiatric Evaluation
ESP.TRADUIT: 精神鉴定

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thanks, I'll wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不了，谢谢。再等等。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, twist my psyche into new and exciting shapes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，把我的精神变成新的、令人兴奋的模样吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant Y-3 removed ingested radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体Y-3清除了摄入的辐射

ESP.ORIGINAL:
DNAvenger Perk Granted
Studying the abominations created at the Big MT has granted you a damage bonus (+10%%) against Cazadores.
ESP.TRADUIT:
获得DNA复仇者 perk
通过研究在大山脉制造出来恶心的东西，你对猎蜂的伤害提升10%！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
DNAvenger Perk Rank Increased
Further study of the abominations created at the Big MT has granted you an additional damage bonus (+10%%) against Cazadores.
ESP.TRADUIT:
DNA复仇者 等级上升
通过更进一步的研究在大山脉制造出来令人厌恶的东西，你对猎蜂的伤害再提升10%！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't use this while you're crouched.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你蹲下的时不能使用这玩意

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This is your original heart. Your new heart seems to be working just fine, however.
Thanks to the information imparted by your own brain (oddly enough), you're now able to put your original heart back in place by using the Sink's Auto-Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是你原来的心脏，不过你的新心脏看起来工作得也还不错。
感谢你自己的大脑提供的信息（够怪的），你现在可以使用汇聚节点的自动医生，把你原来的心脏安回去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Here is your original spine. You seem to be doing just fine with the replacement spine, fortunately.
Thanks to the information imparted by your own brain (oddly enough), you're now able to put your original spine back in place by using the Sink's Auto-Doc.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是你原来的脊椎。很幸运，换上去的新脊椎还不错。
感谢你自己的大脑提供的信息（够怪的），你现在可以使用汇聚节点的自动医生，把你原来的脊椎接回去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Klein awaits. Make sure you're prepared to finish this once and for all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克莱因博士在等着你。请确定你已经准备好去结束这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Hazmat Suit Containment Unit requires a security code to disable the force field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 防护服保存装置需要一个安全码来关闭力场

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have any materials to process!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有任何材料可供回收！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Process Materials?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要回收什么材料？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant C-13 is now available for surgical installation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体C-13可用手术安装

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant Y-7 is now available for surgical installation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体Y-7可用手术安装

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant Y-3 is now available for surgical installation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体Y-3可用手术安装

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implant M-5 is now available for surgical installation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 植入体M-5可用手术安装

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Reinforced Spine "Perk"
Your spine is back in your body, but some advance technologies remain: Your torso can now be crippled again, but your Strength (STR) and Damage Threshold (DT) bonuses have doubled! (+2)
ESP.TRADUIT:
增强脊椎 perk
你原本的脊椎回来了，但是一些先进的技术还是留了下来。你的躯干受伤后会残疾，但你的力量和DT的奖励翻倍！（+2）

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost the Reinforced Spine perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 失去增强脊椎perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Reinforced Spine perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 获得增强脊椎perk

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Cardiac Arrest "Perk"
Your heart is back in your body, but some advanced technologies remain: You are less resistant to poison (50%%) and robots are only somewhat confused by you (25%% less likely to score a critical hit) now. But on the bright side, healing items (chems) are twice as effective! (+50%%)
ESP.TRADUIT:
心脏停搏 perk
你的心终于回来了，但一些先进的技术留了下来。你的抗毒素能力降低（50%），机器人对你也有点疑惑（机器人的攻击只有25%不会出现暴击）。 但往好的方面来看，你的治疗药品效果是以前的两倍！（再上升50%）

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Cardiac Arrest perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 获得心脏停搏perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost the Cardiac Arrest perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 失去心脏停搏perk

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Big Brained "Perk"
Your brain is back in your body, but some of the advanced technologies remain: Your head still cannot be crippled, but you are only 10%% more resistant to addiction now. Surprisingly your damage threshold has improved by 10%% (minimum +1 DT).
ESP.TRADUIT:
“大脑”能力
你的大脑终于回来了，但还有一些新技术留了下来。你的头受到了伤害还是不会残疾，但你现在只能上升10%的 抗瘾几率。令人惊奇的是你的DT上升10%（最低1DT）

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost the Big Brained perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经失去了大脑perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Big Brained perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已获得大脑perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Heartless perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 获得无心脏perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost the Heartless perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 失去无心脏perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost the Spineless perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 失去无脊椎perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Spineless perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 获得无脊椎perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost the Brainless perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 失去无大脑perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have gained the Brainless perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 获得无大脑perk

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Heartless "Perk"
The scars on your chest seem to confirm what the Think Tank is saying... you cannot be poisoned, and filters in your artificial blood pump will regulate bleeding and healing, allowing all healing items (chems) to function at a higher level (+25%%). Robots are now confused by you and 50%% less likely to score a critical hit.
ESP.TRADUIT:
无心脏“perk”
你胸膛上的伤疤似乎证实了思想体的说法…你不会中毒，你的人造血液泵中的过滤器可以控制血流并且治疗，所有治疗用物品（药物）的效果提高25%。机器人现在对你很困惑，对你造成暴击的几率减少50%。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Spineless "Perk"
Due to complications with the procedure, your spine has been replaced as well: Your torso can no longer be crippled and your Strength (STR) and Damage Threshold (DT) have been increased (+1).
ESP.TRADUIT:
无脊椎 perk
鉴于手术的复杂性，你的脊椎也被替换了。现在你的躯干再也不会残废了，你的力量和DT全都+1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Brainless "Perk"
Your brain has been replaced with advanced technologies: Your head can no longer be crippled and is resistant to chem addiction (+25%% resistance) and shock from bodily damage (+5%% Damage Threshold, minimum +1).
ESP.TRADUIT:
无大脑 perk
你的大脑已经被新科技所取代 你的头再也不会残疾了，你的抗瘾能力提升25%，DT提升5%（最低1DT）

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have found a recalibration file for the Sonic Emitter. Take it to the Jukebox in the Sink to recalibrate the Sonic Emitter for new effects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了一个声波发射器的校准文件，把它带到汇聚节点的点唱机进行校准，将获得声波发射器新效果

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your brain used to float here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的大脑曾在这里漂浮

ESP.ORIGINAL: This option doesn't seem to be available right now. Some sort of control override must be in place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在这个选项不能使用。一些控制覆盖必须到位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your original heart used to be floating in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你原生的心脏曾在这里漂浮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your original spine used to float here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你原来的脊椎曾在这里漂浮

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your brain floats here. You seem to be doing just fine without it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的大脑漂浮在这里。没有了它你似乎也没什么不适。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Based on the other tanks in the room, you can safely assume this where your brain would be floating. It's currently missing from both the tank and its proper place in your head, but you seem to be doing just fine without it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据屋子里的其他罐子，你推断你的大脑本该漂在这。虽然你的大脑不见了，但你似乎没什么不适。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enemy frenzied!
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌人发疯了！

ESP.TRADUIT: 替换你的脊椎吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes
ESP.TRADUIT: 是

ESP.ORIGINAL: No
ESP.TRADUIT: 否

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes

ESP.TRADUIT: 否

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes

ESP.TRADUIT: 移除你的大脑吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes

ESP.ORIGINAL: No

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here is your spine. Without a brain stem to snap it on to, here it floats. Your back doesn't feel any different from the spine's removal - if anything, whatever was placed in there makes you feel stronger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的脊椎，没有脑干给它接入，它一直漂浮在这里。脊椎换了以后你的背部没感觉有什么异样，如果有，那一定是让你感觉更强壮了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is your heart. Apparently, cranial surgery complications required its removal, and until your brain is returned, your heart can't be trusted to keep beating in your body. Your new heart seems to be working just fine, however.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你的心脏。很显然，为了解决大脑提取的并发症，它也被一并移除了。在你的脑子回来之前，你的心脏都没法在体内正常工作。不过你的新心脏看起来工作得还不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've acquired the Big Mountain Transportalponder! It's capable of transporting you - and you alone - between the Mojave Wasteland and Big MT.
To return to the Mojave (or go back to Big MT from the Mojave), simply equip the Transportalponder! as you would any weapon, pull the trigger, and away you'll go. Note that it won't work in interiors or in combat situations, and is totally incapable of harming your enemies.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你获得了大山脉的传送装置！它能让你在大山脉和莫哈维废土之间传送。只能传送你一个人。
想要回到莫哈维（或者从莫哈维回到大山脉），只需像装备武器一样装备传送装置，然后扣动扳机，接着就上路了！注意，在室内或者战斗中，你无法使用它进行传送，而且它也没有任何攻击力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sonic Emitter EM Pulse Wave Unlocked! The Sonic Emitter can disable force fields.
ESP.TRADUIT: 声波发射器电磁脉冲波已解锁！现在声波发射器可用于关闭力场了

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sonic Emitter is required to enter this test.
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要携带声波发射器进行这项测试

ESP.ORIGINAL:
DNAgent Perk Granted
Your study of the abominations created at the Big MT has granted you a damage bonus (+10%%) against Nightstalkers.
ESP.TRADUIT:
获得 DNA特工 perk
通过研究在大山脉被创造出来恶心的东西，你对夜行兽的伤害增加10%

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test failed. You left the test area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试失败。你离开了测试区域。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't investigate the satellite while you're in combat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗时不能调查卫星。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The crashed satellite seems to be the source of the strange transmission you received.
Old World Blues is recommended for experienced Couriers (Level %.0f+).
You have a premonition that while you'll be unable to return to the Mojave until you solve the mysteries of the Big Empty, you WILL be able to take anything you can carry with you, and you WILL be able to return to the Big Empty any time after completing Old World Blues.
If you are up to the challenge (and you have all you want to carry with you), examine the satellite a little closer... the atomic wonders of Science! await.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这坠落的卫星似乎就是神秘信号的来源。
旧世蓝调DLC是为有经验的邮差准备的（等级%.0f+）。
你有预感在解开大坑洞（Big Empty）的谜团前，你将不能回到莫哈维。你可以带你任何想带的东西。完成旧世蓝调后，你可以随时回大坑洞。
如果你一切准备就绪，那就凑过去好好研究下这颗卫星吧……原子科学奇观，在等着你！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要管它

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a closer look at the satellite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更仔细地检查卫星

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Test Completed!
Your reward stipend has been placed in the Reward Safe next to the Test Terminal. Congratulations!
ESP.TRADUIT:
测试完成！
你的奖励已经放在测试终端旁的奖励箱里了。恭喜你！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test Completed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 测试完成！

ESP.TRADUIT: 测试失败。你被发现了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Giant Robo-Scorpion's power system has recovered from the power surge that disabled it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 机械巨蝎的电力系统已从方才的电力激增中恢复过来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Test failed. You touched a tripwire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实验失败。你碰到了绊线

ESP.TRADUIT: 测试失败。你被巡逻机器人发现了。

This Laser Tripwire Emitter is armed.

(Science %.0f or higher required)

这个镭射绊线正在工作

ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做

ESP.TRADUIT: 您已成功破解发生器

ESP.TRADUIT: 你感到身体奇怪地重了起来。经过快速的检查，你发现你的头，胸膛，后背有些淡淡的伤疤...

ESP.TRADUIT: 不要介意，我想待在原地。

ESP.TRADUIT: 带我去莫哈维。

ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定要传送到汇聚节点吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This prototype Auto-Doc is capable of performing a thorough physical exam and curing the patient of all common ailments - radiation sickness, lacerations, broken bones, even chemical addictions. In addition, it can also give haircuts and perform cosmetic surgery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个原型自助医生可以执行完整的身体检查，并且治疗所有的常见病痛，如辐射病，撕裂伤，骨折甚至化学上瘾。另外，它还可以理发和整容。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've gotten a fragmented signal on your Pip-Boy - a coded transmission of some sort with a sad, jazzy undercurrent that makes your head hurt. As far as you can tell, it appears to be an invitation to the Midnight Science-Fiction Feature! at the Mojave Drive-In (please arrive early to catch the trailers).
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的哔哔小子收到一个时断时续的信号。这段悲伤的爵士乐是一段加密的广播，听着让你头脑发疼。你发现这段广播似乎是封邀请函，邀请你前往莫哈维影院，观看午夜科幻故事片。（记得提前到场，以免赶不上预告片）
